comments: Graphics are crystal clear, game play is easy to understand, assists in majority of the steps needed to build and upgrade your city buildings and troops and a dragon. Play in tournaments, and get rewards to assist in your upgrading. What's not to love,  course I'd like to see this game run without an internet connection so I could play offline too...thanks.

Not a great game. Played for half the day. Game will no longer start and tells me to make sure I'm connected to the net. Oh I'm really that dumb. World chat is more like a dating site and is not child friendly. The admins do nothing to stop the behaviour in world chat. I strongly advise you not to allow your kids anywhere near this game

If your hobby is watching paint dry this is the game for you. This game is entirely too time consuming for anyone with a real life. Which I guess is why no one is here for the game . Everyone playing is here to get credits in another game .  Which is why this game has so many downloads  not because it's actually good. The over-sexualized comments in the chat rooms are ridiculous. Parents if you are reading this I would not allow my child to play this game unless you are going to sit with them every moment. If you have to do that is it even really worth allowing your child to play the game.

Basically clash of clans looking ads, plays like just any other mmo. Another Mr steal your money if you wanna get good game. If you want something thats fun and never ever going to try to take your money, play clash. 5 years of playing it and ive only bought a 5$ thing bc gems just come so easily and im a lvl170 th10 . No need to spend money to get good

I mean this is just insulting to clash of clans and how hard they worked to make clash of clans... lazy! I just downloaded the game to rate it... enjoy my one star review lazy jerks... rate this a one star and download clash of clans.

They encourage you to register the game with an email account but give you the run around should you seek to change it. The game is not worth the time nor money.

comments: Like ot a lot. Taskforces need to be improved drasticly. Focus on playing with others makes it a lot more fun. EDIT: still no real task force improvements, why it doesn't open straight onto you TF or why I have to go through several buttons to see people starts is stupid. sorting this out make my review 5*

This is not another Clash of Clans clone, but definitely pushes the boundaries of the clan genre. Good graphics, fun gameplay, and balanced in terms of units vs. defences for your island. While diamonds can be purchased by real-world money, the game doesn't trap you into needing them. The weekly mini-game missions help keep things fresh and assist in moving your base up the tech tree if you're patient. SuperCell is continually expanding the game to keep it interesting. Definitely worth a download!

Very addictive and always checking on my base, upgrades etc. Strategic game play, however too much pressure to buy diamonds as it takes FOREVER! !! for some things to upgrade. Seriously. ..2 days for an upgrade??? Only other issue is the limited time "special abilities"...they're fun but it makes it far too easy for someone to raid your base and take all resources needed to get the upgrades. Lots of fun and love the graphics

The graphics are amazing for this type of game. And I think that's why so many people love it. The only thing I wish that their could be is offline play. Just block the chats and player raids and only allow campaign attacks and their would be many more players able to play... Bcs sometimes I don't have data or wifi where I am and it's a pain bcs I love Supercell games. And ik why there isn't offline play, bcs the other players that attack you. But their must be some way around that like maybe a whole offline mode. Well if u read this ty and it's a great game keep up the amazing work you do providing us with amazing games...  ~Bladez

I have played this game since it has come out and I have seen all of the changes and they have shaped that game for better over the years the game has been out it has improved and is one of my best games I have ever played. But the down side is that it is really hard to get resources at first but then before you know it you are full and you have nothing to do about it. Also when getting the heros they should make that base a bit easier because the lower level people can't attack till the have a lot better troops.

Great game, but too slow. While I love the lack of pay to win, I'd wish for a way to speed up resource gathering: I've cleared out every similar level player in my area, and spend days waiting for RSS to build up so I can upgrade. Which is necessary before I can access a larger zone. No point buying speedup gems, as I've never anything to use them on!
description: Welcome to Boom Beach: come with a plan or leave in defeat!Fight the evil Blackguard with brains and brawn in this epic combat strategy game. Attack enemy bases to free enslaved islanders and unlock the secrets of this tropical paradise. Create a Task Force with players around the world to take on the enemy together. Scout, plan, then BOOM THE BEACH!PLEASE NOTE! Boom Beach is free to download and play. However, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you do not want to use this feature, please set up password protection for purchases in the settings of your Google Play Store app.FEATURES- Play with millions of other players, raid hundreds of enemy bases for loot- Battle for control of precious resources to upgrade your base against enemy attacks- Explore a huge tropical archipelago and discover the mysterious power of the Life Crystals- Face fearsome Blackguard Bosses and uncover their evil plans- Join other players to form an unstoppable Task Force to take on co-op missionsUnder our Terms of Services and Privacy Policy, Boom Beach is allowed for download and play only for persons 13 years or over of age without parental consent.Note: A network connection is required to playParent's guide:http://www.supercell.net/parentsPrivacy Policy:http://www.supercell.net/privacy-policy/Terms of Service:http://www.supercell.net/terms-of-service/
descriptionHTML:
Welcome to Boom Beach: come with a plan or leave in defeat!

Fight the evil Blackguard with brains and brawn in this epic combat strategy game. Attack enemy bases to free enslaved islanders and unlock the secrets of this tropical paradise. Create a Task Force with players around the world to take on the enemy together. Scout, plan, then BOOM THE BEACH!

PLEASE NOTE! Boom Beach is free to download and play. However, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you do not want to use this feature, please set up password protection for purchases in the settings of your Google Play Store app.

FEATURES
- Play with millions of other players, raid hundreds of enemy bases for loot
- Battle for control of precious resources to upgrade your base against enemy attacks
- Explore a huge tropical archipelago and discover the mysterious power of the Life Crystals
- Face fearsome Blackguard Bosses and uncover their evil plans
- Join other players to form an unstoppable Task Force to take on co-op missions

Under our Terms of Services and Privacy Policy, Boom Beach is allowed for download and play only for persons 13 years or over of age without parental consent.

Join your Facebook friends & millions of other pirates from the 7 seas in the best pirates game: PIRATE KINGS! Build your land and make it the paradise island that a pirate of your quality deserves!

Sail to adventure!
Ship away to fun pirate adventures! Play multiplayer games at Pirate Kings and prove you are a true freebooter. Shoot cannonballs to attack rival pirate islands, protect yourself from other pirates’ strikes and mine gold in this pirates adventure game.

Spin the wheel & win prize
There is only one thing a pirate loves more than the islands and seas: gold! Spin the pirates wheel and win free coins - a true pirate can never have enough cash! Even more, if you are truly lucky, shoot cannonballs and attack other pirates’ islands and loot their forbidden treasures and cash. Yo ho ho and a bottle of rum!

Build & grow your islands
Once you’ve gathered enough cash and own a proper island, enjoy the building game experience in this pirate adventure or explore additional islands! Build castles, put up a statue, decorate, and grow your ship as you play this multiplayer game with friends or random people! Pirate, your island is not a game, it is your paradise, let it grow!

Join your mateys!
Your Facebook friends are waiting online to match your pirates’ battle skills – come on board and join your fellow islanders! Spin the wheel and play a game with your Facebook friends or random players around the world, loot their treasure, attack and steal their gold or defend your treasure from their attacks. Pirates love to be competitive!

Pirate, your islands and friends await!

comments: Like so many other games like this out there it is"pay to win". This is nearly every "free" mobile game it there now. So why the 5 stars? A few reasons. A big one being that they do make the super currency accessible without paying via offers. Many of which rewards higher amount than what someone would come to expect just for making it a fair ways into other games.  Second is that the levelling system is fair and no content is truly locked for those who don't pay. It will just take you a little longer to get what you want if you don't but it won't be excluding you from the best content.   As for the game itself is alright. You collect heroes and you can engage in a variety of activities. From a campaign mode and it's associated elite version to random dungeons to guild wars, pvp, and a gauntlet. Overall you can kill however much time you want on this game. Once you start attaining higher levels you will find it easier to spend more and more time on content.  Finally as always I strongly recommend doing a Google search too learn best strategies.

Survive as long as possible by eating everything and everyone in your way!

Collect and evolve iconic sharks like the Great White, Hammerhead and Megalodon!

• Enjoy jawsome 3D graphics and sound effects
• Discover and devour mysterious creatures of the deep

descriptionHTML:
TAP, SWIPE & SLING your heroes to send them smashing towards hordes of monsters, unleashing explosive power on impact and looting epic treasures!

ALSO FEATURES

•Simple Control, Super Fun:
Issue orders, take aim and cast skills, all easily controlled by a finger swipe!

•Turn-based combat and tactical thinking:
Plan your moves, adjust formations and build up combos to overcome your enemies!

•Strategic Team-building & Hero Collection:
Each hero comes with a set of unique stats & skills that greatly affects how your plan & plan!
Try out different setups to gain the upper hand!

•Multiplayer Game Modes: Fun With Friends & Prove Your Strength
Play Co-op levels with up to 3 buddies, share the extra loot & fun!
Or battle head-to-head against other players in real-time PVP duels!

Hyper Heroes is free to download and play, however, some in-game items can be purchased with real money.
If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings.

A network connection is required to play, and Wifi connection is recommended for multiplayer games.

Like us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/hyperheroes

Our service mailbox: hyperheroes@90kmile.com

Amazing game, however there is one small problem, but not enough for me to not give it 5 stars. Recently when I've been watching an ad to double the reward at the end of the battle, the video has played until the end and it says the reward has been doubled, but I only receive the regular reward? It has happened 15-20 times and it's getting slightly annoying, as I'm about 4000 gunbucks short of what I should be now. Anyways, thanks for making such an awesome free game with little to no adverts!  UPDATE: video watching for additional rewards does not work with anything. No extra crates or supplies

One of the best fps I've played. Graphics is cartoonish but fun, Remedy is underpowered in the sense that it doesn't generate a decent HP on each hit. On lower levels, it's decent but on higher levels against Porcupine, Ranger, Thunder it doesn't stand a chance that could be balanced out by either increasing the rate of fire or increased health generation on each hit , Lifestealer is pretty darn awesome but could do better with a bit smaller crosshair and little bit more accuracy

Initially the game seems super addictive but once you hit level 16 it gets ridiculous. You have players who have spent money on guns and you're practically no match. Also the teaming of players should be balanced out. Another thing is even if you win a match you win around 30 trophies, if you lose there's a loss of 60 and if by chance you're internet is bad and you automatically get kicked out and cannot reenter you lose a 100 .Eventually you get sick and tired of all this and the game gets boring.
description: ‚úî ‚ÄúA brilliant multiplayer FPS that you should just go and play right now. 9/10‚Äù ‚Äî PocketGamer‚úî ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs so simple that your cat can learn the controls, but the skill-cap is high enough to make even hardened FPS veterans break a sweat.‚Äù ‚Äî Android and Me‚úî ‚ÄúGuns of Boom has gone where no game has gone before ‚Äì it‚Äôs a legitimately great shooter on mobile.‚Äù ‚Äî Droid Gamers‚úî ‚ÄúYou‚Äôve never seen an FPS for mobile quite as good as this. You will come back because the game experience is just topnotch.‚Äù ‚Äî AndroidCommunity‚úî ‚ÄúGuns of Boom is some solid, streamlined shooting that feels better than quite a few other mobile shooters.‚Äù ‚Äî 148Apps‚Ä¢ Easy and intuitive controls: pump your opponents full of lead from the get-go!‚Ä¢ Awesome graphics for immersive gameplay: stylish levels and cool animation will keep you glued to the screen!‚Ä¢ Autofire: all you need to do is get the enemy into your crosshairs.‚Ä¢ Dynamic battles: play on a team and rip your enemies to shreds! The more active you are in battle, the better your reward will be! ‚Ä¢ Various guns: 48 weapons to choose from, including machine guns, assault and sniper rifles, shotguns, and more. Each has its own unique ability: increased headshot damage, slowing down enemies, and even health leeching. Find a gun that fits your style of play!‚Ä¢ Explosive fun: free mobile shoot-outs that will leave your heart pounding! Gear up, soldiers!Soldier! You are one step away from action-packed combat! Can you keep steady aim under heavy fire and gun down enemies while grenades are exploding all around you? Can you handle that kind of fun?! Welcome to the game then! This ain‚Äôt no regular army, though. No one will tell you what to do or where to shoot. You have to make your own decisions and choose your own battles. Team up with other soldiers, get good at killing opponents and dominate the battlefield. Make a blitz attack, spraying lead in all directions, or try and shoot your opponent from a safe distance, taking your time to aim directly for the head. It's always your call.  Now, these wars won‚Äôt fight themselves! Get to the armory, gear up, and start making a BOOM! On the double!Guns of Boom is a hardcore multiplayer shooter with eye-popping 3D graphics and blood-boiling gameplay. It‚Äôs so simple that your cat can learn the controls, but the skill-cap is high enough to make even hardened FPS veterans break a sweat. Engage in online PvP battles on a variety of maps, utilizing different deadly guns, as well as frag grenades and med kits. descriptionHTML:
✔ “A brilliant multiplayer FPS that you should just go and play right now. 9/10” — PocketGamer
✔ “It’s so simple that your cat can learn the controls, but the skill-cap is high enough to make even hardened FPS veterans break a sweat.” — Android and Me
✔ “Guns of Boom has gone where no game has gone before – it’s a legitimately great shooter on mobile.” — Droid Gamers
✔ “You’ve never seen an FPS for mobile quite as good as this. You will come back because the game experience is just topnotch.” — AndroidCommunity
✔ “Guns of Boom is some solid, streamlined shooting that feels better than quite a few other mobile shooters.” — 148Apps

• Easy and intuitive controls: pump your opponents full of lead from the get-go!
• Awesome graphics for immersive gameplay: stylish levels and cool animation will keep you glued to the screen!
• Autofire: all you need to do is get the enemy into your crosshairs.
• Dynamic battles: play on a team and rip your enemies to shreds! The more active you are in battle, the better your reward will be!
• Various guns: 48 weapons to choose from, including machine guns, assault and sniper rifles, shotguns, and more. Each has its own unique ability: increased headshot damage, slowing down enemies, and even health leeching. Find a gun that fits your style of play!
• Explosive fun: free mobile shoot-outs that will leave your heart pounding! Gear up, soldiers!


Soldier!
You are one step away from action-packed combat! Can you keep steady aim under heavy fire and gun down enemies while grenades are exploding all around you? Can you handle that kind of fun?! Welcome to the game then!

This ain’t no regular army, though. No one will tell you what to do or where to shoot. You have to make your own decisions and choose your own battles. Team up with other soldiers, get good at killing opponents and dominate the battlefield. Make a blitz attack, spraying lead in all directions, or try and shoot your opponent from a safe distance, taking your time to aim directly for the head. It's always your call.  Now, these wars won’t fight themselves! Get to the armory, gear up, and start making a BOOM! On the double!
Guns of Boom is a hardcore multiplayer shooter with eye-popping 3D graphics and blood-boiling gameplay. It’s so simple that your cat can learn the controls, but the skill-cap is high enough to make even hardened FPS veterans break a sweat. Engage in online PvP battles on a variety of maps, utilizing different deadly guns, as well as frag grenades and med kits. Experience the ultimate competitive tension without leaving your couch!

Notice: Please note that Google ARCore, which is used in our game, may collect and process your data: www.google.com/policies/privacy/partners/

recentChanges: Try the new 60-120 FPS high-end gaming experience and our full-fledged eSports Spectator mode!
HIGH-END GRAPHICS
- Frame Rate settings ‚Äî enjoy the smoothest gameplay ever at 60 FPS on most devices and 120 FPS on Razer Phone
SPECTATOR GALORE
- New Spectator mode ‚Äî use 3rd person and top-down cameras to freely switch between players during matches
- Restrict Spectating in Private Matches to prevent stream sniping
- AR Spectator for Android is finally here!
BALANCE UPDATE
- Rebalanced 6 guns
summary: Explosive FPS with super easy controls and non-stop PvP action!
title: Guns of Boom - Online Shooter

Having fifteen kids, Per is a busy guy with enough on his plate, so he would appreciate your help.Match the Bilka items on the board and make them disappear. Play your way through exciting levels and lots of entertaining gaming time.Use your smartphone or tablet to play. As you play, you will earn points, which are exchangeable for real products at the Bilka Voucher Shop ‚Äì go get some candy, a piece of kitchen equipment, a nice bottle of perfume, or grab a delicious steak from the butchery.The Far til Femten game is free to use, but you can buy extra moves, boosters, and lives directly in the app.Features:*   Match 3 game design with lots of fun missions and features*   100 levels and 15 challenge levels. So far‚Ä¶*   Fun and entertaining universe, where the characters from the Bilka commercials, Per and Malene, will guide you*   Play your way through the levels in Per and Malene‚Äôs house: the hallway, the garden, the livingroom, the kitchen, the bathroom, and the wardrobe.*   Earn voucher points by playing, and exchange them for real products at BilkaFor more info, visit bilka.dk/fartilfjortenLike Bilka on Facebook and be sure not to miss out on news and great offers: facebook.com/bilkadkLike Pointvoucher on Facebook and receive game news and vouchers: facebook.com/pointvoucher.gamesCredits:Creative concept, storyline, illustration and graphic design by Wibroe, Duckert & Partners.Game production by Copenhagen Creators.
descriptionHTML:
Play your way to real products at Bilka.
In the Far til Femten game, you’re visiting Per and Malene at home, and you’re helping Per at Bilka, when he needs a hand with the grocery shopping. Having fifteen kids, Per is a busy guy with enough on his plate, so he would appreciate your help.

Match the Bilka items on the board and make them disappear. Play your way through exciting levels and lots of entertaining gaming time.

Use your smartphone or tablet to play. As you play, you will earn points, which are exchangeable for real products at the Bilka Voucher Shop – go get some candy, a piece of kitchen equipment, a nice bottle of perfume, or grab a delicious steak from the butchery.

The Far til Femten game is free to use, but you can buy extra moves, boosters, and lives directly in the app.

Features:
* Match 3 game design with lots of fun missions and features
* 100 levels and 15 challenge levels. So far…
* Fun and entertaining universe, where the characters from the Bilka commercials, Per and Malene, will guide you
* Play your way through the levels in Per and Malene’s house: the hallway, the garden, the livingroom, the kitchen, the bathroom, and the wardrobe.
* Earn voucher points by playing, and exchange them for real products at Bilka

For more info, visit bilka.dk/fartilfjorten

Like Bilka on Facebook and be sure not to miss out on news and great offers: facebook.com/bilkadk
Like Pointvoucher on Facebook and receive game news and vouchers: facebook.com/pointvoucher.games

Creative concept, storyline, illustration and graphic design by Wibroe, Duckert & Partners.
Game production by Copenhagen Creators.

comments: For a free game? I can't complain too much especially if i don't pay for it. The containers are actually a good addition to this game since you get containers for free. If you're lucky enough you can win a premium tank and those things are not cheap! But wargaming actually give them away for free. The event is impossible to finish if you don't pay with gold and to win a tank you must pay a huge amount of $$$. But for casual and f2p players? I think you'll enjoy it. It's a game guys, play for fun!

The game is good compared to the game i often play online. I could have rated this game all five stars. The controls for driving must have other options to choose from. And its not suitable for android phones that has 5 inches sreen display. My thumb keeps slipping off whenever i try to maneauver the  vehicle. On Pc's much more easier to handle using a keyboard and a mouse.

Hello. I love WOT and trying to play together witg my son. But we've chosen different servers (Europe & Russia) and now i cant find him in the players list to be able to join one platoon. I also cant connect to his server and he cant connect to mine cause system doesnt allow it. can you please suggest how we can join one platoon in this case? Thank you.

Best mobile game I've played, more fun than the PC world of tanks for sure. Only real complaint is that it takes up a lot of space on my phone... It's worth the investment in memory though. Make sure you're in a good wifi spot and have a portable battery and happy tanking

Not a bad game.  I'm a little sick of the unrealistic tanks.  Also the unrealistic play in some ways.  I wish there was a mode that limited you to real tanks of the same time period and had more realistic damage based on the weapons.  For example, I don't want to see the Dracula tank and the 88mm on my Tiger should blow a Sherman away in 1 shot at point blink range, not 6 shots...

Why is 6 of my team on one area while I am in the other. Because of this spawning system I died literally 5 seconds after the battle started. Great game though. Why is there so much lag. And why are my controls frozen. I move forward a  little and then I move 50 feet away from my spot. Fix this and then you get a big fat 5 stars.
description: Meet the legendary tank shooter. Join more than 90 million players! Fight in 7vs7 team battles alone or with friends, research and upgrade armored vehicles, try different tactics and win. Choose a tank and join the battle!GAME FEATURES‚Ä¢ A huge world of tanks. Witness historical vehicles and models from other popular universes face off on the battlefield. The game features more than 250 unique vehicles!‚Ä¢ Dynamic 7vs7 battles in different modes and in more than 20 game locations. Every battle is unpredictable: the outcome depends on you and your team.‚Ä¢ A well-developed progression system. Explore the full range of vehicles from Tier I light tanks to humongous Tier X heavies. Change guns, install equipment, apply camouflage‚Äîtune your vehicle to match your playstyle.‚Ä¢ Spectacular graphics that are automatically optimized for your device. Manual tuning helps find a balance between vibrant colors and high FPS.‚Ä¢ Team game. Create platoons with your friends or join a clan to fight with like-minded people, then participate in tournaments with prizes!To install the game, you need at least 3 GB of free space and an internet connection.For more information please visit http://wotblitz.com/
descriptionHTML:
Meet the legendary tank shooter. Join more than 90 million players! Fight in 7vs7 team battles alone or with friends, research and upgrade armored vehicles, try different tactics and win. Choose a tank and join the battle!

GAME FEATURES
• A huge world of tanks. Witness historical vehicles and models from other popular universes face off on the battlefield. The game features more than 250 unique vehicles!
• Dynamic 7vs7 battles in different modes and in more than 20 game locations. Every battle is unpredictable: the outcome depends on you and your team.
• A well-developed progression system. Explore the full range of vehicles from Tier I light tanks to humongous Tier X heavies. Change guns, install equipment, apply camouflage—tune your vehicle to match your playstyle.
• Spectacular graphics that are automatically optimized for your device. Manual tuning helps find a balance between vibrant colors and high FPS.
• Team game. Create platoons with your friends or join a clan to fight with like-minded people, then participate in tournaments with prizes!

To install the game, you need at least 3 GB of free space and an internet connection.


For more information please visit http://wotblitz.com/

comments: There is an issue that needs to be addressed. My game will kick me out without warning, even in the middle of making a move in-game. This has happened to me several times already and I'm passing thus information on. Please, King Games, investigate this immediately because I enjoy your games and would like to see this resolved. Thank you.

Update: HELP! now I can't do anything whatsoever with other people! I can't ask for lives or send them! It's getting frustrating when I can't even use the lives I've already been given! Why can't I send lives anymore?!  Thank you! For updating the game! I almost uninstalled this game cuz it was taking so long. Hello! Out of levels! Hurry up please! I enjoy the game, but I'm all caught up. I've been trying to up my scores just to have a reason to keep the game on my phone. So far so good. I just started today and I'm enjoying it! Thank you! More recently, I love it! I've been trying to find a game with the quality of King games in this category and no one is a good! Thank you!

Love this game! It's challenging, addictive and beautifully developed both visually and audibly.My complaints would be:   *Certain aspects of the game are not clear, with nowhere to reference. So certain occurrences just seem incidental and therefore don't allow you to fully strategize.   *There are no written rules or explanations to refer to. Additionslly, the game is not customizable. I was just assigned a random avatar (which I don't like) which doesn't appear adjustable.  *It also used my real name to identify in the game, even though I had already created one before registering to King Games. Worse, there seems to be no way to change this either.  If there is a way already developed to address these issues, please help!

I would've rated everything MUCH higher before I did the update. Now I can't play anymore. The words are too faint to see, and the game won't load properly. I LOVE this game, and REALLY want the bugs fixed so that I don't have to quit playing.

The last update was terrible, scores and progress so faint it cant be read, please do something about it, updated again today and it's worse than before can't play the game at all now, going to get rid of it

Very engaging & easy to learn. Bright explosive graphics that are smoothly animated. Great for all ages. Just the right amount of a challenge with levels increasing in difficulty. Practice makes perfect.  Some levels are easy but some are fairly difficult.

descriptionHTML:
Match your way through a cascade of bee-autiful garden levels in Blossom Blast Saga, a fun linker game from the makers of Candy Crush Saga and Farm Heroes Saga! Link flower buds of the same colors to make beautiful flowers blossom, and clear the flowerbeds before you run out of moves!

Match 3 or more flower buds to make the world bloom into spectacular colors. Connect more flower buds to set off a glorious chain-reaction and watch your score grow! Collect every flower and make your way through gorgeous garden levels in this colorful adventure game!

Blossom Blast Saga features:

Connect Flower Buds to make them grow
• Fun game with simple, casual gameplay that’s easy to learn but challenging to master
• Link flower buds in beautiful gardens filled with colorful graphics
• Connect 3 or more flower buds of the same color to link and grow your flowers
• Connect flowerbeds to get 'Awesome Blossom!' and ‘Flower Power’ game assists

Match and Link in a Colorful Puzzle Game
• Match and link beautiful flowers in over 600 colorful levels
• Blossom flowers in beautiful garden levels like Dreamy Meadow, Carnival Garden and beyond

4 Puzzle Modes
• Collect Flowers Mode: Connect flowers of certain colors in a sequence
• Bloom in Scoring Mode: Match 3 of the same colorful flowers to gain points
• Remove Weeds Mode: Link flowers surrounding weeds to remove them from the garden
• Big Flower Bud Mode: Link bigger flower buds with other flowers, or blossom nearby flowers

Collect Flowers with Friends and Follow Their Progress
• Connect to the Blossom Blast Saga leaderboards to watch your friends’ status
• Link your game between devices and unlock full game features when connected to the internet

Match your way through luscious garden stages, link beautiful flowers and connect with friends to share your experience. Play Blossom Blast Saga, the fun linker game where you collect beautiful flowers!

Download Blossom Blast Saga for free and have flower linking fun!

comments: After losing my game somehow, Gameloft found a way to re link me to my game and compensated my losses. That is more than any other game will typically do. And you don't need to spend to be competetive. If you can find you can win. Which to me is more fun than spending to victory.
S***s, everybody having multiple account - if the admins ensure there is no cheating. yes, its a awesome game to play on and game got stuck on 11% after the update.. and still not working

it could be a good game if you didn't have to spend cash for shields and teleports. They should be available in the alliance store . thats why the servers die. People get tired of rebuilding every time they sign on

Lot of Server issues these days. Game servers are down for 30 Hours in last 4 Days. Many friends lost their Accounts and suffered Huge loss. But support team doesn't helps when you have lost everything. They ask for screenshot....hahaha!!!

I just updated the game which fixes some minor bugs. But, Game stuck at 11% before updating & also after updating & it's become HABIT for me to see the Gameloft's March of empires: war of lord games SERVER PROBLEM. I am a Android mobile user, so, there must be a option of graphic quality change just to make sure that game runs smoothly, because I spend many months to grow & if big guys using PC version attacks, then I can't do anything because my game just freezes, lags & don't respond for some time. But the game is over for me as I loss so much. So, Gameloft launch a LITE VERSION FOR ANDROID USERS or there are huge chances of players who will leavethis game & already many left this game, as you can see the are many dead castles in each realm.

Please upgrade to more realistic graphics and gameplay like Age of empires 3. Think more innovative like Fort camps to protect capitals and much more is needed in regard to spies, make it more difficult to spy and gather info. Also the defenses should be given more importance cause some guys from all realms have huge armies and it's easy for them to break into castles, I prefer more options when it comes to defenses. You guys are doing great but more options the better.

descriptionHTML:
Brace yourself for an age of massive medieval war, where you will march over your rivals’ burning remains in an all-out quest to conquer!

Fortify your castle, forge an army and enter the ultimate MMO of global domination! But as your civilization grows, you’ll clash with ambitious powers, and only one king can claim the throne! Do you have the strength to unify the land under your banner? Or will you watch your kingdom crumble before you?

A KINGDOM IN YOUR HANDS:
• Dispatch armies, construct buildings, clash with barbarians, conquer territories and reshape the balance of power every day.
• Every inch of your realm comes to life with amazingly detailed graphics

CHOOSE YOUR FACTION:
• Choose to be a Highland King, a Northern Tsar or a Desert Sultan.
• Each army has a special advantage that emphasizes a unique playstyle, whether you prefer to quickly build up your kingdom, strike with charging knights or fiercely defend your civilization from invasion.

TERRITORIAL DOMINATION:
• Clash and conquer to grow your global influence daily.
• Unlock special powers and bonuses as more lands fall to your army.
• Fortify your defenses to ward off enemy invasions.
• Fight your way to the throne to become High King over the entire realm!

FORGE A CHAMPION:
• Choose a unique Champion – ranging from those as noble as knights or as merciless as Vikings – to lead your army and help build your kingdom.
• Find and craft equipment to boost your Champion’s skills.
• Command heroes and adventurers to set off on quests for treasures that will pave your path to the throne.

BUILD A THRIVING NATION:
• Build regional structures that you and your many allies can benefit from.
• Establish thriving Trade Centers, forge sacred Temples, and clash over Stockpiles of treasure.

TACTICAL MMO WARFARE:
• A wise king chooses battle formations carefully! Cunning tactics hold more power than massive numbers.
• Time your commands wisely to take advantage of the ever-changing seasons.

COMMAND A GLOBAL ALLIANCE:
• The Alliance management system makes it easy to organize with allies.
• Intrigue will pave your path to the throne as you craft schemes with other Alliances. In this MMO world, there’s as much to gain from helping as there is from betraying…
• Chat with players to forge friendships or verbally clash with rivals.

CLAIM THE SEATS OF POWER:
• Capture the five highly fortified castles that hold the Seat of Domain, Seat of Heroes, Seat of War, Seat of Order and Seat of Accord.
• Each Seat grants its controlling Alliance unique perks and the ability to propose world-changing Policies.
• Every player can take part, as all Policies are voted on by the entire Realm’s player population!
• Enter a new level of diplomacy and intrigue as your Alliance must negotiate with rivals, and players at large, in order to win the votes needed to pass the Policies you want.
• At the center of it all lies the Throne of Might, which only one player may rule to wield the greatest power of all!

Five castles hold the crucial thrones, each possessing a unique influence over the entire realm that only one Alliance can hold.


For fans of MMO strategy, Clan vs. Clan combat, epic quests, being king, and games of global domination.

Download it now and forge your path to the throne!

comments: I would give a full 5 stars on everything because I love this game! But I just got a new phone and the account was linked to my Google account and I can't access my character, whom of which, I spent a bit of real money on to make VIP 4. I emailed support and they told me what server my character should be on and she's still not there! It keeps prompting me to make a new character.

So the game glitched out and I lost graphics, no effects when using skills and what not. Other people in game said they had the same problem and said to fix it, you needed to uninstall it and redownload. Which I did. But now my characters are gone and I have to start off fresh. I've spent money in the game on  building up two characters. And I'm pissed now that it appears its money totally wasted. I feel that this is basically stealing!!

My skills didn't come out when I use it.. It didn't show effects when I click on it.. It still deal damage to the monsters though.. So I uninstall and reinstall it back..  however  the loading progress keep restarting.. I had to again..reinstall the game several times! And it still didn't let me complete the download.. It keeps restarting and resetting to 0%

Since updated my graphics have changed. I don't see special effects and  the cloud tasks when I try do them I can't see the flowers and my character glitches threw the floor. And I also lost a my character after logging out and back in again

This is the first game I ever played that u can have a wedding without paying using real money. I guess its a good thing. But else, why u have to take so much time for maintaince.... And it will be the best game I've ever play if u can add more outfit and character...
Was having good time. Went to log in today and said client error after small update. Now I've lost 3 level 40's and won't restore with my Facebook i used my account for...

descriptionHTML:
Daybreak Legends: Origin is a 3D MMORPG developed by a next-gen engine, it will grant you with great fluent combat and exquisite 3D graphics.

The game brings you seamless combat with thrilling blows and various combos! Various things keep you occupied in this game, such as various raids and duels, ranked matches, guild wars, warpet battles and dragon airfight.

●BACKGROUND●
The evil dragon comes, bringing disaster and war to the world. Only the legendary artifact can destroy the evil forces and retrieve light. In order to find the artifact and eliminate the evil, brave adventurers have embarked on a journey into the unknown.

●FEATURES●
- This MMORPG brings you Skywing System, Aerial Battles;
- You can fly freely in a stunning 720 degree panoramic view only in Daybreak Legends: Origin;
- Aerial Battles System takes your battle to the air, ground combat skills and effects will all be mapped to the aerial battles.

◆VISUAL FEAST●
- Stunning 3D graphics and combat effects
- 720 degree panoramic view
- Exquisite character art and design

◆DIVERSE GAMEPLAY●
- As a MMO ARPG, Daybreak Legends: Origin provides intense Real-time PVP&GVG battles
- Summon powerful warpets to battle epic bosses
- Start a romantic relationship and have fun with your friends based on the unique Marriage and social System.

◆PROGRESSION & CUSTOMIZATION●
- This MMORPG provides 4 classes – Puppeteer, Mage, Bounty Hunter and Warrior; and 243 skill combinations
- Customize your character with hundreds of Items, Equipment & Fashion System
- Pets & Mounts System improves your combat power

comments: I love this game. I only had one issue , and it was a small one. The fixed it in 24 hours an compensated me extra. I'm happy I wrote this after having the game for a few weeks. I truly can give this 5 stars cause I played it for weeks and have come across the different scenarios in the game. Thank you for your awesome customer service and great game!!!!

Great. But some of the bonus games for golf bucks are not winnable.  For example, long drive gets a longer required result each time you beat it.  I'm currently required to beat 415 yards which I am sure is impossible.  So why bother trying?

Got too allgegro madness. And got stuck with the no face cards. 14 cards is alot to get. In fairway blast the card suits stick until a new none face card comes up, or reshuffles them. I find with this game they dont stick when the next card is turned over. So your run ends. And the run cards you ave accumulated as returned back to one agan.

I have played and enjoyed this game just about every day for a year or more now.  For some reason and somehow, they've sucked the fun out of the game.  It used to be about playing and earning "golf bucks" to use for things like re- filling your golf bag with irons, etc.  However now, it's very difficult to "earn" those golf bucks, in fact, it's even harder to play the game.  Now you can go through a complete hole without having any cards that you can actually play.  Now it seems that all the game is about is paying for irons, etc., and/or watching advertising videos to obtain clubs.  Like I said, I really used to enjoy this game but now?  I think it's time to uninstall it and move on to something that is actually fun, not frustrating.  I'd rate this game as "0" now, if it were possible!!!

It's a fun game!! can keep you very entertained only thing that sucks is if you have it on PC or iOS there are way more features and it's way better than the Android version!!üò¢ So the side note is for the developers at Big Fish Games....... So I think we've all waited way too long it's time to step it up and come out with a greater Android version at least make it as good as the iOS version!!!!!?????

People will tell you that it's good for your brain or that it's fun, but that really isn't true, especially since it won't even allow you to turn off hints. Immediately after you make a move, you can't even think for yourself and try it alone. It's annoying. Don't get it. Go to a different solitary game.

descriptionHTML:
Add life to your card game in this solitaire classic with a twist! You’ll play on the fairway, but don’t expect to improve your golf swing. Simply play one card up or one card down from your draw pile, it’s that easy! Stay on par by removing the most cards in each hand. Your bag of golf clubs each represents a playable numbered card to use as part of your strategy. Make sure you look for the gold Midas Club™ which plays like a wild card! You can also use power-up cards like the shuffle, preview, and mulligan (undo move) to aide in your strategy. Expertly play through rough hazards, sand traps, and rain hazards when you get hazard power-ups. With a little patience you can develop the skills to play like a pro!

Fairway is Easy to Play!
❤️Simply play one card up or one card down from your draw pile, it’s that easy!
❤️Stay on par by removing the most cards in each hand.
❤️Fun (and funny) golf-themed game of solitaire! You'll play on the Fairway, but don't expect to improve your golf swing!
❤️Let Fairway take you away to the peace and serenity of a golf course and far away destinations with beautifully hand painted scenery.
❤️Use the News to easily navigate through fun events, daily rewards, and 3 game modes.
❤️The Fairway commentators will cheer you through your game with puns and wise cracks that’ll have you chuckling through each puzzle challenge.

Solitaire Card Game with a Twist!
♠️ Enjoy a fun events every day!
♠️ Your "golf bag" holds clubs that represent playable numbered cards.
♠️ Wild Cards are represented as gold Midas Club™
♠️ Use power-up cards like the shuffle, preview, and mulligan (undo move) to clear boards.
♠️ Expertly play through puzzling challenges; rough hazards, sand traps, and rain hazards
♠️ So many ways to get rewards! Stamp collections, Trophies, Tours, mini-games, events, playing streaks of cards, and daily gifts!
♠️ With a little patience you can develop the skills to play like a pro!

Love solitaire but want more? We’ve got it:
♦️ Over 1,000 courses and counting!
♦️ 3 game modes: Main, Daily, and Bonus.
♦️ Play as long as you like; no lives to limit your game play!
♦️ Thoughtfully designed for easy game play - NO squinting!
♦️ Daily Course mode features special themes, challenges, and rewards.
♦️ Stamps collections are hand drawn and reward you when you collect a set of four.
♦️ Enjoy fun mini-games like McDinko, Wild Shot, Long Drive Contest, and Gopher Derby.
♦️ Special Golf Bag holds your wild cards in the form of Midas Clubs and card replacements in the form of numbered Clubs.
♦️ The Great Shot meter tells you how many cards to play in a streak to get bonus cards and rewards!
♦️ Power Up your strategy for your next move! Use Preview to see your next 5 playable cards and Shuffle to mix up the cards on your board!
♦️ The Eraser allows you to replay a course hole to improve your course score!
Caution! Fairway Solitaire is a highly addictive card game!

Don’t get left in the rough, follow us on Facebook for more Fairway Solitaire news, fun, and games: http://www.facebook.com/FairwaySolitaire

Experiencing issues? Please visit https://fairwaysolitaire.zendesk.com

*By downloading this game you are agreeing to our privacy policy: http://www.bigfishgames.com/company/privacy.html; and our terms of use: http://www.bigfishgames.com/company/terms.html

comments: I love to play hold em, but it's just to hard to round up the posse for poker night due to simply getting older. Life takes everyone n different directions. Not too mention, having kids and getting married, doing the family thing. Don't get me wrong, I absolutely love living the family life with my wife and kids but I will always miss poker night with the fellas. Now that I have stumbled upon WSOP I have been able to invite all of the fellas to join and we can all play together still once again. THANK U!!!!

Seen to many players leave because of this. Players with over a billion in chips. Goes to a small table with players having 30k or 40k. Goes all in every hand and kills the table. Players ask him why he does it and not play bigger tables. His answer because game allows me to and I can knock out player after player. Regulate players if they have X amount of chips play on bigger tables. Let the smaller players gain chips and enjoy the game.

It appears that I have reached a certain point where my free play is being met with bot resistance. I've gained over ten million in one day and lost it all and more in suck outs. This game is super fun whilst the going is good, but I fear the algorithms are programmed to entice you to pay real money, which of course you'd have to be mental to do once you realise how loaded this game is. Play for free = fun

Win a bit and loose everything in a few hands...  Once you win a good hand, leave the table.  Dealer will not give a a chance.  After this review, I received an e-mail from the designer assuring me, that game is fair.  I have been losing several hands with pocket KK, QQ, JJ, and so for.  So I stand with my original review.   Win on a good hand and leave game.  Or else you will lose it ALL!

This is a good game , only prob I have is there seems to some hackers/botting which makes it a little hard to play. Now as far as some people's comments even if the  people with a billion chips come to smaller tables , if you all knew how to play you wouldn't have to worry about them taking your chips. Trust me the majority of them started out at low tables also having to have to fight the ones with more money. I have been playing this game for a few years and love it.  Like I said only problem I have is to many bots/hackers.

It would be better if they offered more free chips. Rather than bombarding us Every time we log in with there outrageous prices. Also a flush draw Every other hand and usually someone hits. Barely won a hand since the negative review also. Complete B.S game. I agree with all negative reviews here. 4.5 rating? Haha, most reviews are negative.  Done and done.

descriptionHTML:
A top 10 strategy game all around the world!
4.5 stars! A top-rated game!

Are you ready to step into the pit and punch someone? Your favorite Clash of Lords 2 Heroes are fighting in a free-for-all frenzy against a force of frightening fiends! Control the action and become the greatest warlord in all the land. To survive you’ll need wit, will, and we couldn't think of a word for strength but you get the picture. It's time to Clash!

Clash of Lords 2 is a strategy game with fun and innovative twists on the genre. Recruit over 50 Heroes and their mercenaries, build and defend a base, and fight alongside your friends in over 10 PvE and PvP modes! Get ready to Clash!

Game Features:
✔ You control the action! Activate Heroes’ skills in real time!
✔ Pair Heroes and Troops with our unique Mercenary system!
✔ Play it Your Way! With over 10 PvE and PvP modes, there's always something fun and different to do!
✔ Fight alongside your friends! Join a Guild, and clash with players from all over the world! You can even battle against players from different countries!
✔ Free to Play! Log in every day to win free Heroes and Jewels!

Note: This game requires an internet connection to play.
Visit our Facebook Fanpage at: https://www.facebook.com/clashoflords2

comments: I am only giving ABF a 3 right now. I have played ABF since the beginning of it's time. I feel as if the coin rewards are very slim in the higher leagues. I am a Diamond Star 4 and I feel as if the higher the level the higher the reward but, the rewards are all the same. When you work your way up you want to feel rewarded! If coin rewards increase in the higher levels so will my rating!!!!!

I would give it 5 stars, but they've changed a few things. It's now more difficult to earn coins for power-ups. So in order to win the tournaments, they've put people in the position of having to make purchases more often. Needless to say, I don't play as often anymore. I've also noticed that several of my friends don't play anymore either. Too bad, the game used to be a lot more fun.

Been playing this game for years. Loved it in the beginning.  Seems the lower I rate the game as they try to make easier for people that are not good.  the birds I throw are nearly useless a lot of times compared to playing the same game for a star 2 player I know. And now the game is crashing constantly. Wish I could sell the nearly 100,000 bird coins I have. Seems I won't need them.

Ok so when there is an issue that needs addressed, sometimes it take a couple of days for the tech people to get to it. But overall the game is awesome! This is the only game that I still play every day from the time I got a smart phone, which has been several years!

I love playing angry birds friends. I'm an adult woman and have played since they came out with the game. Scoring in first place many times. Recently there seems to be too much graphics and sometimes using plays from other games or other angry birds games. If people are submitting what they have thought out, please make sure it stays within original angry birds friends game. Some levels are too far out there.

descriptionHTML:
All of the classic bird-flinging, pig-popping satisfaction of the original Angry Birds game, condensed into bite-sized, competitive tournaments – each with 6 new levels. Challenge your friends and the whole world for a top spot on the leaderboards and in the global leagues. Then, challenge other players one-on-one in the Star Cup to earn incredible rewards.

– Themed tournaments! Look out for special tournaments throughout the year.

comments: Used to be r5 of a top alliance  have witnessed  members  spending over 10k dollars . The most pay to play platform I've encountered. If you can spare 100 ‚Ç¨¬£$ per month  minimum.  It can be the best fun ever. But it exponentially grows so you'll never hit the top without continual spending .  Miss all the wonderful peeps but refuse to be a whale or a cash cow .

Money grab. Unless you have $300 a week to spend on this never ending money pit, you will never go anywhere in this game. You can only get so far, then you a required to spend actual cash to continue playing. If you want to max out your base you better have DEEP pockets. This is not a joke, if you want to be a serious player, it will cost you around $300 a week just to keep up. Only the rich get anywhere in this game.

Mobile Strike has reset game.   Nothing below cyber troops are being supported , no RSS .   Also.  One cyber Titan can zero anything that has highest normal T52 troops and best bio titans...... without sending a commander Once u reach building level 1100 offered for less than 19.99 USDyou will have no access to packs less than $100 USD and no access to RSS for older troops

I use to have one of the strongest bases in MKST.. Mistress Vixen..nickname Vix.  Anyhow i have spent easily around $3,000 us dollar on this game. And one day my shield lapsed and I got zeroed after about 40 plus hits. I quit playing. I started back and spent  littke money cause I missed my alliance people I started to consider family after almost a year of play.  Anyhow now they came out with cybernetics and the packs for that are $99.00 everytime. I'm sorry this has went to far. This is a pay to play game 100%.

Lots to do to increase your power, tons of new buildings giving massive power boosts, just wait a little bit & you may get lucky with a $99 pack being reduced to $19. Make sure you have plenty of money for this game. If you don't have the money, then starting out new, you'll be at a stand still around HQ level 20 & commander level 50, with only increasing power by researching, training more troops, & building traps for your wall. This game has been slowing down a lot lately though, not sure if it's the game or my phone causing it.

U spend money to get ready for war.I think I am ready too go to cp and look at the other players base and think I am going to die. Their lvl and power are bigger than mine, so I spend more money an that still don't help for the event this game is starting to suck. My res base I have never spent no then on it and I have it Hq lvl 350 what is up with that. Helping a base who has not spent no money. Help the people who has spent money
description: Become an action hero like Arnold Schwarzenegger in the new game of modern war - ¬†Mobile Strike! Build a base, control the action, and test your elite troops against enemies on the battlefield! With cutting-edge assault vehicles in your arsenal this worldwide MMO game tests your ability to wage a tactical and intelligent war. It's not whose arsenal is bigger, it's whose arsenal is best! Design a customized base to reflect the kind of hero you want to be. Amass defenses to protect your base, or manufacture an arsenal unrivaled on the battlefield! In true MMO fashion you can join an alliance and bring to bear the benefits of a multilateral force as you dominate the action and become the Head of State in an entirely new kind of action game!‚úîJoin with millions of players from around the world‚úî Forge powerful alliances with elite players against formidable enemies‚úî Build and customize your base‚úî Engage with rogue war machines on the battlefield to collect items and experience‚úîTrain, level up and supply your commander with superior firepower‚úîUse modern combat vehicles, artillery, and strategic units‚úîCommand 4 military tiers consisting of 16 troop typesCheck out the elite new MMO Mobile Strike, a war game to end all war games!Privacy Policy: http://epicwar-online.com/privacypolicy.htmlTerms of Service: http://epicwar-online.com/termsofservice.htmlGame Page: http://epicwar-online.com

comments: Downgraded to 2 Stars from 5. You would think by signing into Gmail AND Facebook. The game would save progress. Especially since it does not state that the game will not save account. That it is locally stored in device. Weird being an online game. Got a new phone. Moved Date and Apps over. Erased to Factory setting. Logged in on new phone. No progress! Signed into Facebook and gmail. No progress! Submitted 3 Tickets on lost account. No reply! 2 Stars! Should at least let people know when signing in to Facebook and gmail it won't save progress. What's even the point in signing into those then? Spent money and lost progress!

descriptionHTML:
League of War: Mercenaries is an exciting war strategy game where you can make choices that have real impact and outcomes. Immerse yourself in this 3D war game to build your base, grow your army, and battle your way to victory.

3D battlefield mixed with a unique tug of war deck-based combat system, giving you an exciting tactical war strategy game that will keep you playing for days! Build a fighting force of extraordinary magnitude to wage war on corporations and nations. Take on hundreds of missions or compete with fellow Mercenaries to claim victory around the globe and enjoy the spoils of war!

In League of War: Mercenaries, players act as mercenaries, taking on military contractors that play out on the battlefield to claim victory around the globe. Upgrade your army with futuristic tech, battle your enemies, and come out on top in this tactical war.

= LEAGUE OF WAR: MERCENARIES FEATURES =

3D GAME - EXPERIENCE A LUSH 3D BATTLEFIELD
★ Battle your way through stunning 3D content, from your military headquarters to intensely fast-paced combat!
★ 3D war visuals with stunning, visceral combat that plays out in real time

WAR STRATEGY - YOUR CHOICES HAVE AN IMPACT
★ Build and strengthen your army with tanks, helicopters, infantries and more.
★ Strategize the units you use to ensure your victory on the battlefield
★ Advanced warfare tech will help you dominate your enemies and rule the planet
★ Strategy and tactics will make your army the strongest

REAL TIME STRATEGY COMBAT – UPDATE TACTICS IN REAL TIME
★ Tactical wars have enveloped the world. Battle for control in intense RTS combat!
★ RTS games challenge you to strategically configure and prepare your squad in a variety ways to counter sophisticated enemy units
★ Real time strategy combat challenges you to always stay one step ahead of your enemy

BASE BUILDING - EXPAND & UPGRADE MILITARY HEADQUARTERS
★ Build and upgrade the ultimate military HQ with sophisticated base building tools
★ Defend your base by leveling up your military fortress
★ Building games lovers will really enjoy this fast paced, action packed RTS

AMRY UPGRADES – BUILD A BETTER MILITARY
★ Armies are upgradeable so you can always utilize new tactics
★ Tanks, aircraft and more are at your disposal as you clash with enemies

UPGRADE MERCENARIES - CUSTOMIZE MILITARY UNITS
★ Upgrade & equip units with a vast array of technology for specific roles to defeat your enemy!
★ Build your army, from tanks to infantry, and put a personal stamp on your mercenaries
★ Mercenaries grow stronger as you gain new tech and tactics

ALLIANCE BUILDING - FORGE STRATEGIC ALLIANCES
★ Alliances let you bring your military might down on enemies
★ Online multiplayer - Create an Alliance and band together against enemy for powerful rewards!
★ Play with friends! Join your friends for deeper engagements and battle together

MULTIPLAYER MODE - TEST YOUR STRATEGY IN 2 PLAYER BATTLES
★ Defend your base and battle to be the best!
★ Multiplayer war breaks out across the world. Will you come out on top?
★ PVP combat challenges you to earn valuable loot by defeating fellow players in head-to-head battle!

Defense and offense are critical – which strategy will you use to conquer the world?

Battle to conquer the world with advanced warfare tactics and a powerful army of infantry, tanks and helicopters. Combat multiplayer opponents in PVP strategy games, build the ultimate base and lead your team of mercenaries to global domination.

Download League of War: Mercenaries and become King of the mercenaries!

Watch us on YouTube: youtube.com/MunkyFunGames

comments: I love all the Is-it Love stories, they're fun and a great distraction. My only complaint is that there isn't enough free daily energy! You only get a teensy bit of the story every day, which is maddening. There should be loads more ways to earn energy, especially like the mini games.

Matt seems like kind of an asshat in Season 2. She should just dump him. Could do way better. Like with Daryl perhaps? He obviously cares for her wayyy more than Matt does. Matt only has eyes for Lana. Like he says he loves our girl? I don't think so. I wish you could choose somebody else to date.

Energy is too short & there isn't anything other than a side game for 100 more points to keep you entertained. The app is basically a story with a couple of nice artistic pictures.  Way over priced. You can buy a book for less at Barnes and Nobles and still get twice the amount in content. The the amount of money they ask for engery in this game is ridiculous. Don't be silly  and spend money that you can do better with. Just play for free or not at all.

I think it's a good game but... Let's be fair you don't get to play for long each day before you run out of energy and have to wait 24 hours and even then it's only a few minutes play.... The lack of play time makes me loose all interest in what I believe might be a decent game

So. This is an addictive store. The main characters are very well thought out. A few Grammer error and hick ups in game play. Although this game can be expensive if you don't make the right choice. I had bought the same secret scene twice and it still asks me to buy it. This is the second time this has happened. All in all great game.

I find it aggravating that your energy goes down so fast. You get a few seconds of free play per day. I've paid to get more. But I can't and won't keep doing that when even paying for extra doesn't last long. üòí

descriptionHTML:
The second Otome Game (dating game) in our « Is it Love? » series, is now available in English.
Try out this brand new love game with a French Touch!

SYNOPSIS

For three months now, you’ve been working at Carter Corp a company founded by the mysterious R. Carter and based in New York.
You immediately get on well with your work colleague, Matt Ortega. A charming and sweet guy, who seems to always find words that make you smile. You feel extremely attracted to him and have set your mind on seducing him. But the moment you move up a gear, his brother steps in and his arrival may well change things...

This is YOUR story!

You are the heroine of this free scenario game! Beyond simply reading, the choices you make influence the story and its final outcome.
New stories and new chapters are regularly released allowing you to live the love story you’ve always dreamed of.

CASTING

Matt Ortega : graphic designer
Teasing, sensitive, creative, sporty.
25 years old, single, epicurean.
Distinguishing feature : Warm­hearted Bad boy.
Star sign : Scorpio.
“I know, I’m so bright that I light up your days”.

Daryl Ortega : Undisclosed.
Insolent, daring, passionate.
25 years old, single, audacious.
Distinguishing feature : Latino Bad boy.
Star sign : Scorpio.
“Each and every forbidden pleasure is worth living”.

Ryan Carter : Founder and director of the company.
Magnetic, charismatic, guiding, bright, intimidating.
28 years old, single, multimillionaire.
Distinguishing feature : Control freak.
Star sign : Sagittarius.
“Miss, there is nothing that I can’t have.”

Mark Leviels : Managing director of a company branch.
Intellectual, ambitious, calm, accessible.
28 years old, work addict.
Distinguishing feature : never without his smartphone.
Star sign : Libra
“Choosing means dropping something. I choose to devote myself to my job.”

Gabriel Simons : Manager
Outgoing, manipulative, insolent, tactile.
28 years old, single, “serial lover”.
Distinguishing feature : Uses his seduction asset.
Star sign : Leo.
“ I fought to get where I am. I know how demanding one must be.”

Cassidy Sparke : Human Resources manager
Cold, haughty, social climber.
25 years old, single.
Distinguishing feature : is very self­confident.
Star sign : Capricorn.
“I can ruin your career with a single snap of my fingers.”

Colin Spencer : programmer
Curt, terse, mysterious;
25 years old, single, somber.
Distinguishing feature : leader of a heavy metal group.
Star sign : Pisces.
“Hey.”

Lisa Parker : secretary
Gentle, sociable, competent, loyal.
24 years old, single.
Distinguishing feature : is always smiling.
Star sign : Virgo.
“On bad days, I look at my smiley post­it and it helps me smile.”

Fantastic illustrations.

The further you go in the Otome game, the more beautiful pictures you will unlock which will illustrate your romance!

But beware of the choices you make! They influence the unravelling of the illustrations and the unlocking of secret scenes! But no worries, you’ll still have the possibility of playing the game or a certain chapter again to unlock the pictures you might have missed!

And much more...

Discover the secret love stories, the new flirt stories and much more.

Follow us on Facebook simply by liking our page: https://www.facebook.com/Is.it.Love.Games.world and stay informed of all our updating news.

Any queries? Any questions? Contact our client support directly in the game’s Menu by clicking on Support or through our website: http://1492studio.freshdesk.com

Free Download

“Is it Love” is a free game. You do however, have the possibility of buying bonus points. You can deactivate your purchase possibilities through your device set-up.

Internet connection required, some additional fees may be applied.

comments: Nothing bad to say about the game... good balance of grind and pay to play styles. Best Mobile Experience ever!! So far, and I am a budding designer myself and I will keep this one as long as they support it and update it... Aces, review by Da1 G Reaper of the Sun Tzu Ghosts Gaming Community... #livfreeplyhard #STGGC

Good luck in this game if ya don't want to spend money. No game balancing meaning a lvl12 can attk lvl  1 with no post attk shield or protection of any kind. Got attk 12 times in a row by same player of higher lvl. Also If you have issues with game content good luck getting a good answer on that too.

Hi A.K server 52. Have been playing for couple of months now and still love the game.just when you think you are on top of things something new comes up. I personally like the challenge and new changes.for those who have not played this game before I would recommend it.  Very addictive. If you are going to spend money in this game spend wisely.
After last update, this game getting worst, score for pirate event has been reduced, and the pirate getting stronger.. fix it fast.. many player complaining about this Nick : Premi06 Server : 041

Please add more vessels like USS Carl Vinson, and enabled to play offline too. And please make no time limits to purchase for the new promotion with a cheap price such as new ships or aircrafts, when that happened I bet there will be more interesting. Thanks.

If you don't have money to burn then don't play this game. This game is the embidiment of the 'pay to win' phrase and would make EA look like a baby when it comes to that. Levels are easy to scale up in the beginning but as you cross level 10 through 20, you'd realise that without paying through your nose, you are just fodder for paying players. Don't be a sheep they'd like you to be. On top of that, the game is riddled with bugs and the developers are unresponsive, unless again you are a paying player. Do yourself a favor and Invest your time in another game.
description: The hottest free to play multiplayer war game of 2017 is here! Become an admiral of invincible navy fleets in the best 3D interactive strategy game of naval warfare. Build your naval base and lead your powerful fleet into countless epic sea battles. Grow stronger by forging alliances with friends and build an empire together. Wage war against pirates, sea monsters, and players from around the globe!  Fighting for world domination now in a mobile MMO!Enter a post-apocalyptic world engulfed by the ocean and thriving with pirate activity. Command the most iconic battleship, destroyer and aircraft to destroy your enemies in all out naval warfare! comments: Used to be five stars now 1.  FIX THE DOWNLOAD ISSUE WITH THE SPRING UPDATE!   Listen to your customers and at least acknowledge that you might be working on solving the problem.  Not responding at all is horrendous customer service.  Will be deleting the game shortly if not fixed.

Sometimes I would give it a five star other times 4 star. Good number of challenge keys per visit to none challenge sites. As few as two visits needed for one visit to challenge site in final level of challenge (requiring 25keys). Love the two modes for cards of fate. No time limit but fewer tries works great if you write down what you find. It surprisingly has improved my timed play of this mini game. There are getting to be too many items and NO search functions to facilitate where to find a particular item, what collection items belong to if someone wants it and you don't want to send it anonymously (case if you send a requested item) and don't send it from the gift bar. One of the better hide and find games.

I changed my previous rating. There are so many glitches, especially with new events  and support doesn't respond to requests. I haven't gotten totem bonuses for three days and new event is nearly impossible at times to find bunnies and objects. This used to be my "go to" stress reliever but now it just creates more stress.

Instead of relaxing me this game stresses the hell out of me. New bunny location is extremely hard to find the üêá. And the time limit is too short. I know im wasting my time writing this cause I've seen a lot people complaining about it and nothing is been done. Will be unistalling if it doesn't gets fix. Good day

The main complaint is that some tasks have insanely short timers, like for the new event where you have to find optionnal stuff that's really well hidden as well as the usual pack of items that usually takes the whole timer to find. Great game, bases itself too much on money dropping.

The only thing I don't like about the game is that by the time you search a couple of places (depending on ur level) is how long you have to wait to get enough energy up to search again. Depending on what you want to search it can take up to an hour or more to get the requirements. Other than that I really like the game.

descriptionHTML:
#1 MOST POPULAR HIDDEN OBJECT GAME IN THE WORLD!

Get ready for a journey unlike any other!
Mirages of an unknown city have been seen around the world. Is it real … or a hoax? While your detective agency is busy gathering information, your friend is dragged into the phantom city by black smoke. The only one who can save him, you must now enter the strangest place you’ve ever been … where magic, witchcraft and science work together, imagination turns real and weird creatures wander the streets. All around there are people and things gaining unusual abilities and a black smoke that seems to be alive, bringing with it enigmatic artifacts, secrets and dangers.

In order to rescue your friend and solve these unexplained phenomena, you will need to fulfill risky quests, explore dungeons, research amulets and get help from friends. Unravel the many mysteries of Shadow City as you fight monsters, confront a cult and rid the city of a horrible evil!

While this game is absolutely free to play, you have the ability to unlock optional bonuses via in-app purchases from within the game. You may disable in-app purchases in your device settings.

● 41 eerie locations to search
● Over 2968 quests to complete
● 430 collections to piece together
● 33 distinctive characters to meet
● 15 monsters to battle in mini-games
● Play with your friends to fight the evil together!
● Regular free updates with loads of new content
● Google Play game services support
______________________________

COMPATIBILITY NOTES: This game performs best on high-end smartphones and tablets.

comments: I'm not a fan of mobile gaming, but this game is truly something else. I love The Walking Dead, so I gave this a shot, however, after playing Road to Survival (or whatever it's called- it's the TWD game based off of the comics), my expectations were pretty low. This game though, is not Road to Survival; it's so much more. This is how you do a free to play game with microtransactions right. You can buy a lot in this game with money, but you can easily obtain everything on your own, and quite frankly, it's more fun to do that anyways. This game is super addicting and gives me something fun to do when I've got a few minutes. I've been playing it for months, and I don't plan on stopping anytime soon.

Just a suggestion, it'll be SO MUCH MORE AWESOME probably 10 stars for TWD fans if you could do better missions or events that allow us to get better opportunities to farm for TWD character tokens or class tokens, and also more chance for farming or creating weapons instead of the current set up now. Don't quite like the fact that when deals are awesome but they cost a ton! Try lessen the value a little bit and im sure some players dont mind spending (just my opinion). But overall review, its awesome for TWD fans out there!

It's got good action in graphic. Been playing for a 2 years in 10 month's now.Stay human and Survive.  Up dates all the time love it keep them coming Robert Cregman. Thanks for making the Walking  dead show And game. New stuff to do all the time. In wow all these new survivers. There are some loading issues action issues movement issues alot more mission.

Originally gave you 4 stars, but its one of only a couple of mobile games I have never deleted since installing. Constant content coming in, great use of TWD licence! Keep up the great work- seriously from someone who hates most mobile games!
I've been playing for over 2 years. A few more new maps would be nice and stop nerfing our great traits like interrupt and wrestler! Other than that, great game and great community.
Really good strategy game. The thing that lost it the 5th star is that when I started a second game on another device, it won't play ads for free stuff

descriptionHTML:
Celebrate Spring with our limited-time offers!

Play now with Daryl, Rick, Michonne and many other characters of AMC’s The Walking Dead! Collect Heroes through radio calls and unlock special abilities and valuable leader traits. Complete Episode 1 for free Daryl tokens and unlock the first Hero of your team!

The Walking Dead: No Man’s Land is a thrilling, action-packed RPG where tactical choices make the difference between life and death. Only the strongest will survive so choose your team wisely: bring Michonne and dominate in close-quarter combat or send Rick to dispatch enemies from afar. Or perhaps you’ll choose to snipe from a distance with Daryl’s crossbow, or mow the herd down with Abraham’s assault rifle.

• FIGHT through hordes of deadly enemies in tactical turn-based combat
• COLLECT and upgrade your favorite characters from AMC’s The Walking Dead
• CHOOSE the right team and the equipment for each mission
• HUNT walkers in Terminus, The Prison and other familiar locations from AMC’s The Walking Dead
• JOIN other players in deadly weekly challenges and PVP combat for exclusive rewards

“Throw in some pretty swish graphics, lovely animations and blood splatters, and you have one of the most carefully fleshed out zombie games we've seen on mobile. It looks lovely, and plays great too.” - Pocketgamer

“Each aspect of survival on AMC's The Walking Dead has been parallel to the series' official mobile game, subtitled No Man's Land.” - Mashable

“Imagine your favorite mobile base-building strategy game, mix in a dash of XCOM, and then paint on a fresh coat of AMC’s The Walking Dead. That’s No Man’s Land in a nutshell.” - Gamezebo

For more, please visit:

comments: Well after playing all the battleships games on Google play store I must to say that his one is the best of all. The game have the best graphics, the best gameplay and one of the most important things in my opinion there is a lot more ships and different types of ships than the other games. So if you enjoy playing games about battleships I recommend you to play this one instead of the others. The only negative thing that I found is the lack of ships in some countries except for Japan and USA, it would be great if they add all ships that are present in the PC version.

Excellent Game overall. Good graphics and controls (once you get used to how a ship moves) feels very real. Gameplay is fair but challenging and is addictive when trying to LVL up. Costs are reasonable but bonus cold be higher for premium account when compared to console prices. Customer service very good. I had a loading issue and advice was prompt and issue is resolved. Would edge about 4.7 out of 5 for me.

Fun game at first and got all the way to a tier V battleship!! It was fun until I started going against OP destroyers. I can broadside that tiny ship two of three times but it doesn't matter. Couple of torps and down I go. They move faster than i can track. Will be going back to Battle of Warships.

The game in general is great but torpedoes are just too powerful. I can't even hit the destroyers with their speed but now with their infinite torpedo supply that always seems to reload faster than my guns I can't even stand a chance? No fun at all. If anything you should follow battlestations Midway and Pacific. They're models completely balanced everything. Torpedoes were powerful there but they took awhile to reload and were finite. Thus you couldn't just spam. If you missed you lost out and had to do it the old fashioned way. Either nerf torpedoes or buff BBs cause otherwise it just isn't fair.

Very well executed port of a good game. Mostly sane monetization. The only problem I see is the premium price. In desktop version it is slightly less than 10$/month which is on the cheap side for MMO and makes a very good proposition. Mobile version is almost 30$/month which is frankly too much. I may consider 10$, or even 15$ per month (same as AAA MMO games on desktop with a ton more content), but not twice the price, especially for a mobile time killer.

Please give us the option to disable Auto Target Tracking in settings.  The auto tracking can cause you to fire at ships your not wanting to target, especially if there lined up side by side. And cause your shots to fall way short or too far if the enemy ship is coming straight towards you. If love to have the ability to disable this feature in the settings.
