comments: Extremely addictive! First day I played I overshot my bus stop by 5 minutes because I forgot to look up.  There is always something to do in the game somewhere - and the micro transaction bit doesn't feel forced, and you can easily progress without it.  It kept me occupied for days - unfortunately I had to delete it because I got too caught up.  So if you're looking for a game to grab your attention and keep you entertained on long commutes and the like, this is great for that

Fun little game, but I would love for food, and water, to be a little bit faster. Also maybe rise up the rush chances. I do have 1 suggestion, maybe when the people off to the Waste Lands, they can find some rare stuff, like gems or maybe clothes/weapons. This game is really fun, even though I've just started it, keep up the great work! üëçüèΩ

I figured my old ass phone wouldnt run this game when first announced, just confirming for folks it sure doesnt. I thought there might be a chance it would cos my phone is rooted and I have full control over how my ram is utilized. Thank bob for android emulators on desktop, can't wait to play :)

Look, I can kind of understand dwellers not dropping their assignments to fight raiders, but can we have the ability to assign fighters to the raiders themselves. It's a massive and unnecessary pain to constantly remind my few armed dwellers to actually fight the raiders instead of just looking cute in the room they just left. Weapons are scarce in this game, and raiders move too often to play pass the gun. It would also be nice if there was a pause feature, but that would reduce the butler-bot purchases.

Fantastic! A resource management sim that is incredibly fresh and charming thanks to the richness of the Fallout franchise. Keeps you coming back for hours. From the quirkiness of the dwellers to the depth of the side quest system, this game is deserving of your time. Finally, the game is totally playable without paying. Still, throw the devs a few bucks! You'll sink hours into this title.

Absolutely love this game. If you're a die hard fallout fan, or even someone new to the series this is the perfect game for you. You'll get a sense of nostalgia pulling your first legendary dweller, or a sigh of relief when you obtain that last part for the weapon you've been looking to craft. Fallout Shelter is the perfect mobile game for any fan of the series. The game is slow and hard in the beginning but when you get on your feet you'll never want to put it down. If you're on the edge about downloading it please do, it's worth all the time and space!

descriptionHTML:
** Google Play Best of 2015 **
Mobile Game of the Year - 2016 DICE Awards
Winner 2015 Golden Joystick Best Handheld/Mobile Game

"Might just be the best free-to-play game out there" - GamesBeat
"Probably the best game of E3 2015” – Gizmodo
"Fallout Shelter is simple to play and addictive as hell." - GameZone

BUILD THE PERFECT VAULT
Create a brighter future…underground! Select from a variety of modern-day rooms to turn an excavation beneath 2,000 feet of bedrock into the very picture of Vault Life.

OVERSEE A THRIVING COMMUNITY
Get to know your Dwellers and lead them to happiness. Find their ideal jobs and watch them flourish. Provide them with outfits, weapons, and training to improve their abilities.

CUSTOMIZE
Turn worthless junk into useful items with Crafting! Customize the look of any dweller in the Barbershop.

PROSPER
A well-run Vault requires a variety of Dwellers with a mix of skills. Build a Radio Room to attract new Dwellers. Or, take an active role in their personal lives; play matchmaker and watch the sparks fly!

EXPLORE THE WASTELAND
Send Dwellers above ground to explore the blasted surface left behind and seek adventure, handy survival loot, or unspeakable death. Find new armor and weapons, gain experience, and earn Caps. But don’t let them die!

PROTECT YOUR VAULT
From time to time, idyllic Vault life may be disrupted by the dangers of post-nuclear life. Prepare your Dwellers to protect against threats from the outside…and within.

Vault-Tec has provided the tools, but the rest is up to you. What are you waiting for? Get started building your Vault today for FREE.

comments: Nice game but the random number generator is non existent. Hold three numbers and roll again, even with free or earned additional rolls, are ALWAYS the same number that was there! This would fail state regulations on gambling games. Fun but a sucker game for rolling anything that counts as statistically random

This is fun, IF you can figure it out. I like playing yahtzee but this is complicated. Every time I get extra dice, the ???? spends them or takes them away from me so I don't get to spend them the way I want to. That sucks.

Love the game! But recently did an update for the app now my game glitches out. Takes forever to roll the dice. Only updated the app cuz it said they fixed bugs & made faster well it did the opposite for my app.

Showdown is a joke!  100% guarantee opponent will get a double Yahtzee every single game.  Their average score is 320+ when a normal person scores 250-275.  Impossible enough to score a Yahtzee yourself but double is almost unheard of.

Playing verse your friends is fun but Playing against the computer is not fun but a complete waste of time. Only way to Win is to Extra rolls with the Dice you have to buy. If you don't plan on losing 2/3 of the time.
The game was awesome until the ads started to pop up every 5 seconds, and the game progressively got slower and slower. Now it's just ads upon ads and lag. Game got ruined quick.

descriptionHTML:
Blast into a new Angry Birds puzzle adventure game! The birds are trapped inside balloons, and you can bet the pigs are behind it all. Tap matching balloons to blast them to smithereens and free the flock!

Use your balloon-bustin’ skillz to outsmart the pigs and save birds in over 600 egg-celent levels! Find the smartest way to solve puzzles, crack high scores, and earn three stars.

Grab rewards every day in the Daily Quest. Already got ’em? Then go join the weekly events or chase down this month's puzzle pieces. Blasted through those? How about taking on the world in the global leaderboard?

There’s plenty to do, and an ever-growing number of levels to master so get BLASTING!

Features:
· 600+ FUN LEVELS – with more added weekly!
· PICK UP AND PLAY – any time, any place even OFFLINE!
· TEASE YOUR BRAIN – with challenging & strategic gameplay!
· CREATE BOOSTERS – rockets, bombs, laser guns!
· DAILY CHALLENGES – earn free rewards and boosters!
· WEEKLY EVENTS – Mighty League, Treasure Hunt and more!
· PUZZLE CHASE – find pieces to new puzzles every month!
· PLAY WITH FRIENDS – connect to Facebook, yo!
· GLOBAL LEADERBOARDS – earn your spot with high scores!


----------------

Need some help? Visit our support pages, or send us a message! https://support.rovio.com/

----------------

Angry Birds Blast! is completely free to play, but there are optional in-app purchases available. Either way, you’ll have a blast! Get it? I’ll see myself out...

comments: I have really enjoyed this game from the first week it dropped. Never spent a penny. Most things I can compete in. What players say about pay2play is true though.  If you want to play at the highest level you HAVE TO PAY! There is a very clear pay wall and everyone knows it. If your starting off and your free to play it will take you awhile and I don't even think it will be work it unless you plan to put at least 6 month in to be somewhat relevant.

Stop doing these tutorials that force you to select their options, if I need a tutorial I'll use the tutorial, if I want to just play the game and figure it out along the way let me do that.   I'm so sick of these games that don't give you any option. Is there anyone that likes tutorials that are done like this?

Pros: ‚Ä¢ Semi-Balanced pvp. ‚Ä¢ Tons of characters. ‚Ä¢ Fun leveling system. ‚Ä¢ Entertaining in-game events  ‚Ä¢ Challenging story mode. ‚Ä¢ No need to pay to become very strong.  ‚Ä¢ Auto-battles that save time.   Cons: ‚Ä¢ Constant Pop-ups reminding you to purchase loot boxes. ‚Ä¢ You will get wrecked by serious pay-to-wins. ‚Ä¢ Impossible drop rates for 5‚òÜ characters and Chaos/Order heros. ‚Ä¢ Paying to unlock 5‚òÜ heros that may or may not be 5‚òÜ. ‚Ä¢ The company spamming copy pasted messages to players who have beef with thier game instead of constructive replies.  Overall: Still a pretty cool game.

A game with buckets of potential, led astray by poor decisions & short term constant cash grabs(multiple times a week)  Poor balancing - stat accensions, Crown dust upgrade costs ( when even  avip 10+ lvl60 developer acc hadn't upgraded any crowns..I've checked dozens of high vip lvl 60s 0 upgraded crowns) 6* artis are pointless & don't feel worth owning.  Constant pop ups, easily 40-50 store pop ups per day sometimes multiple times within a minute.  the Lucky 7 quest was criminal, horrendous design & I won't be spending a penny with you guys again until I see you go down a better path.   the positives, autoing but being able to leave the game. Festival/ hero events are pretty damn good although it be nice to see different style events that 'have gameplay'  Characters are well designed & are extremely fun to use.   To summarise, has some excellent features but it's let down by some horrendous balancing & constant cash grabs that would get EA taking notes.
It's dank and my homies love to rekt fu's. Try and stay away from me.. tang tang

descriptionHTML:
Welcome to Alliance: Heroes of the Spire, the latest action-packed RPG! Collect powerful Heroes and create the perfect superhero team. Gather your Alliance to challenge fearsome enemies, develop cunning strategies, and clash with other players to prove your strength!

Alliance: Heroes of the Spire is available in 7 languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Portuguese and Russian.

Meet players on our official forums: alliance-community.rumblegames.com/forums
Like us on Facebook: facebook.com/alliancegame
Follow us on Twitter: twitter.com/Alliance_HOTS


Collect and Upgrade:
● Over 400 unique Heroes available to build your ultimate team
● Craft Heroes to continue expanding your collection
● Ascend your Heroes to unlock strong new Skills
● Skill Up your Heroes to make them more potent in combat
● Choose from 19 unique Equipment sets which provide bonuses to your Heroes
● Combine Equipment sets for epic bonuses
● Socket Jewels to make your Equipment even more powerful


Fight!
● Continue your battles when you are away from the game with Offline Battle Mode!
● Face off against the elements of Fire, Water, Nature, Order, Chaos, and Shadow
● Optimize team strategy based on Hero Skill synergies
● Explore countless Rifts and claim their treasure
● Defeat mythical boss encounters for legendary rewards
● Conquer other players in the Arena and Tournament


Hero Events:
● Fight Heroes from many worlds for a chance to secure their allegiance and summon them to your Barracks
● Progress through Hero Event Rifts to try your hand at obtaining the most powerful Heroes in all of Fracture
● New Heroes released each month!


Alliance War:
● Battle against two other Alliances to seize control of territory
● Hold your position on the battlefield to earn Banners for your Alliance and secure victory
● Earn rewards for your entire Alliance - the higher you place, the better the spoils of war!
● Climb through the ranks to fight against the toughest Alliances in Fracture


Co-op Dungeons:
● Grab an Alliancemate and take down the strongest bosses in Fracture together
● Challenge yourself to conquer higher floors of the Co-op Dungeon for better rewards!
● Equip your Heroes with Crowns and Crown Jewels to boost their strength further


Social:
● Join an Alliance, or create one of your own
● Level up your Alliance to unlock additional benefits for all members
● Share your latest strategies and Hero builds with other players
● Challenge Alliancemates and friends to PvP duels
● Make new friends across all of Fracture!

1875 South Grant Street, Suite 110
San Mateo, CA 94402

summary: Collect and upgrade a team of powerful heroes
title: Alliance: Heroes of the Spire

comments: Do not spend any money on this game. This used to be one of the best slot games until the developers got greedy. Payouts are small and events are nearly impossible. They try to make it all sound good but it's not. They also changed the customer service on here where it's hard to get anyone. You cannot message them on Facebook if you have a problem and if you say anything negative about the game you will be blocked. Hope this review saves some of you some time so you can find a better game!

What the hell kind of question is that?  "Is it beautiful".... meaning the game! HOW NOT PERTAINING TO ANY GAMES!  Anyway,  this game is hands down the best Slot game EVER!  Have played slots in and out of casino's for over 20 years and this is the one to play! A huge variety of Casino games,  easy to maneuver and a lot of really nice people.

I used to love this game but something they did changed it. Winning is nearly impossible even if you are a paying customer. I know it is a game of luck but when you purchase 85 silver tickets you should be able to complete puzzles when you only need 1 piece for each of them. Make winning a little easier and people will be happy to spend money.  I think the game is broken. I was just playing in a room on Billionaire with a person who was playing on Huge Casino. I know it's the same developer but I don't think that is supposed to happen. I know the person was playing Huge Casino because it was my husband playing it. May want to look into it.

Customer relations are horrible even non existent. If you spend money you will lose far more than you win, in their eyes you will spend even more. If you send a message they will hide behind a canned "industry standard" response. This is not a free standing casino there are no freebies and you can't collect any winnings. Yet they have their games dialed in so you lose in hopes you will spend money. Horrible company.

I just started this account in hopes of recovering my lost one. If it goes smoothly, I am happy with the app to date. The slots don't pay as much as they used to, a little tite , otherwise a fun app. The events they choose for you to play, daily, do steal a lot of chips. If u want to remain in a successful club, you must do them, is the main downfall. I would recommend it to my friends.

This is an interesting game. After I played it for awhile it became very boring. Haven't gotten a big or any good win for the past 70 million. I guess if you buy chips you might win more often. It doesn't give you all the bonuses, and it takes gifts and doesn't give them to the gamers you gave it to. So all in all it's just okay. I've never been able to get anywhere with their support team as they added to my reply. I'd give it a one star but if you buy chips it might be better.

➤ Nyt & Friskt Look: Hvis du kan lide at spille brætspil og puslespil, vil du elske den rene og friske BRÆT-GRÆNSEFLADE ved første øjekast.

➤ Overraskende Bonus: Log ind hver dag og få daglig bonus. Optjen mønter når du har fundet de Ekstra Ord, som ikke findes på brættet.

➤ Over 3.000 Spændende Udfordringer: Det er nemt i begyndelsen og bliver hurtigt udfordrende. Test hvor mange ord du kender. Flere baner er på vej.

➤ 100% Vanedannende Ordleg: Du vil aldrig opleve et kedeligt øjeblik! Spil dette krydsordsspil én gang og du vil ikke kunne lægge det fra dig!

- Tryk på knappen “Tips” for at få hjælp

DOWNLOAD nu, træn din hjerne og bliv en ægte mester i ordleg på BRÆT!

comments: Keeps locking up with a white screen and doesn't go to the spinner.  Also last few days the helpful hints had gone away.  They need to get rid of excellent flashing on screen.  You'll be in s timed level and you lose time because you can't see under the words.  Some levels its ridiculous to have to do them 15 times to pass it

I think there is difference between hard to solve or impossible. To get diamonds in order you should be able to get them. As example. Need to get circle first then triangle. But you cant get triangle unless circle is moved first. And mission failed because you didnt get diamonds in order. This is repeats over and over again. This is impossible to solve. I even had to deal with triangle being right down at the bottom. And all other diamonds at the top. I failed of cause. I am giving my view because I fed up with this stupid idea.

I really love this game. But expeditions are more fun then the game itself. I really wish we could actually finish the expeditions instead , of not getting to finish the story behind them. Also during the expeditions to buy things are way to expensive because the amount of maic it takes to remove one item. Pls address these issuea. Really hope to see some expeditions we can really have fun and finish with.

I love the expedition part but not enough time to complete them. Also i cut one tree down and have to wait an hour to cut another. Its takes to much magic to clear paths.Its hard to build the bridges and stuff because of this. Other then that i have no problem with it.

Love the different puzzle styles that go along with the basic mahjong matching game. It gives an extra challenge to completing each game. Sadly I have only gotten to 250 levels after a year or 2 of playing because the puzzles are constantly rigged to lose. I am not a cash player as I have more important living expenses to spend money on so buying power ups and such are not an option for me. Would be great if there weren't so many losing games one after the other. I'm referring to the ones where you get to the last couple of tiles and the gems needed are at the very bottom so you are made to match the 4th set of gems when you are supposed to match the 3rd set first. I get multiple games where the matching tiles are stacked on top of each other so it requires a shuffle to win. As I said I am not and refuse to cash shop on a game that is not worth spending money as it is not a necessity so it would be nice to be able to progress without 10-15 losing games in a row. The spinning wheel doesn't always have ads available and I rarely get power ups from it. I mainly get paws.

Game updated now havent a clue what i need on level 421 and objects i need are blank boxes can play game but dont know what i need if any one can tell me object amount and what levels they are on it would be a help. Also have uninstalled game a installed it again but still dosnt help.
description: Explore an epic mix of original mahjong and exciting quests across the Magic Lands!    Mahjong Treasure Quest is not only about matching tiles. For your unforgettable gaming experience we spiced it up with brain-teasing puzzles and fun riddles, exciting expeditions and challenging quests. You'll never be alone: little Sophie and her loyal cat Oliver will lend color to your journey.You're about to:‚Ä¢  Enjoy 2¬†000+ fascinating layouts;‚Ä¢  Solve captivating quests and puzzles;‚Ä¢  Clear your way from one land to another, getting rid of whimsical plants and building magic portals;‚Ä¢  Collect rare artefacts and gems;‚Ä¢  Restore and decorate your awe-inspiring family estate;‚Ä¢  Set free the enchanted cats;‚Ä¢  Have fun playing with your friends and family.More features you‚Äôll treasure:‚Ä¢  Regular game updates with new characters, levels, and quests;‚Ä¢  Special bonus levels, timed quests, exclusive tile sets;‚Ä¢  Amazing community and support;‚Ä¢  Ability to play offline without losing your progress.
descriptionHTML:
Explore an epic mix of original mahjong and exciting quests across the Magic Lands!

Mahjong Treasure Quest is not only about matching tiles.

For your unforgettable gaming experience we spiced it up with brain-teasing puzzles and fun riddles, exciting expeditions and challenging quests.

You'll never be alone: little Sophie and her loyal cat Oliver will lend color to your journey.

You're about to:

• Enjoy 2 000+ fascinating layouts;
• Solve captivating quests and puzzles;
• Clear your way from one land to another, getting rid of whimsical plants and building magic portals;
• Collect rare artefacts and gems;
• Restore and decorate your awe-inspiring family estate;
• Set free the enchanted cats;
• Have fun playing with your friends and family.

More features you’ll treasure:

• Regular game updates with new characters, levels, and quests;
• Special bonus levels, timed quests, exclusive tile sets;
• Amazing community and support;
• Ability to play offline without losing your progress.

comments: Top tier player here, I've been enjoying the game greatly for the most part. My biggest issue would be that energy takes years to recharge. If it was shortened to one or two minutes to Regen one energy then that would be amazing. Another issue I have is that I think all players should receive one SSR when they complete the tutorial. I have a whole team of them, but others aren't so fortunate. Thanks for your time, if one or both of these are changed I will rate this 5 stars!

In short, games got amazing potential. Amazing manga-like visuals? First I've seen for an app. However, they NEED to make the d*$&m game more F2P so the player base is more welcoming, how TF is it you can ONLY get Pandora at VIP 8?!..   Also, many-many other great games do offer lifetime gem login purchases.   Just saying. ;)

Nice. They added new characters. I'm waiting for Namida, Brandi and Sora's SSR forms, hope they come soon. There's one problem I'm having with the recent update though. I can't play Soul Towers Battle in Special Trials because my phone keeps crashing. The gameplay in other areas are running smooth, only the Soul Towers Battle causes my phone to crash. Fix it please...

I really loved the gameplay and the characters, but then all of my dadta got lost and i had to start from the begining. I made it so far within the story and leveld up my characters so much. Grinded for a few hours to get the materials and money i needed. It was all for nothing. Fix this bug pls. Hope this doesnt happen to your account

Not so much a review, but I can't figure out how to unlock the last two outfits.(Gal.cat and the blue yakata). Any help much appreciated. Cannot find guides anywhere. Is this game p2w? Somewhat but you can unlock everything without paying.

It's just a pay to win game. I'm very disappointed for the energy bar... I need 13 hours and 36 minutes to recharge to full at this point. Difficult to upgrade characters and their skills and everything you want to do you must pay. As a game (idea) awesome but unplayable if you can't afford it

Popular manga game among Asia now available worldwide!

At that moment, mankind's place in the food chain would be forever changed. No longer was he the custodian of the Earth, but a food source for a new strain of zombie mutations. Yagita, saved from becoming zombie grub by the mysterious girl Pandora, begins to awaken an unknown power from within. Yet the global mutation has just begun, little do they know that the biggest threat in the history of the human race is about to unfold.

Features:

Become part of the original Manga!
Uncover the mystery of the zombie plague infecting Sacred Academy in a game that closely resembles its Manga origins. Who needs to read a million words when a picture speaks a thousand?

Your personal Pandora!
Open Pandora’s wardrobe for dynamic interactions with your favorite adorable assistant. Not only is there a large variety of exquisite costumes, each with different bonuses, but Pandora will react differently depending on where you… touch.

Ultimate weapons!
As the story progresses, the protagonist will encounter a variety of characters. From the adorable but deadly Pandora, to the brutish xxx, each character comes with unique upgradable equipment. Collect special parts to unlock their true potential.

Fully hand-drawn skill effects!
High-definition character models do battle with powerful, screen-quaking, skill effects which are all hand-drawn for an authentic Manga experience.

comments: Absolutely amazing game!!! I'm a huge petrol head and this ticks all boxes considering it's a phone game. Love the controls. Personally i use accelerator on right, brake on left and tilt to turn. Feels bang on. Graphics top notch. No need to spend money to progress. Literally one downfall... upgrade costs when you get higher spec cars. Apart from that... GOOD JOB!!!

Good game, good graphics,good sound. I like that it is on going, not like some similar games. I found it fairly easy to get used too. Plenty of choices and cars. I like that you are not constantly forced to spend real money in order to progress. That is a big plus for us game players. Well done all at EA, you have a real winner with this game. I personally am loving playing this game. Update, I have been playing for a few days now, the only drawback I have noticed is, the game takes up a lot of space on my device. Having said that, its so good its worth it. As previously, well done all at EA.

Excellent game! I have no doubt that the game is one of the most perfect games. Everything but one thing. I just ran one race that comes with the actualization and I won around 5k, te first upgrade for the camaro Nascar costs around 130k does that even make sense. In the real life if you spend that money to make a competitive car to win that money... I hope you get my meaning

The MOST AMAZING racing game in the mobile device. The gameplay, graphics, and the controls were perfect. Also, the tracks in the game were so real like I was racing in real life. I also loves the cars that were added in this game, it looks so amazing. But, what I like the most from this game was online real-time racing. There were no other racing games that has this feature. Just have suggestions, add custom race mode. In this mode, you can chose tracks, daytime, amount of opponents, and also the laps. And also enable to invite friends to custom race mode. Also, probably adding weather system will be better. Last, make the cars could do rev-bombing. So, at the start of the races, you could have some pretty good start. Although, keep it up Electronic Arts & Fire Monkeys. Hopefully, these suggestions could help the game become much better and better.

Well,to start off, game really speaks for itself.Everything is pretty dope. I'm just going to name some things that I'm sure most of the people wants. -Dynamic weather conditions,how amazing snow day on Bathurst would be?Rain,wind,foggy... -Breakable parts, mirrors, spoilers,even wheels,and those should be on the tarmac whole race. -Drift events, I'm just going to say,we all want it. -More hatchbacks definitely,and more cars like its Jeep,or Ford Raptor,and you can add unique cars from movies,etc. -And sprint events,point to point.How fun is that. -More mountains!!! Please. Peace!

the graphic, control, and gameplay is good as always, but the problem is, i played this years ago just with a device with 1gb RAM and i have mid-high graphic setting, but now im running with oppo a37f and i think it can run this game with a mid or mid 2 graphic setting... but no, my game always set to the lowest graphic, could you guys fix this problem? i love this game and i'd like to enjoy it in its best performance

descriptionHTML:
**#1 Top Free App in over 100 countries**

Real Racing 3 is the award-winning franchise that sets a new standard for mobile racing games – you have to play it to believe it.

This app offers in-app purchases. You may disable in-app purchasing using your device settings.

Over 200 Million Downloads!

TabbyAwards 2014 – WINNER: Best Action, Adventure, Arcade & Racing Game
Mobile Excellence Awards – WINNER: Best Mobile Game 2013
Game Connect Asia Pacific – WINNER: Game of The Year 2013, Technical Excellence, Excellence in Art
Meffy Awards – FINALIST: Best Mobile Game 2013

Real Racing 3 features an ever-expanding roster of officially licensed tracks with 39 circuits at 17 real-world locations, a 43-car grid and over 140 meticulously detailed cars from top manufacturers. Plus Real-Time Multiplayer, Social Leaderboards, Time Trials, night racing, and innovative Time Shifted Multiplayer™ (TSM) technology, allowing you to race anyone, anytime, anywhere.

**This is a resource-intensive game featuring extremely high quality visuals. Please make sure you have at least 1.5GB of free space on your device.**

PRAISE FOR REAL RACING 3
“Feels a full generation ahead of the competition” (IGN, 9.1/10, Editors’ Choice)
“A stunning visual masterpiece on mobile” (Touch Arcade)
“Sets the new standard on mobile for racing games” (Pocket Gamer, 9/10, Gold Award)

REAL CARS
Take the wheel of over 140 intensely detailed vehicles from iconic manufacturers like Ford, Ferrari, Lamborghini, Aston Martin and Mercedes-Benz and test your skills on an authentic 43-car race grid – the most epic racing experience on any handheld.

REAL TRACKS
Burn rubber on a full lineup of 17 real tracks in multiple configurations from top worldwide locations, including Silverstone, Hockenheimring, Le Mans, Dubai Autodrome and many more.

REAL PEOPLE
Go bumper to bumper with friends and rivals in global 8-player, cross-platform, real-time racing with drafting. Or drop into any race to challenge their AI-controlled versions in Time-Shifted Multiplayer™.

MORE CHOICES THAN EVER
Compete in over 4,000 events including Cup races, Eliminations and Endurance challenges. Choose from a wide range of upgrades to maximize your car’s performance. Customize your car with a huge collection of paints, vinyls and rims. View the action from a variety of camera angles, tweak the HUD and fine-tune the controls to your personal preference.

THE PREMIER RACING EXPERIENCE
Powered by the remarkable Mint™ 3 Engine, Real Racing 3 features detailed car damage, fully functioning rear view mirrors, and dynamic reflections for truly HD racing. Enjoy a rich, next-gen game with the most advanced cross-platform social and competitive racing community ever. Real Racing 3 delivers it all and pushes the boundaries with every update.

Welcome to the definitive racing experience.
__
User Agreement: terms.ea.com
Visit https://help.ea.com/ for assistance or inquiries.

EA may retire online features and services after 30 days’ notice posted on www.ea.com/1/service-updates

Important Consumer Information: requires a persistent Internet connection (network fees may apply);Requires acceptance of EA’s Privacy & Cookie Policy and User Agreement.
includes in-game advertising; collects data through third party analytics technology (see Privacy & Cookie Policy for details); contains direct links to the Internet and social networking sites intended for an audience over 13.

Plus, celebrate our fifth birthday with a special surprise. Start racing now!

title: Real Racing  3

description: Try Pixel Gun 3D in MULTIPLAYER MODE with Cooperative, Deathmatch & Deadly Games!  Also it is a cool modern block world shooter with singleplayer campaign and survival arena.  This is a pocket edition for mobile devices. Now you have a perfect chance to battle with your friends, classmates and colleagues or anyone else around the world! You can create and customize your character using a special skins maker and then show off on the battlefield!  It is an awesome pocket FPS shooter for all kinds of players! *** MULTIPLAYER MODES***  Deathmatch mode benefits:  ‚Ä¢ WORLDWIDE and local.  ‚Ä¢ unique maps of various shapes and sizes.  ‚Ä¢ Varied weaponry, ranging from Magic Bow, Combat M16 Rifle, Golden Desert Eagle and Lightsaber to the simplest things, in case you want to butcher someone with a knife.  ‚Ä¢ Up to 8 players in one game.  ‚Ä¢ Now chat is available! Talk with friends right in the battle! ‚Ä¢ Challenging and exciting experience that can really get you hooked!  *** COOPERATIVE MODE ***  Cooperative mode features:  ‚Ä¢ Up to 4 Players in one game.  ‚Ä¢ Chat is available as well! ‚Ä¢ 8 special maps. ‚Ä¢ Hardcore gameplay.  ‚Ä¢ Coins as a prize for top results.  *** SURVIVAL CAMPAIGN ***  In this story mode your character is ‚Äúface to face‚Äù with hordes of zombies attacking you from all sides. A lot of enemies from cops & robbers to nurses and swat members! You have to wipe them out otherwise you are doomed!  Your only task is not an easy one - to whack all the monsters. Don't let the seeds of fear grown in your head. If you survive all the attacks of the dead, you'll face an EVIL ZOMBIE BOSS in this mod. Having made mincemeat of him, you open the portal to the next battlefields! Start your combat.  New cool features in a campaign mode:  ‚Ä¢ A new training camp for first-timers.  ‚Ä¢ More detailed graphics.‚Ä¢ New cool maps like a Forest full of seeds. ‚Ä¢ Cool new songs‚Ä¢ More challenging gameplay: now you are not able to pass through enemies & different mobs. Watch out for narrow passages and lanes! There you almost have no chance to get out alive!  Make up your mind about the gun (though you may prefer a bow or a knife) and polish your killing skills! Perform at your best and share your high score on Facebook and Twitter!  Main Features of a campaign mode:  ‚Ä¢ Wide choice of arms, such as Colt, Heavy machine gun, AK47, MP5, and many others.  ‚Ä¢ A lot of absolutely different maps.  ‚Ä¢ Many types of zombies and enemies.  ‚Ä¢ Awesome HD pixel graphics with dynamic light.  ‚Ä¢ Breathtaking sound effects and songs. Use headphones for maximum fun!  ‚Ä¢ Cool fun on the age of PC FPS shooters.*** SKINS MAKER ***  Now you can make your OWN SKIN and USE IT IN THE MULTIPLAYER GAME!Thank you for all the comments and advices, we really appreciate it. In this version we tried to fulfill your wishes. Wait for the next updates with new cool features!  ‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚ÄîThis is not an official Mojang app. Pixel Gun 3D is not associated or connected with Mojang AB and its game Minecraft - Pocket Edition. Minecraft is a trademark of Mojang AB and it is not endorsed by or affiliated with the creator of this game or its licensers.
descriptionHTML:
Try Pixel Gun 3D in MULTIPLAYER MODE with Cooperative, Deathmatch & Deadly Games! Also it is a cool modern block world shooter with singleplayer campaign and survival arena.

This is a pocket edition for mobile devices. Now you have a perfect chance to battle with your friends, classmates and colleagues or anyone else around the world! You can create and customize your character using a special skins maker and then show off on the battlefield! It is an awesome pocket FPS shooter for all kinds of players!

*** MULTIPLAYER MODES***

Deathmatch mode benefits:
• WORLDWIDE and local.
• unique maps of various shapes and sizes.
• Varied weaponry, ranging from Magic Bow, Combat M16 Rifle, Golden Desert Eagle and Lightsaber to the simplest things, in case you want to butcher someone with a knife.
• Up to 8 players in one game.
• Now chat is available! Talk with friends right in the battle!
• Challenging and exciting experience that can really get you hooked!

*** COOPERATIVE MODE ***
Cooperative mode features:
• Up to 4 Players in one game.
• Chat is available as well!
• 8 special maps.
• Hardcore gameplay.
• Coins as a prize for top results.


*** SURVIVAL CAMPAIGN ***
In this story mode your character is “face to face” with hordes of zombies attacking you from all sides. A lot of enemies from cops & robbers to nurses and swat members! You have to wipe them out otherwise you are doomed!
Your only task is not an easy one - to whack all the monsters. Don't let the seeds of fear grown in your head. If you survive all the attacks of the dead, you'll face an EVIL ZOMBIE BOSS in this mod. Having made mincemeat of him, you open the portal to the next battlefields! Start your combat.

New cool features in a campaign mode:
• A new training camp for first-timers.
• More detailed graphics.
• New cool maps like a Forest full of seeds.
• Cool new songs
• More challenging gameplay: now you are not able to pass through enemies & different mobs. Watch out for narrow passages and lanes! There you almost have no chance to get out alive!

Make up your mind about the gun (though you may prefer a bow or a knife) and polish your killing skills! Perform at your best and share your high score on Facebook and Twitter!

Main Features of a campaign mode:
• Wide choice of arms, such as Colt, Heavy machine gun, AK47, MP5, and many others.
• A lot of absolutely different maps.
• Many types of zombies and enemies.
• Awesome HD pixel graphics with dynamic light.
• Breathtaking sound effects and songs. Use headphones for maximum fun!
• Cool fun on the age of PC FPS shooters.

*** SKINS MAKER ***
Now you can make your OWN SKIN and USE IT IN THE MULTIPLAYER GAME!

Thank you for all the comments and advices, we really appreciate it. In this version we tried to fulfill your wishes. Wait for the next updates with new cool features!

——————————————————————————————————
This is not an official Mojang app. Pixel Gun 3D is not associated or connected with Mojang AB and its game Minecraft - Pocket Edition. Minecraft is a trademark of Mojang AB and it is not endorsed by or affiliated with the creator of this game or its licensers.

It‚Äôs time to lay low and take aim!
Welcome to the Sniper Tournament in update 14.0.1

New Arsenal and battle control design.

comments: They say its free, don't believe that if you want the strong and overpowered heroes you need to spend lots and lots of money, like 500 dollars and then you are settled, and when you spend less its frustrating battling that heroes. So idea is good, game sucks.

Played this game for about 2 years.  Used to be great until the terrible ucool made it completely pay to win.  They have unbalanced and just add new heroes for $100 a month, ridiculous.  Terrible company that only cares about money, for your sake, find a different game.

Heroes Charge is one of the better games, and does not require one to spend a lot of money to enjoy it. It has a wide variety of characters to recruit and there are many ways to improve your party's fighting power. This is one to get.

Gameplay is fun and easy to grasp. Only things needed is a minor improvement in graphics and a way to acquire more stamina. Always run out of stamina and end up having to play something else while I wait for stamina to recharge.
Pay to win, fun game until middle stages where it one shots your group unless you pay money to get over powered characters. I can't even progress anymore because the boss one shots me every time.

I have been playing this game for a long time now...going on 3 years. It is still an awesome game. For all the people saying it's P2W you are wrong....flat out wrong. Do not blame the devs for your impatience or inability to see the strategy in the game. This game can be completely F2P if you have patience. I do no blame the devs for wanting to get paid for releasing a quality product. Paying for the little boosts here and there give you an edge but give it a month and then the new characters are available through several different means. Keep up the good work!!!
description: Join with your friends in the best and latest action RPG multiplayer online battle arena, HEROES CHARGE! Collect and train your heroes, gather your teammates, strengthen your heroes and wipe out the enemy in thrilling, addictive and fast-paced games. Over one hundred quests for you to partake in the story that YOU tell. Which heroes will you choose? = AN EXCEPTIONALLY RICH AND ADDICTIVE GAME = - Choose between over 50 unique and varied Heroes, from melee bruisers, agile archers and powerful mages - Fight and explore through the world of Kron, find rare heroes and see if you have what it takes to persuade them to join you! - Develop and upgrade your skills while collecting equipment sets that infuse your heroes with power over your foes! - An immersive experience with friends or go solo on your own in numerous battles - Blend cooperation with your friends as you battle against competing guilds for elite prizes - Develop team play and strategies to rule the world of Kron - Build or join a guild of friends - Fight through the PVP Arena for awards fame! - Collect and develop rare heroes! - Fight against a horde of enemies in challenging special events! NOTICE: Heroes Charge is a completely free-to-play game, however there are some game items that can also be purchased for real money. If you don‚Äôt want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device‚Äôs settings. Also under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 13 years of age to play or download Heroes Charge.

comments: A well made app that's immersive, addictive, and the essence of the Kingdom Hearts franchise. The app is mission based and has a complex but easy to use medal system with rock-paper-scissors type of combat. You can join/make a party, or go solo. Money isn't an issue so long as you pace yourself. It gets better the more you play. There are optional event quests and a story, but don't fret if you can't get the app or just starting out; it's slow going. 735 quests.

Liking the cute art style but my god does this game take forever to download even with a low resolution. Has taken me two attempts and I'm doubtful that it's related to my broadband speed and connection (not sure if it's to do with my phone? But again, doubtful.) Would be great if this could be fixed somehow.

I freaking love this game! However I have a small complaint that is probably fixable. I was wondering for my lg g6 if you could expand the borders so the screen would fit. And if the screen is not able to get any bigger, I'm hoping you people can at least put a cool border around it instead of leaving it as a black bar. I know you people can make cool borders. Thanks for your attention!

Hey guys, huge fan of the kingdom hearts series and also the game in general. Though one thing I wish you could add is the option to link your data to your Google Play account as well as Facebook. Not a lot of us use Facebook so I wish there was more options to get your data back if you ever deleted the app. Otherwise, good game!

I love this game.  Strategy, adventure, and story (once you get far enough) are all great!  Although it is a little pay to win, and they keep coming out with new medals (attacks) that are infinitely better than your current ones.  This can get discurraging, because your hard work doesn't really mean much in the long run.    I played for 6 month when a friend got a single medal that made him more powerful than me on his 1st week playing.

[Edit: THANK YOU SO MUCH! I love that you all added a lower quality version this way I can play this game.] I like it and all, but when that very large download starts after the tutorial, it stops at 4/6 and restarts, even though my phone has enough room for it, I think. Please fix this, I really want to play it!

comments: Fantastic game.I am loving this game. Still there is few problem.Miniclips please solve the issues. After players matching ,game is hacked/stopped by several times.Only way to win that kind of match,any of one player has to quit or network issues.Its waste of time,also harm for devices (battery drainage,high heating). So,admin plz look after these prob.Why it's hanging or hacking.

As football based game it is superb, in terms of gameplay, graphics etc. But the biggest idiotic part of this game is that if freezes like magic. The whole game main screen becomes unresponsive and stays like that no matters the game is restarted or the damn phone is. Get this thing sorted out Miniclip. You have a reputation to maintain or not?

Could you please enable the user to save his progress in a Gmail account??  So that, when you lost or change your phone, you can recover the level and progress you had before instead of restarting from the beginning!!!!!!!!!!!!   If you could allow more media for sharing the game, it would be better, Facebook is not the only social media!!   And sometimes, it bugs!! Sometimes, the game is very slow and causes you to lose. Indeed, you shoot but the ball goes after many seconds even though the connexion is good!! Consequently you loose against a weak player, And this makes very angry!!!   Should those problems fixed, I will rate 5 stars.

I think this game is a really fun addicting game. The main reason why I got it was because of 8 ball pool. That game is also very fun. The only thing I don't like about football strike is that when I get on sometimes it won't let me click the spinner. So it's like my phone froze. But my phone didn't freeze. It's just the app. So can you guys please fix this.

At first I was skeptical about this game. I had downloaded it and went without playing for a couple of weeks. Then,one day I just happen to open the app and play. Best move I ever made for an app! This game is just flat out addicting, fun and challenging.  I was pleasantly surprised about how much fun it is and that there is, most of the time, something new.  Chalkenign friends and new people always makes for a challenging and fun time waster. Even if I don't have the time to play, I still make time!! Haha

There is a bug in your game I went first of my league, supposingly I am entitled to 350 cash, but it wasn't there.  How could you make it so unfair for someone. Why bother having a prizes if not given to the right person.
description: You‚Äôve never played a football game like this before. descriptionHTML:
You’ve never played a football game like this before. Take on your friends in multiplayer free-kick face-offs, or make a name for yourself in the Career Mode!

Challenge the world across different online game modes! Hit the targets in a fast-paced, time-limited battle for points in Shooting Race mode, or take turns as both striker and goalkeeper in the one-on-one Free Kick mode!

Customise your striker and goalkeeper with tons of unlockable items! Show off your style or represent your team’s colours!

Take on Career mode, travelling through different stadiums around the globe and taking on unique soccer challenges to unlock medals!

With simple, fast gameplay, Football Strike is easy to play and offers endless competitive football fun!

KEY FEATURES:

• Take your shot and make amazing saves, all with the flick of the finger!
• Play online in Shooting Race and Free Kick modes!
• Play against friends or challenge players from across the world!
• Represent your favourite team! Play as FC Barcelona, Borussia Dortmund, FC Zenit, FC Schalke 04 and more!
• Conquer an extensive Career Mode to earn medals!
• Upgrade your player and equipment and take on the world’s best!
• Fast-paced gameplay means there’s always action!

comments: I stop playing C C because I loved this game... I noticed that we use way more than we get!! And to only get a few tickets for every 10 Bingo's then having to wit for 22hrs....only 4 tickets and hr...and it takes way to long to get to the next level and when do reach it we get very little tickets!!! Dont have to many deals to get both tickets and special prizes... Also how does it when a game starts right after a tournament that I end up in the thousand plus  rank below the bronze??? As much as I love this game think its time to give it a rest until there re more incentives to bring me back!!!

My game keep freezing up and not submitting my scores not giving me boosters I acquired during that round. Please fix the issues and give me back my points and boosters. Thank you   I just played again and I played the whole game but when it's time to tally the score the game freezes. I lost 3 footballs and a treasure chest plus my points. Please respond to my issues. I haven't heard from anyone yet. But I still like the game. Just want it to stop robbing me....

This is definitely a fun bingo app. Where it's lacking or otherwise could be improved, comparatively to ther Bingo games, is the daily spin wheel & daily sign in bonus. Daily 24hr sign in should provide a much larger number of free tickets & include daily free power ups. Earning one or two power ups w a single spin of the wheel is anticlimactic! Power ups are a vital way to  daily tournament advancement, bingo wins & simy make playing more fun. Completing a pizzule is impossible without power-ups or making a purchase. However, a big win for this app. is the ability to sign in each new day to a new tournament which helps level the playing field. Special tournaments and/or the add' side bonuses, like the "turkey daub" made playing & making a purchase worth wild!

Good, keeps me coming back for more. The only thing I don't like is there is no way of getting that many puzzle pieces in the time. Could you maybe let us play till we get the Puzzle Complete to get the rewards.

I am addicted to this game. I think you should get more power ups instead of ticket's. Cause you run out of power up's. I feel you should get bingo power up's instead of ticket's. On the bonus spin they should add bingo power up's of 4. I need more bingo power up's. And would like to get power up's for daubing every number called each game. I need more power Up's. And the game should give you tickets when you get every number that is called correctly on each card every game that you play.

The new additions of the outlaws was great, but then you added all these "special" days that serve no purpose but to make people spend money. I have spent plenty already but not for every game. Sorry guys, bad move. Too greedy.

comments: Customer service does not reply nor do they address issues. So keep that in mind when in app purchase are charged to your account but items fail to be uploaded to tour device. This app has a long road of updates and improvements before it can be considered to be a game worth playing.
Pack buying glitches, Game glitches,  non responsive customer service.  Too bad they are ripping off some genuinely nice people.  DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS GAME  AT ALL...VenusFlytrap

Bought a 48.99 eve of war pack but never received it.  Customer support does not respond.  This could be a good game but until they fix the pack buying glitches and customer support the game will not survive. And now you can't even log in lol. I won't be recommending this game to anyone now!!

I purchased a Valentine's gold pack (¬£70.99) on 15/3/18 but received no in game items or gold. I have been leaving messages in game and also through the customer service email but still have not received a response. Could someone please contact me conversation name JOYCEY  Edit: you have responded to other people's reviews please respond to this one, I am 70.99 out of pocket with nothing for it and nearly a week one I've received no support at all - 2nd edit Day 8 and no sign of my purchase and no customer support except a "you'll get your purchase soon sorry for trouble" which I received about 12hrs ago, I'm less than hopeful ..

At first it was great until I bought a $99.99 package but my items were not delivered. I emailed them about the problem and they wouldn't respond. I emailed Google Store and they got them to respond to me. They told me they will look into it and that was 2 days ago. Still no items or refund.
Bought loads of packs last week around 10... 3 of them I never got and therecasking me for all sorts of things which I can't give them... Dam joke
description: Become the Supreme King in Game of Kings: The Blood Throne, the newest FREE real-time strategy, and MMO of 2017! Gather your Resources, Build your Empire, Train your Warriors, Lead your Armies, Destroy your Enemies, Sit on the Throne and Dominate the World on your Phone! Game of Kings: The Blood Throne is completely FREE to play!***AWESOME CHRISTMAS GIFTS***To celebrate a wonderful 2017 Christmas GOK‚Äôs developers decided to prepare many events and FREE gifts for all players. Starting from Thursday 21st until January 2nd GOK players will find a beautiful Christmas environment and a beautiful Christmas tree in the middle of the city, will also have the opportunity to: ‚úî Collect FREE gift from December 25th. Tap the Christmas tree to receive your big gift.‚úî New monsters to fight in the map with new materials to get. ‚úî 2017 Xmas Special Gear. Players will have the opportunity to get new powerful gears, be sure to get yours fast because they will disappear at the end of Christmas event.‚úî Cross Kingdom Royal Rumble. Wage war to to other players from all the other servers.‚úî Play the Roulette and have a chance to get wonderful items. One free spin a day is on the house.‚úî GOK will enlist the best players in a yearly ranking position list and reward them with special badges and trophies.‚úî Pictures sharing competition and 3 different kind of rewards. Game of Kings: The Blood Throne features: ‚úî Players vs. Players Epic Wars.‚úî Explore the world map, seek and attack different Monsters and get precious prizes.‚úî Gather 6 different kinds of resources (food, iron, stone, wood, silver and gold) to use to build and upgrade buildings, train armies and research new technologies. ‚úî Gather hundred of thousands of soldiers among Swordsman, Archers, Knights and Siege Machines, in 4 increasingly powerful tiers! Attack other players and defend your Empire!‚úî Create or join alliances and wage war to other coalitions, win them all and dominate the Kingdom! Make friends with other players, develop together and fight your common enemies like brothers!‚úî Forge Epic and Legendary weapons to become immensely powerful!‚úî Power up your Hero with 2 different skill trees system. ‚úî No language barriers! Talk to anyone freely with our real-time in chat translation of 34 different languages.‚úî Frequent events with free gifts and engaging activities. Game of Kings: The Blood Throne is completely free to play, however some items still can be purchased with real money. If you don‚Äôt want to use this feature, please disable this function in your device or the setting of store. For any questions or comments, please contact us via Email: gameofkingsservice@gmail.com
descriptionHTML:
Become the Supreme King in Game of Kings: The Blood Throne, the newest FREE real-time strategy, and MMO of 2017!
Gather your Resources, Build your Empire, Train your Warriors, Lead your Armies, Destroy your Enemies, Sit on the Throne and Dominate the World on your Phone!
Game of Kings: The Blood Throne is completely FREE to play!

***AWESOME CHRISTMAS GIFTS***
To celebrate a wonderful 2017 Christmas GOK’s developers decided to prepare many events and FREE gifts for all players. Starting from Thursday 21st until January 2nd GOK players will find a beautiful Christmas environment and a beautiful Christmas tree in the middle of the city, will also have the opportunity to:
✔ Collect FREE gift from December 25th. Tap the Christmas tree to receive your big gift.
✔ New monsters to fight in the map with new materials to get.
✔ 2017 Xmas Special Gear. Players will have the opportunity to get new powerful gears, be sure to get yours fast because they will disappear at the end of Christmas event.
✔ Cross Kingdom Royal Rumble. Wage war to to other players from all the other servers.
✔ Play the Roulette and have a chance to get wonderful items. One free spin a day is on the house.
✔ GOK will enlist the best players in a yearly ranking position list and reward them with special badges and trophies.
✔ Pictures sharing competition and 3 different kind of rewards.


Game of Kings: The Blood Throne features:
✔ Players vs. Players Epic Wars.
✔ Explore the world map, seek and attack different Monsters and get precious prizes.
✔ Gather 6 different kinds of resources (food, iron, stone, wood, silver and gold) to use to build and upgrade buildings, train armies and research new technologies.
✔ Gather hundred of thousands of soldiers among Swordsman, Archers, Knights and Siege Machines, in 4 increasingly powerful tiers! Attack other players and defend your Empire!
✔ Create or join alliances and wage war to other coalitions, win them all and dominate the Kingdom! Make friends with other players, develop together and fight your common enemies like brothers!
✔ Forge Epic and Legendary weapons to become immensely powerful!
✔ Power up your Hero with 2 different skill trees system.
✔ No language barriers! Talk to anyone freely with our real-time in chat translation of 34 different languages.
✔ Frequent events with free gifts and engaging activities.


Game of Kings: The Blood Throne is completely free to play, however some items still can be purchased with real money. If you don’t want to use this feature, please disable this function in your device or the setting of store.
For any questions or comments, please contact us via Email: gameofkingsservice@gmail.com

comments: This game is perfect for those who played any moba style game. 2 buddies of mine play this the same we used to back in the first 2 years of league of legends. Short games, almost no existence of any real "pay to win". No heavy dedication required to get started. Great for the casual and hardcore gamer. Not for those who haven't even seen a moba style game before. Just needs more items to buy in game, but can't expect perfection from the start. Overall 4.7 from me

Cool game very fun few negative though. Snowballing is way to easy one death and you basically lose lane. The controls need to be better they need a target lock mode. Its hard to keep on your target even with hero icons on. Being able to only use the jungle talent if you have a jungling item on sucks. its so hard to comeback if any bit behind as i said snowballing is to large.

If you love League of Legends are definitely going to like and enjoy playing this game. One of the best games out there. You don't need to spend any money to be one of the best players it's all about skill and having a good team structure it's nothing about spending hundreds of dollars of real cash to get the best items because there are no best items! You do not have to pay to play this game and be the best!

The connection and reconnecting sucks, I always end up idle or AFK because apparently my connection sucks but it's perfectly fine. Reconnecting takes forever and by the time it's done the game is already over and I'm reported for AFK when it's not even my fault the game's connection sucks.   Other than that the game is fun to play and a good time consumer but they need to work on better connection. I kept on getting warnings for my AFK when the game kept on glitching and it affected my phone so I had to restart the whole thing.

Way better than Mobile Legends. I use to be  Mobile Legends Die-Hard All the way but this is the best MOBA out there. I have no idea why this does not have 50+million downloads. ? Do Not Judge By Front cover. PLAY THIS AND SEE WHEN YOU REACH RANKED MATCHES MY FELLOW MOBA PLAYERS.

Played both the international version (arena of valor) and the Chinese version (honor of kings). It is the better mobile moba in the market with great control and smooth gameplay. Having DC heros in the roster is a big plus.   Downside is the lack of content compared to the Chinese version. Sure it's a fairly new game, but if this game wants to be as successful as honor of kings it need a lot more content to keep players engaged. More meaningful events (not the crappy one that give you 5 gold for winning matches), way better skins (seriously check out the skins in honor of kings, so much better) thats actually appealing to people. And please let people unlock arcana pages with gems instead of paying real money.
description: Experience Arena of Valor, an epic new 5v5 multiplayer online battle arena (MOBA) designed by Tencent Games!Call on your teammates to join you in the jungle! Crush your enemies in classic 5v5 combat in real time! Draw first blood, carry your team, and become legendary in the arena!Features:- Classic 5v5 MOBA, Perfected for Mobile -Traverse a classic three-lane arena filled with nooks and crannies between towers. Watch out for enemies lurking in the brush and uncover secrets that wait in the jungle. Intuitive controls specifically designed for mobile will have you racking up kills with ease and make you an MVP in no time!- Growing Number of Legendary Heroes -Explore and command a roster of over 40 fearless heroes and counting, including a variety of Tanks, Assassins, Mages, Support, Warriors, and Marksmen. Build the perfect team to crush your opponents in battle!- The Ultimate MOBA Experience -First Blood, Double Kill, Triple Kill‚Ä¶ all the features that you know and love right at your fingertips. Discover and dominate all the gameplay modes, including 5v5, 3v3, 1v1, and a unique ‚ÄúHook Wars‚Äù mode that will challenge your skills and make you a true champion!- Fast Matchmaking & 10-Minute Matches -Team up with players all around the world in an instant. Carve your way through jungles, lanes, and towers, draw first blood and destroy the enemy Core. Carry your team to victory in less than 10 minutes!- Join Your Friends in Fierce Team Battles -Enjoy fast-paced combat and forge alliances with players around the world. Interact with friends and guild buddies every day using real-time voice chat. Share the load, work together, and fight strategically. Team up with your friends in Tourney Mode and soon you‚Äôll be able to create your own league. Arena of Valor is the new eSport for your mobile devices.- Got What It Takes? Free to Play Forever -In Arena of Valor, it‚Äôs all about skill. We strive to create the most riveting and balanced gameplay, so you can turn the tide of battle and vie for glory no matter the odds. Win or lose, every action counts!Contact Us:Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ArenaofValorYoutube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCgYkGvtBuY4onYm2Eh61zwQTwitter: https://twitter.com/arenaofvalorInstagram: https://www.instagram.com/arenaofvalor/
descriptionHTML:
Experience Arena of Valor, an epic new 5v5 multiplayer online battle arena (MOBA) designed by Tencent Games!

Call on your teammates to join you in the jungle! Crush your enemies in classic 5v5 combat in real time! Draw first blood, carry your team, and become legendary in the arena!

Features:

- Classic 5v5 MOBA, Perfected for Mobile -
Traverse a classic three-lane arena filled with nooks and crannies between towers. Watch out for enemies lurking in the brush and uncover secrets that wait in the jungle. Intuitive controls specifically designed for mobile will have you racking up kills with ease and make you an MVP in no time!

- Growing Number of Legendary Heroes -
Explore and command a roster of over 40 fearless heroes and counting, including a variety of Tanks, Assassins, Mages, Support, Warriors, and Marksmen. Build the perfect team to crush your opponents in battle!

- The Ultimate MOBA Experience -
First Blood, Double Kill, Triple Kill… all the features that you know and love right at your fingertips. Discover and dominate all the gameplay modes, including 5v5, 3v3, 1v1, and a unique “Hook Wars” mode that will challenge your skills and make you a true champion!

- Fast Matchmaking & 10-Minute Matches -
Team up with players all around the world in an instant. Carve your way through jungles, lanes, and towers, draw first blood and destroy the enemy Core. Carry your team to victory in less than 10 minutes!

- Join Your Friends in Fierce Team Battles -
Enjoy fast-paced combat and forge alliances with players around the world. Interact with friends and guild buddies every day using real-time voice chat. Share the load, work together, and fight strategically. Team up with your friends in Tourney Mode and soon you’ll be able to create your own league. Arena of Valor is the new eSport for your mobile devices.

- Got What It Takes? Free to Play Forever -
In Arena of Valor, it’s all about skill. We strive to create the most riveting and balanced gameplay, so you can turn the tide of battle and vie for glory no matter the odds. Win or lose, every action counts!

Contact Us:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ArenaofValor
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCgYkGvtBuY4onYm2Eh61zwQ
Twitter: https://twitter.com/arenaofvalor

comments: If you are going to do updates on this game, at least MAKE SURE it isn't lagging! My game since the update has been freezing up and lagging to the point that I select something (a wall for example) and the whole  game freezes and takes a million years just to LOAD. If this game isn't fixed, I'm demanding all my money spent on the game refunded and uninstallment. Not happy.

The more I play the more this game is broken ... the AI for the troupes constantly suicide even if you keep rallying them , I am lvl 169 and I am constantly getting attacked by lvl 220 and up no lies , I can give screenshots because that is fair ... this is 1-5 times at least per hour ... this game from very fun became very frustrating. The game creators could give 2 sh/ts about what is going on .

My phone is not rooted or jail broken, I do not have any hacks installed. I get a message saying illegal program detected by XIGNCODE3. Even after multiple uninstalls/installs, reboots, cache clears. All that time and energy wasted!!!

This is the game I have been searching for. But can't give 5 star because of 2 main reasons. Consume too many data while playing that required fast network and too many bugs... Problems free=5 stars.. What happen? I cannot even play the game now.. I once install and play and later uninstall because of game problem. Now I install and try to play again. I cannot play.. What is the problem? I also want to recover my account too..

Gameplay and graphics is great BUT as you progress you spend more time upgrading units and buildings. Some upgrades take up to a week of upgrading rendering those villagers useless aswell as the rate at which resources comes in as you collect doesnt compensate enough for the costs of upgrades. Its unnecessarily STRETCHED OUT. because of this its a 3 star rating...DONT DOWNLOAD IF YOU HAVE NO PATIENCE. Been playing a year and i dont feel my progress is a representation of the time i have put in. Been playing almost daily!

This is the exact definition of a strategy game, the controls are great and its free. You get to choose your own nation which just adds to the strategy, plus whatever you do in a battle can affect the entire battle. I would recommend it to people who want something with strategy and a bit of hardcoreness. The learning curve is quite steep sometimes.

descriptionHTML:
Grow a flourishing civilization and journey through all of human history as the leader of a mighty Nation!

BUILD a unique village of your own design. LEAD loyal citizens from the dawn of antiquity to the modern era. BATTLE cooperatively and competitively with players from across the world. RAID competing Nations for all their good loot!

Battle and build a civilization through history as you aim to conquer the world in DomiNations.

DOMINATIONS FEATURES:

GREAT LEADERS!
• At the new University, consult Leonardo Da Vinci, Catherine the Great, King Sejong and other historic thought leaders.
• Strengthen your Nation with the best war strategy!

BRAND NEW EVENTS!
• Accomplish fun limited-time goals based on actual events from history.
• Collect rare rewards to help your Nation advance so they can conquer the world!

FROM THE STONE AGE TO THE SPACE AGE
• Lead a colony of early hunters and gatherers on their conquest through the ages from the dawn of civilization to the modern era.
• Design a small civilization and grow it into a thriving metropolis.
• Build historic Wonders of the World, including famous landmarks like the Pyramids of Egypt and the Roman Colosseum.

CHOOSE YOUR NATION AND LEAD AN ARMY
• Battle as of one of 8 fearsome Nations on its journey through time.
• Choose one of the great civilizations from history like the Romans, British, Chinese, French, Germans, Japanese, Koreans and Greeks.
• Tackle historic battle campaigns to collect important resources and upgrade your city as you advance through history!
• Each civilization has a special strength to help you build unique units.
• Battle through history and advance your city, like longbowmen, vandals, and the mighty samurai!

DISCOVER NEW TECHNOLOGIES
• Legendary game designer Brian Reynolds brings history to life in every era as key advancements from each period in history will help you progress your epic civilization!
• Research each civilization, new materials, invent advanced weaponry, and develop trade to grow a bustling economy.
• Through scientific discovery, strengthen your troops with better equipment, upgrade your buildings and town center with modern materials.
• Create a war strategy to bolster your defenses as you grow stronger.

FORM AN ALLIANCE AND WAGE WORLD WAR
• Put your powerful Nation to the ultimate test in PvP combat and raid your enemies’ cities for huge bunches of loot!
• Battle for crucial resources, untold wealth, and total world domination.
• Team up with other skilled rulers and forge an unstoppable Alliance.
• Unleash the full force of your armies with a unique battle strategy to outwit and outlast your opponents in 50-on-50 Alliance warfare.
• Conquer the globe in World War and take home the spoils of war!

Build one of history’s greatest civilizations and develop a battle strategy to conquer opponents. Join an alliance and achieve world domination in DomiNations!

Download now to start building your civilization

NOTES:

A network connection and iOS 7 or above are required. DomiNations is optimized for iPads and iPhones generation 4S and newer. Playing on an iPhone 4 may result in slower performance and increased load times. The game is free to play, with additional purchases available in-game. If you do not want to make purchases in-game, please disable in-app purchases from your device settings.

Privacy Policy:
https://www.nexonm.com/privacy-policy/

Terms of Service:
https://www.nexonm.com/terms-of-use/

recentChanges: v6.2 Update Notes
- Expand your civilization with 15 new spaces to explore!
- Upgrade your University to level 7!
- Research Haile Selassie‚Äôs skill tree at the University to improve your late-game combat defenses.
- Harness the power of his Capstone, Lion of Judah, unlocking the ability to build a Rocket Arsenal to defend your base!
- Town Center now has increased white radius where defenders are triggered.
- Japanese Town Centers features an additional yellow ring to show its firing range.
summary: Battle strategy game: Build an empire, wage war & conquer nations across history
title: DomiNations

If you continuously win you lose continuously and if you have a lot of chips you'll lose the chips know why? This games is money hungry and wants you to buy stuff I had 25 million and now I have 13 million because the dealer got 20 2 times in a row mabey if you made the cards random and didint do what I complained about I would've gave this 5 stars.
There's a few small glitches but they are always keeping up and listening to players comments to make things better,  bravo! Really fun team challenges separates gop3 from all others.

description: EXCITING 3D ACTION3D graphics and simple controls make for free-flowing and fast-paced hack-and-slash action.EPIC SPECIAL MOVESUnleash each Bleach character's unique special moves to carve your way to victory. Special moves are fully voiced by the original Japanese anime voice actors.THREE'S COMPANYCombine your favorite characters into teams of three. You can even make combinations of characters you would never see in the original story. The possibilities are almost limitless!RELIVE THE BLEACH STORYFollow the Bleach story from the moment Rukia and Ichigo first meet. Develop your characters as you complete quests that recreate pivotal scenes from the story.BATTLE OTHER PLAYERSCompete in weekly leagues. Pit your best warriors against other players' teams and vie for the top spot.DEVELOP YOUR CHARACTERSBrave Souls features a highly flexible character improvement system that allows you to create exactly the warriors and the team you want. Enter battle and earn experience to level up characters and improve their base stats, Ascend them to increase their max level, train them on the Soul Tree to further improve specific stats, or link characters together to provide additional support. The choice is yours!Official Sitehttps://www.bleach-bravesouls.com/en/TwitterAccount: @bleachbrs_enHashtag: #BraveSoulsFacebookhttps://www.facebook.com/BleachBS.en/Recommended OS Android 4.0 or laterThe following permissions are necessary to play this game.Storage AccessPermission: READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGEPermission: WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGENecessary for the game to be able to store game data in an external location. descriptionHTML:
EXCITING 3D ACTION
3D graphics and simple controls make for free-flowing and fast-paced hack-and-slash action.

EPIC SPECIAL MOVES
Unleash each Bleach character's unique special moves to carve your way to victory. Special moves are fully voiced by the original Japanese anime voice actors.

THREE'S COMPANY
Combine your favorite characters into teams of three. You can even make combinations of characters you would never see in the original story. The possibilities are almost limitless!

RELIVE THE BLEACH STORY
Follow the Bleach story from the moment Rukia and Ichigo first meet. Develop your characters as you complete quests that recreate pivotal scenes from the story.

BATTLE OTHER PLAYERS
Compete in weekly leagues. Pit your best warriors against other players' teams and vie for the top spot.

DEVELOP YOUR CHARACTERS
Brave Souls features a highly flexible character improvement system that allows you to create exactly the warriors and the team you want. Enter battle and earn experience to level up characters and improve their base stats, Ascend them to increase their max level, train them on the Soul Tree to further improve specific stats, or link characters together to provide additional support. The choice is yours!

Official Site
https://www.bleach-bravesouls.com/en/

Twitter
Account: @bleachbrs_en
Hashtag: #BraveSouls

Facebook
https://www.facebook.com/BleachBS.en/

Recommended OS
Android 4.0 or later

The following permissions are necessary to play this game.
Storage Access
Permission: READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE
Permission: WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE
Necessary for the game to be able to store game data in an external location. These permissions only apply to Android versions earlier than 6. For Android 6 or later, you can still play the game even if you decline these permissions.

Identity (find accounts on this device)
Permission: GET_ACCOUNTS
Necessary to receive push notifications.

Camera/Microphone Access
Permission: CAMERA / RECORD_AUDIO
Necessary for using the video recording function.

-----------------------------------------------------
© Tite Kubo/Shueisha, TV TOKYO, dentsu, Pierrot

description: War is coming ‚Äì Will you be ready? Summon heroes to defend your kingdom and charge the enemy in this one-of-a-kind RTS adventure!Magic Rush: Heroes is a revolutionary combination of skill-aiming controls, a thrilling, real-time PvP Ladder Tourney mode, exciting multiplayer World Map battles, simple yet addicting Tower Defense, and more! Experience the fun of multiple different genres all wrapped up in one extraordinary game.Rush forth on an unforgettable adventure that you won‚Äôt forget!FeaturesSummon Powerful Attacks With Skill-Aiming- Manually choose targets or directions when casting skills. You call the shots!- Summon attacks to stun, silence, knock airborne, heal and even interrupt enemy skills using precise controls- Strategy and speed combine. Master them both, and victory is truly in your hands!Hero Training Powers You Up to Defend the Kingdom- Role play as diverse hero types, including dozens of unlockable heroes with hundreds of distinctive skills.- Heroes can be combined in different ways and take the opposition by storm.- Upgrade your defender with equipment enhancing, rune inlaying, and unique upgrades and abilities for every kind of weapon.- RPGs and RTS combine to bring you the ultimate Equipment System.PvP Games in the Ladder Tourney- Charge to war in a global, cross-server PvP Arena with a turn-based ban/pick phase to level the playing field.- Defend your victory by strategically banning your opponent‚Äôs heroes depending on your own battle plan.- PvP combat offers awesome rewards for every season!War Strategy and RTS Gameplay- RTS combat challenges you to build your tower, upgrade your tech, and dispatch your armies to plunder resources from enemies.- Defend the kingdom together! Create alliances with millions of players from around the world to thrive in this war-torn landscape.- RTS battles let you conquer enemies to become the dominant alliance!Hero Tower Defense Combines Your Favorite Strategy Genres- An all-new ‚ÄúHero Tower Defense‚Äù concept cleverly combines the heroes of the game with dozens of exquisitely designed Tower Defense stages.- Drop tower emplacements and activate Hero abilities in real time during exciting battles that you won‚Äôt want to put down!- Defend your based on one-of-a-kind map creations.Constant Updates Offer- New heroes- In-game events- Weekly updates based on your feedback and suggestions!- Hard-working developers are constantly updating and improving the gaming experience with new gameplay!Are you the defender this kingdom needs? Download Magic Rush: Heroes and join the RTS war today!PLEASE NOTE! Magic Rush is free to download and play, however some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you do not want to use this feature, please set up password protection for purchases in the settings of your Google Play Store app. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 13 years of age to play or download Magic Rush.Have any questions or issues with the free tower defense RPG adventure game from Elex Tech?
