descriptionHTML:
War is coming – Will you be ready? Summon heroes to defend your kingdom and charge the enemy in this one-of-a-kind RTS adventure!
Magic Rush: Heroes is a revolutionary combination of skill-aiming controls, a thrilling, real-time PvP Ladder Tourney mode, exciting multiplayer World Map battles, simple yet addicting Tower Defense, and more! Experience the fun of multiple different genres all wrapped up in one extraordinary game.

Rush forth on an unforgettable adventure that you won’t forget!

Features

Summon Powerful Attacks With Skill-Aiming
- Manually choose targets or directions when casting skills. You call the shots!
- Summon attacks to stun, silence, knock airborne, heal and even interrupt enemy skills using precise controls
- Strategy and speed combine. Master them both, and victory is truly in your hands!

Hero Training Powers You Up to Defend the Kingdom
- Role play as diverse hero types, including dozens of unlockable heroes with hundreds of distinctive skills.
- Heroes can be combined in different ways and take the opposition by storm.
- Upgrade your defender with equipment enhancing, rune inlaying, and unique upgrades and abilities for every kind of weapon.
- RPGs and RTS combine to bring you the ultimate Equipment System.

PvP Games in the Ladder Tourney
- Charge to war in a global, cross-server PvP Arena with a turn-based ban/pick phase to level the playing field.
- Defend your victory by strategically banning your opponent’s heroes depending on your own battle plan.
- PvP combat offers awesome rewards for every season!

War Strategy and RTS Gameplay
- RTS combat challenges you to build your tower, upgrade your tech, and dispatch your armies to plunder resources from enemies.
- Defend the kingdom together! Create alliances with millions of players from around the world to thrive in this war-torn landscape.
- RTS battles let you conquer enemies to become the dominant alliance!

Hero Tower Defense Combines Your Favorite Strategy Genres
- An all-new “Hero Tower Defense” concept cleverly combines the heroes of the game with dozens of exquisitely designed Tower Defense stages.
- Drop tower emplacements and activate Hero abilities in real time during exciting battles that you won’t want to put down!
- Defend your based on one-of-a-kind map creations.

Constant Updates Offer
- New heroes
- In-game events
- Weekly updates based on your feedback and suggestions!
- Hard-working developers are constantly updating and improving the gaming experience with new gameplay!

Are you the defender this kingdom needs? Download Magic Rush: Heroes and join the RTS war today!

PLEASE NOTE! Magic Rush is free to download and play, however some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you do not want to use this feature, please set up password protection for purchases in the settings of your Google Play Store app. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 13 years of age to play or download Magic Rush.

Have any questions or issues with the free tower defense RPG adventure game from Elex Tech?
Reach us at: magicrush.help@gmail.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MagicRushOnline
Twitter: @MagicRushHeroes
Official Forum: http://f.elex.com/forums/35-Magic-Rush-Heroes

title: Magic Rush: Heroes

comments: It's a good story and all. But I only wish they would let me save up energy or at least give me a little more. It gets frustrating when I can't Carry on, I'm not a patient person. Graphics are good. Controls are good. Story is great! Loving most of this game so far. I just hope they change the energy part of it. Though I guess it's a lot easier to read thn most episode stories.

I love the story Line just like I've been reading in the comments the energy sucks I know it's just to keep us from reading the story so fast an to blow our money on, but if there was another way instead of us waiting for so long for just a little energy it's defently keeping me from downloading another game like this.. it takes so long to receive the 300 energy I done forgot an really not into the story Like I was when I 1st downloaded it.

The story and art art great, like in the other game, and I love the music too.  I have 2 major complaints though: 1. It's not indicated anywhere in the appstore that this is a work in progress (there's currently 4 chapters in English). This particularly bothers me since I bought energy so I could get immersed in the story, only to be torn out of that immersion by an incomplete story. 2. The energy system. I mentioned this in my review for the Drogo one as well, and plenty of people pointed it out here so I won't go into detail.

I think all of these Is it love stories are absolutely amazing. The writing has given me inspiration to read more romance novels. But I don't like the energy system. I foolishly paid a lot of money to read/play longer and I'm glad the author and developers get the money for a product I thoroughly enjoy. I just wish the daily energy was 1000 or something

Amazing story... When will there be more chapters?! I also don't like how I have to buy energy in order to not just have five minutes (maybe) of reading the story and making decisions. Please come out with more chapters soon!

Loving the story so far and the graphics.. It's all so beautiful. Only wish that they would give you more energy over time to read it.. when you lose time to read you lose interest in the story by the waiting. Help us stay interested!

descriptionHTML:
Is it Love? Peter - Vampire is an interactive game (choice game). A game with vampires, Witches, and werewolves.
Like in TV sitcoms, new episodes (chapters) are regularly released. You can download this interactive love game (choice game) for free.
In each episode, you'll have a lot of choices to take in order to make it YOUR story, YOUR romance!

Story:
"Having had supernatural faculties since your childhood, you decided to leave everything to go get some answers at the strange Mystery Spell University. You found a job and accommodation at the Bartholy Manor. In exchange for your services, taking care of the younger sister, Lorie, you live with them. The city's inhabitants fear them terribly, the evil shadow of their father weighs in all consciences ... Many mysteries surround the Bartholy brothers and you will quickly discover that the whole city has things to hide. Many people at Mystery Spell have strange secrets ...
However, only one inhabitant is always on your mind and arouses your curiosity, and that is Peter, the most mysterious and most melancholic of the Bartholy brothers. Will you manage to tame him without putting yourself in danger? Will he confide his darkest secrets...?"

Strong points:
✓ Meet with Vampires and Witches.
✓ It's your game: Your choices influence the story.
✓ A 100% free Otome Game in English
✓ A new visual adventure.

An Otome is a visual novel type game in which you are the heroine about to live true romance (love story) with possible twists (Love, seduction, betrayal, marriage...) depending on the choices you make (choice game)

Download this vampire game, if you :
✓ Like love stories or stories about Vampires and Witches
✓ Watch romantic films
✓ Read Mangas with vampires or Witches
✓ Want to live a love Story
✓ Discover a new otome in English

Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Is.it.Love.Games
Should you have any questions or queries on this otome -> http://support.1492.io

comments: Nice game but the random number generator is non existent. Hold three numbers and roll again, even with free or earned additional rolls, are ALWAYS the same number that was there! This would fail state regulations on gambling games. Fun but a sucker game for rolling anything that counts as statistically random

This is fun, IF you can figure it out. I like playing yahtzee but this is complicated. Every time I get extra dice, the ???? spends them or takes them away from me so I don't get to spend them the way I want to. That sucks.

Love the game! But recently did an update for the app now my game glitches out. Takes forever to roll the dice. Only updated the app cuz it said they fixed bugs & made faster well it did the opposite for my app.

Showdown is a joke!  100% guarantee opponent will get a double Yahtzee every single game.  Their average score is 320+ when a normal person scores 250-275.  Impossible enough to score a Yahtzee yourself but double is almost unheard of.

Playing verse your friends is fun but Playing against the computer is not fun but a complete waste of time. Only way to Win is to Extra rolls with the Dice you have to buy. If you don't plan on losing 2/3 of the time.
The game was awesome until the ads started to pop up every 5 seconds, and the game progressively got slower and slower. Now it's just ads upon ads and lag. Game got ruined quick.

comments: This game is wonderful for me since I'm very Shakey and tapping obsessively is very fun it's a little confusing to upgrade but when you figure it out it's very fun I loved it and recommend this to everyone
Fun

The game has bugged out now the hero's that did the time challenges are stuck I cant get them back.  I think it happend when the anniversary update hit and I put them in a time challenges during the time.  When I prestige and go to the time challenges it goes straight back to the main menu. And when i do have hero's  in the adventure mode it cuts to them when I pick the time challenges.  Please fix this.  And also happy anniversary üòÄ   Problem was fixed thank you very much!üòä

The game is fine but like all mobile games or eventually gets to the point where it's purely about you parting with money to proceed. That being said even tho this game uses ads for it's reward system it's actually quite pleasant, at no point did it become ridiculous or over the top. I really do appreciate how much of a back seat it it feels like the adds are taking to gameplay.

Almost A Hero is an incredibly fun game with lots of interesting heros to use to battle near endless hordes of baddies. I find myself loading up the game multiple times a day to grab the free chest as well as to push through another couple waves before my next prestige. I highly recommend this to anyone interested in this genre!

Update: Ads are broken. I watched almost any that were presented to me in order to get farther faster but now they literally always load up a few seconds, then the game like restarts and I get jack from it. Dudes! Please fix, I am so very rarely addicted to a game like I am/was with this!!  Literally the best clicker/idle game I've ever played. I was glued to my phone for all of my free time five days straight because new and awesome stuff kept getting unlocked.

descriptionHTML:
Almost A Hero is probably one of the most addicting RPG clicker games you will find out there today. In this incremental RPG clicker game, you will meet 13 wannabe heroes, also known as the most useless idiots to walk this earth, who embark on a quest to be slightly less useless idiots.

They say never give a loser an even chance. We say different.

Your team of almost heroes is a bunch of deeply unique and deeply flawed individuals who have been chosen for greatness. Heroic, noble, enlightened... Just 3 of the many words they can’t spell. They will set off on an epic journey that will turn them from zeroes to almost heroes. Or dead people. More likely the latter.

Join these zeroes on a quest to become (almost) heroes in an ancient land. Train them to learn battle skills, magical powers and which end of a sword is the business end.

If you are into clicker games, RPG clicker game or incremental idle games, get ready to discover your next serious addiction with “Almost a Hero - RPG Clicker Game”.

In AaH you’ll find heroes with upgrades, quests, ancient artifacts and secrets to unlock. Oh, and there’s lots of clicking to do. Yup, that’s what clicker games are all about. Have you nearly got what it takes to become almost a hero?

Download one of the most addicting clicker games, Almost a Hero - RPG Clicker Game today and lead your idle heroes to victory before it’s too late!

comments: Not really easy to understand how to get started playing the game. I had to figure out a lot of it for myself but having to do that got frustrating so after a few days I just decided to uninstall it. It presents as cute and entertaining but trying to learn a game with minimal instruction doesn't give a great first impression

This is one of my favorite mobile games. My only issue recently is I spent money on coins after a level to finally finish it but the game crashed and I ended up having to start the game over smh it keeps crashing but this is the first time it crashed without fixing itself...hope you guys do something about that

Update: I read where you stated" Our developers only release levels after they personally ensure that levels  are beatable without the use of purchase's".  I was wondering, do they play a level for a week like I am so far trying to complete it? Are they really playing or it's what the computer tells them? I doubt that any of you are actually playing this game.

I have played this game for months and it was fantastic until the last 2 updates. After those the levels became so hard it's impossible to beat them without spending money. If you enjoy playing the same level for weeks at a time then by all means download. Otherwise don't waste your time unless you want to spend money.

Fun game but today while I have been playing, when I hit give up it keeps going to the 25 coins for 5 more moves no matter how many times I hit it. I have had to exit the app and reopen it to play the level again without spending coins. I hope this is just a glitch and not trying to get people to spend more money.

I love this game however, it has taken multiple lives from me for no reason. The game starts you off with 5 lives & then I accrued 10 lives from winning multiple lives from extra spins. All of a sudden the lives just disappeared and I was reduced to just 5 lives again. This is the 2nd time this happened to me which sucks cause the game is fun as hell.

descriptionHTML:
It's time you wet your whistle and put a little Peter in your pocket! From the producers of the hit TV show, Family Guy: Another Freakin' Mobile Game features your favorite characters and moments from all 15 seasons of Family Guy.

Follow Peter, Lois, Stewie, Brian, Chris, Quagmire, Cleveland… and Meg on a debaucherous journey through Quahog. Put on your big kid pants because this isn’t your typical candy-coated match game. Time to crush on a whole new level. Filled with absurd hilarity and fun challenges, Family Guy: Another Freakin' Mobile Game is a must-have for fans of animated shows.

Game Features:
LET'S PLAY WITH MATCHES: Match, swap, and play 160 challenging levels featuring your favorite characters and hilarious moments from show.
ENDLESS FODDER FOR FANS: Classic storylines from Family Guy with all-new antics updated regularly.
4 OUTRAGEOUSLY FUN GAME MODES: Fill drinks for Peter, Collect condoms for Quagmire, Uncover makeup for Meg, and more!

COMPLETE LIMITED-TIME QUESTS: Earn collectibles that can be used to unlock iconic character costumes, coins, boosters, Family Guy storylines, and more.

comments: I absolutely LOVE this game!! The stories of each character are amazing! I just wish they had more suitors. And I wish they made more games exactly like this but with a completely new story line and characters. Like, I love the voice animations and how long the chapters are and how long the story line of each person is. I also love how your character talks like a modern day girl when she's at the sengoku era. You don't have to pay to see more about each person either. It's amazing. I Love this app. Please make more!!!! ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è

So, this is my third update. That's how much I love this game üòÇ. Thank you for giving us castle and closet space via game events. Very helpful. I don't have anymore lag issues. And I appreciate the diversity in storylines. No route is the same, unlike other Otome games. Also, the relationship development is fantastic - not too slow or fast. The main character actually talks like a real person and less like a "character". Art is beautiful, too. I just feel bad that I can't say much about the music or voice acting, as I usually have my phone on vibrate.

Idk what to say, but one thing for sure I really loveee this game!!!! Is so awesome, the chara omg so magnificent. I don't mind spending much money on this game hahaha it's so freaking beautiful!!! And I really love the MC she's so strong and cute, it's just like I want to have a route for MC too. But rn I'm waiting for KENSHIN UESUGI route, I hope it will come out soon. Damn, Cybird always make such a beautiful otome game. Thank you for making this game, it just made my lifeüíóüíóüíóüíó

I couldn't resist to do a newer version of the review, so here it is. I've been playing this game for nearly three months now, and that's saying something. First of all, the story is really engaging. The characters are really sweet, and I love how we don't need to spend money to enjoy it, unlike other otome games. Shout-out to the people who made Ieyasu's route a dream come true.

There are only a few routes out currently but they are wonderful all the same. The main character is funny and reacts realistically to situations! Not to mention the voice acting is impeccable like wow I don't speak a word of Japanese but everytime Nobunaga speaks I'm just nodding along. Also this game has an adorable animated series and it is the best

The most romantic and sweetest experience of falling in love game..  I feel like I'm truly falling in love with Masamune date.. Love his playful side, his sweetness,  fierce yet gentle  sometimes.. The only reason I CANNOT RATE 5 STAR is I cant read back the route chosen even though I have spent actual money..  Its like I'm purchasing the story,  but the fact is,  I'm not.. This is frustrating..  Atleast after having spending so much money,  we can keep the story to be read again afterwards..  Please reconsider this..  Thank you
description: You've just nabbed your dream job as a fashion designer when you're sent hurtling back in time to an alternate version of Sengoku era Japan! After accidentally changing history and earning the favor of warlord Nobunaga Oda by saving him from near death, you must survive 3 months surrounded by Japan's most famous and handsome Sengoku warlords before your next chance to make it back home. In a world where it takes one man to conquer a nation, do you have what it takes to conquer his heart?Ik√©men Sengoku: Romances Across Time, one of CYBIRD's most popular games in Japan, is finally out in English! Enjoy a vibrant, exciting story complete with engaging music, gorgeous illustrations, and character voices! Receive 5 free Chapter Tickets each day to progress through the story! Free to download! Play now and find your one and only Sengoku love!‚ñ†Enjoy Characters voiced by some of Japan's most popular Voice Actors!Nobunaga Oda (Voice: Tomokazu Sugita)Masamune Date (Voice: Kazuki Kato)Yukimura Sanada (Voice: Kensho Ono)Ieyasu Tokugawa (Voice: Toshiki Masuda)Hideyoshi Toyotomi (Voice: Kohsuke Toriumi)Shingen Takeda (Voice: Yuuichiro Umehara)Mitsuhide Akechi (Voice: Shunsuke Takeuchi)Mitsunari Ishida (Voice: Yoshitaka Yamaya)Kenshin Uesugi (Voice: Hiroaki Miura)Sasuke Sarutobi (Voice: Kenji Akabane)Kennyo (Voice: Tarusuke Shingaki)‚ñ†Collect Gorgeous Illustrations!With each character route, you receive 3 beautiful illustrations of your guy that will suck you right into his story! You can also receive illustrations through special in-game events!‚ñ†Cute Avatars for Every Girl to Enjoy. Dress Up Your Guy As Well!Experience more interactive otome gameplay with the in-game avatars!Extravagant kimono, beautiful Japanese rooms and gardens, and cute accessories all await you in this game.Collect hundreds of attire pieces to adorn your avatar. Limited edition attire pieces are constantly being added so that you can always stay up to date with the latest trends! Characters from the story are also available as avatars!Dress up your love interest for the perfect day out together.‚ñ†Shape Your Story through the Choices You Make!In Ik√©men Sengoku, there are multiple endings available for each guy depending on the choices you make in the game. If you get enough points you might even receive a special epilogue with your one true love! Which happy ending awaits you? descriptionHTML:
You've just nabbed your dream job as a fashion designer when you're sent hurtling back in time to an alternate version of Sengoku era Japan!

After accidentally changing history and earning the favor of warlord Nobunaga Oda by saving him from near death, you must survive 3 months surrounded by Japan's most famous and handsome Sengoku warlords before your next chance to make it back home. In a world where it takes one man to conquer a nation, do you have what it takes to conquer his heart?

Ikémen Sengoku: Romances Across Time, one of CYBIRD's most popular games in Japan, is finally out in English! Enjoy a vibrant, exciting story complete with engaging music, gorgeous illustrations, and character voices! Receive 5 free Chapter Tickets each day to progress through the story! Free to download! Play now and find your one and only Sengoku love!

■Enjoy Characters voiced by some of Japan's most popular Voice Actors!
Nobunaga Oda (Voice: Tomokazu Sugita)
Masamune Date (Voice: Kazuki Kato)
Yukimura Sanada (Voice: Kensho Ono)
Ieyasu Tokugawa (Voice: Toshiki Masuda)
Hideyoshi Toyotomi (Voice: Kohsuke Toriumi)
Shingen Takeda (Voice: Yuuichiro Umehara)
Mitsuhide Akechi (Voice: Shunsuke Takeuchi)
Mitsunari Ishida (Voice: Yoshitaka Yamaya)
Kenshin Uesugi (Voice: Hiroaki Miura)
Sasuke Sarutobi (Voice: Kenji Akabane)
Kennyo (Voice: Tarusuke Shingaki)

■Collect Gorgeous Illustrations!
With each character route, you receive 3 beautiful illustrations of your guy that will suck you right into his story! You can also receive illustrations through special in-game events!

■Cute Avatars for Every Girl to Enjoy. Dress Up Your Guy As Well!
Experience more interactive otome gameplay with the in-game avatars!
Extravagant kimono, beautiful Japanese rooms and gardens, and cute accessories all await you in this game.
Collect hundreds of attire pieces to adorn your avatar. Limited edition attire pieces are constantly being added so that you can always stay up to date with the latest trends! Characters from the story are also available as avatars!
Dress up your love interest for the perfect day out together.

■Shape Your Story through the Choices You Make!
In Ikémen Sengoku, there are multiple endings available for each guy depending on the choices you make in the game. If you get enough points you might even receive a special epilogue with your one true love! Which happy ending awaits you? Play to find out!

■Enjoy In-Game Story Events for a New Experience with Your Guy!
Ikémen Sengoku holds many free Story Events that require no Chapter Tickets to continue reading! Play to experience exciting mini stories outside of the main story. Get into new situations with your favorite guys, and clear endings to get bonus items and attire pieces!
Team up with your friends to clear the events faster and get every event ending!


*1・・・Free to Play （In-Game Payable Content Available）

comments: Amazing game very addictive...  Love the fact that they have a specials  more often... Also like the events with the second hospitals... Would like if we had special events more often... Just wish we had a platform to save the game my sister had to restart the game 6 times i had to do it twice... Wou be great to save progress on fb or another platform... Even log in  Really frustrating when we lose progress.... I only need 5 more characters then I'll have them all... So if i lose progress again im not starting over  Overall my favorite game on my phone!! Thx

I couldn't get enough patients, I couldn't get enough cash, and my staff energy seemed to drain way too fast. I love the surgery games but you maybe get one of those a day. I ended up uninstalling when room upgrades said they would take 12 hours. Too much waiting, not enough action. I liked the story so far too. Maybe I'll reinstall in the future if the times go down.

It's a great game at first, but it takes so long to upgrade or save money or anything that you end up spending a lot of your real life money. Plus the surgeries all start to be the exact same, and the glitches... oh, the glitches. Zapped $200,000 out of my bank, and that bloody epinephrine shot is impossible to get without striking out. Oh, and $120,000 for research that will only make you $4,000? Why is everything so time and resource consuming???

Controls don't work properly during surgery! There is lot of lag while performing an action while the timer works properly. Moreover, it doesn't allow me to suture the skin, even if I'm trying to do it right (it worked at the begining). Please fix these bugs or I will uninstal the game...

Love the overall feel of this, though some things need tweeking. For example, I only have half of the staff available and am now getting far too many duplicate cards concidering how many I have left to get. Makes it feel all too much like it's pushing people to spend real money, something that always ends with me deleting the game and moving on. Hope this doesn't happen in this case, but I'm not holding my breath...

It's a nice game, I like the concept, you get to operate on patients and manage a hospital. Problem with the recruitment part, it was always giving me surgeons and wasted 200 hearts on the same person. There should be an option if you want to fire someone or replace with another staff. The biggest issue is with their connectivity, internet connection is very stable works with all apps except for this one, no idea why. Fix it please I would hate to delete this game. Thanks.
description: Perform challenging surgeries, manage your own hospital, and experience hospital drama in Operate Now: Hospital! Game Characteristicsüöë  Play the most realistic surgery simulationsüöë  Build your own hospitalüöë  Hire new medical staff members and train them to save livesüöë  Unlock and carry out researches from the all new medical research departmentüöë  Dive into two captivating seasons üöë  Stay tuned! We‚Äôre continuously developing and adding new missions and contentPERFORM SURGERIESPerforming challenging surgeries is at the heart of Operate Now: Hospital. Removing foreign bodies, repairing bone fractures, and performing tracheotomies are only some of the realistic operations available. As a surgeon, you will need a steady hand to both make flawless incisions, and carefully operate on patients. Time to throw on the scrubs!BUILD YOUR OWN HOSPITALBuild and manage your very own hospital with Emergency Rooms, Intensive Care Units, and many more departments. You‚Äôll also get to expand and upgrade your hospital to accommodate new departments with newly hired surgeons! It will take a true hospital director to manage such an impressive health care facility!EXPERIENCE A MEDICAL DRAMALive dramatic storylines just like in real medical TV shows. Operate Now: Hospital follows the lives of surgeons and hospital staff members such as Dr. Amy Clarke. As you progress through Seasons 1 and 2, this unique medical adventure will shed light on the mysteries surrounding the hospital, its patients, and its doctors. Play Operate Now: Hospital and experience the medical world firsthand!
descriptionHTML:
Perform challenging surgeries, manage your own hospital, and experience hospital drama in Operate Now: Hospital!

Game Characteristics

🚑 Play the most realistic surgery simulations
🚑 Build your own hospital
🚑 Hire new medical staff members and train them to save lives
🚑 Unlock and carry out researches from the all new medical research department
🚑 Dive into two captivating seasons
🚑 Stay tuned! We’re continuously developing and adding new missions and content

PERFORM SURGERIES

Performing challenging surgeries is at the heart of Operate Now: Hospital. Removing foreign bodies, repairing bone fractures, and performing tracheotomies are only some of the realistic operations available. As a surgeon, you will need a steady hand to both make flawless incisions, and carefully operate on patients. Time to throw on the scrubs!

BUILD YOUR OWN HOSPITAL

Build and manage your very own hospital with Emergency Rooms, Intensive Care Units, and many more departments. You’ll also get to expand and upgrade your hospital to accommodate new departments with newly hired surgeons! It will take a true hospital director to manage such an impressive health care facility!

EXPERIENCE A MEDICAL DRAMA

Live dramatic storylines just like in real medical TV shows. Operate Now: Hospital follows the lives of surgeons and hospital staff members such as Dr. Amy Clarke. As you progress through Seasons 1 and 2, this unique medical adventure will shed light on the mysteries surrounding the hospital, its patients, and its doctors.

Play Operate Now: Hospital and experience the medical world firsthand!

title: Operate Now: Hospital

comments: It's my favourite of all the poker apps on the market so far. Two things I would change... Enable chat so you can say what you want. Also make buying chips less expensive (it's far too easy to go bust, then you can't play unless you spend lots of money on PLAY chips) sort it out please

I'm giving 4 star becuz I need help from you devs! I play GOP3 in STEAM directly in PC & I have an option to synch my steam account to my Android, I tried all the steps that's listed. But it ain't working. Can you help me out? Cuz if u help me, I personally feel you guys deserve a 5 star :)
Now I remember why I deleted this in the first place. Terrible game. Hardly ever win a hand. Too many so called 'players' keep raising so you lose more than you win. Deleting for the last time!

If you continuously win you lose continuously and if you have a lot of chips you'll lose the chips know why? This games is money hungry and wants you to buy stuff I had 25 million and now I have 13 million because the dealer got 20 2 times in a row mabey if you made the cards random and didint do what I complained about I would've gave this 5 stars.
There's a few small glitches but they are always keeping up and listening to players comments to make things better,  bravo! Really fun team challenges separates gop3 from all others.
This game is garbage the daily spin is garbage and the hands are not good ever. Unless your willing to spend money everyday don't bother. IT doesn't respond back to tech issues eith.

comments: Works good on my Sony Xperia XZs. Only problem is if I'm doing an impoppable track and I'm using Monkey Engineers. On those few levels where a mass of regeneration bloons come in, the game lags like hell. My workaround for that has been to be lame and just get sun gods

Bloons TDs have always been a favorite of mine. But I'm only giving 3 stars because of a technical issue that's mind boggling. I'm on a galaxy note 8, and I start to experience game halting slowdown on level 79. I had played this game on my note 4, and could easily double that before the hardware struggled. Please please fix it

I love this game. It works great on my phone.  My only problem is that I had to reinstall it and I don't know how to get everything back. If you could help that would be great. Also to be totally honest, I'm pretty sure I didn't save it to the cloud or my Facebook account.

Extemely good game for pretty much any age or level of play. Easy to get into and there's enough depth of game that it will take a lot of playing to get bored. Also works well on any platform - I have it on my ipad and Samsung phone. :)

I love this game only problem is I broke my phone and had to get a new one. Trying to figure out how to get everything back. I have purchased alot of things. $31000 and now only have $100. Logged in with my Facebook account still nothing. Help!!!! Please so I can get back to enjoying this game!

Too many bugs. In Co op, you can't send money to anyone if anything is under the menu that comes out to give money and the menu covers a good 30% of your side to do so. Also it doesn't let you play towers close to the outside edge in Co op even though you can in single player. And it is SOOOO stupid after every round, it cancels towers you are trying to place. That makes me mad especially since you can't talk to your team mates during a match to tell them to wait so I can place a tower.
description: Five-star tower defense with unrivaled depth and replayability.Build awesome towers, choose your favorite upgrades, hire cool Special Agents, and pop every last invading Bloon in the best ever version of the most popular tower defense series in history.Bloons TD 5 delivers hours of fun and challenging play to fans and new players alike, with awesome features like this:- 21 powerful towers with Activated Abilities and 2 upgrade paths- 50+ Tracks- Two-player co-operative play on custom co-op tracks- 10 Special Agents- 10 Special Missions- 250+ Random Missions- New Bloon enemies - tougher Camos, Regrower Bloons, and the fearsome ZOMG- 3 different game modes- Freeplay mode after mastering a track- 3 difficulty settings and family-friendly theme so anyone can playAnd that's just the beginning - regular updates will keep Bloons TD 5 fresh, fun, and challenging for many months to come. Now it's time to pop some Bloons!Note on Permissions: Bloons TD 5 requests permission to access to read and write to your external storage so that you have the option to interact with rewarded video ads that earn free Monkey Money. If there are ever any problems with the amount of data stored, please contact us at support@ninjakiwi.com.
descriptionHTML:
Five-star tower defense with unrivaled depth and replayability.

Build awesome towers, choose your favorite upgrades, hire cool Special Agents, and pop every last invading Bloon in the best ever version of the most popular tower defense series in history.

Bloons TD 5 delivers hours of fun and challenging play to fans and new players alike, with awesome features like this:

- 21 powerful towers with Activated Abilities and 2 upgrade paths
- 50+ Tracks
- Two-player co-operative play on custom co-op tracks
- 10 Special Agents
- 10 Special Missions
- 250+ Random Missions
- New Bloon enemies - tougher Camos, Regrower Bloons, and the fearsome ZOMG
- 3 different game modes
- Freeplay mode after mastering a track
- 3 difficulty settings and family-friendly theme so anyone can play

And that's just the beginning - regular updates will keep Bloons TD 5 fresh, fun, and challenging for many months to come. Now it's time to pop some Bloons!

Note on Permissions: Bloons TD 5 requests permission to access to read and write to your external storage so that you have the option to interact with rewarded video ads that earn free Monkey Money. If there are ever any problems with the amount of data stored, please contact us at support@ninjakiwi.com.

description: We welcome you to the legendary world of wise Kings, great Lords and valiant Heroes. Walk the exciting path of a city builder and warlord! Assemble an army of faithful warriors in gleaming armor. Create a powerful Order and demonstrate your might to players from all over the world. Glorious victories in bloody battles for supremacy in the Kingdom and the brutal struggle for the ancient Throne are just a small part of all the adventures that await you in the lands of fearless rulers.From the moment you begin the game, the atmosphere of a medieval town in an expansive Kingdom, courageous marches, battles and ancient riches will take you on an unforgettable journey. My Lord, your vassals are waiting for your orders!Throne: Kingdom at War is free to play. You can purchase in-game currency in exchange for real money. It gives you the ability to buy various boosts and items that will make your gaming experience more dynamic and exciting. If you want to switch off this option, you can set a password in the Google Play Store menu to prevent any unwanted purchases.Game features:- Access to a completely free mode- High-grade graphics and sound- Localization into multiple languages- You can create your own Order or join an existing one- Dynamic real-time battles with players from all over the world- Several troop classes to choose from: knights, spearmen, ranged, cavalry, siege, scouts- Armor, weapons and other equipment crafting for your Hero- Numerous quests and errands with valuable rewardsWe are constantly improving the app, making it better and more entertaining. You also can help us sending your feedback and suggestions.Support: http://support-portal.plarium.com/ticketcreator/store/throne/ Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ThroneKingdomAtWarGoogle+: https://plus.google.com/u/0/104394834691619177858Twitter: https://twitter.com/throne_plariumInstagram: https://www.instagram.com/thronekingdomatwarPrivacy Policy: http://plarium.com/#/doc/policy Terms of Use: http://plarium.com/#/doc/terms

comments: Smurfymurf.  Now that's a Smurf! Did they ever mean something to you? Then you just have to get it ! Super nice!!! And technically very well done too !!!   Oooooooooops !!!! Update few days later...   Suddenly the game keeps crashing randomly...   Tried it for days....   Can hardly survive a single level now...    Very sad....   The game itself is still excellent....   Maybe a later update brings a fix..................

This is by far one of the best games I have played like this all year. Very addicting, easy, but challenging enough to keep you wanting to come back play some more. Haven't found something I don't like about this game just yetüòÅ

Fun game, my daughter enjoys playing. ..easy, yet challenging at the same time.  One irritating issue...every time there's an update, or just opening the app, turns on the game's notifications..and have to turn it off constantly. ..otherwise it would be a rare 5 star rating from me.
You can't get anywhere unless you actually use money to buy the power ups to bet the levels. It's a waste of space for any device
Hate it. Too difficult. No helping aid. Not funny, but stressful. I left the game at level 83. Why you made it ugly like this?
Like with all other games this game is rigged, once you get to a certain level you are set up to fail unless you buy coins. I don't play games so I can go broke on coins, I don't like this.

Plarium do not like Aussies. They charge us extra money for offers.   A top end offer is $100 USD for the Americans. Which is $120-125 AUD after currency conversion for Australians. Yet for some reason our offers are $160 AUD. $35 AUD more then we should be paying.   I do not know how this practice has gone without incident as I thought there were supposed to be good anti descrimination laws and consumer laws in place that prevent the charging of extra to countries just because they do not like that country.   This is a morally disgusting practice as it is the same concept as charging more to others purely on the basis because they have a different skin colour, gender or religion.   I want to know why Australians are paying an extra $35 AUD then we should be as other mobile games. One example being Battle Mobile do the correct currency exchange rate and only charge $125 AUD after conversion from $100 USD. If other mobile games do it correctly why are Plarium choosing not to?  Edit: @ Plarium employee who just lied in response to me. Plarium set all prices up themselves through Google Playstore. NOT Google.

description: Step into the next generation of MMO strategy in Soldiers Inc: Mobile Warfare. Train your troops, build your base and command an army against your enemies. Conquer Black Sites and outposts full of resources, and team up with friends to take total control of the battlefield!The year is 2037, and the evil Phoenix Corporation has taken control of Selva De Fuego - the world‚Äôs only source of a new lifesaving serum. The world has declared war on Phoenix, giving every private military and mercenary force a green light to invade Selva De Fuego and do whatever it takes to crush the rogue corporation.This where you come in. As the commander of a division of seasoned soldiers of fortune, your mission is to defeat Phoenix before your rivals - but it won‚Äôt be easy. Standing between you and victory are the most elite mercenaries and devastating weapons on the modern battlefield.Use a cutting-edge arsenal of weapons including advanced assault vehicles, tanks and futuristic military drones to prepare for all-out warfare in the mobile sequel to the award-winning hit Soldiers Inc.‚Ñ¢.NOTE: Please set up password protection for purchases in the settings of your Google Play Store app. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 13 years of age to play or download Soldiers Inc: Mobile Warfare‚Ñ¢Game Features‚úî FREE TO PLAY‚úî Available in the following languages: English, French, Spanish, Italian, German, Japanese, Korean and Russian.‚úî Incredible graphics with motion-captured hero characters and stunning 3D maps.‚úî Compete online in realtime massive multiplayer clan warfare.‚úî Train and upgrade your troops and combat systems to create an unstoppable army.‚úî Develop and deploy the next generation of military weapons across an ever-evolving battlefield.‚úî Attack or Defend - reposition your base and customize your outposts to back up your strategy.‚úî Participate in intense, tactical PvP against players all around the world.‚úî Single-player PvE missions, tournaments, rewards, and achievements.‚úî Forge an alliance, cooperate with teammates and devise strategies to defeat your rivals.‚úî Live operations with hundreds of different events and leaderboards to play across single player and PvP.
descriptionHTML:
Step into the next generation of MMO strategy in Soldiers Inc: Mobile Warfare. Train your troops, build your base and command an army against your enemies. Conquer Black Sites and outposts full of resources, and team up with friends to take total control of the battlefield!

The year is 2037, and the evil Phoenix Corporation has taken control of Selva De Fuego - the world’s only source of a new lifesaving serum. The world has declared war on Phoenix, giving every private military and mercenary force a green light to invade Selva De Fuego and do whatever it takes to crush the rogue corporation.

This where you come in. As the commander of a division of seasoned soldiers of fortune, your mission is to defeat Phoenix before your rivals - but it won’t be easy. Standing between you and victory are the most elite mercenaries and devastating weapons on the modern battlefield.

Use a cutting-edge arsenal of weapons including advanced assault vehicles, tanks and futuristic military drones to prepare for all-out warfare in the mobile sequel to the award-winning hit Soldiers Inc.™.

NOTE: Please set up password protection for purchases in the settings of your Google Play Store app. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 13 years of age to play or download Soldiers Inc: Mobile Warfare™

Game Features

✔ FREE TO PLAY
✔ Available in the following languages: English, French, Spanish, Italian, German, Japanese, Korean and Russian.
✔ Incredible graphics with motion-captured hero characters and stunning 3D maps.
✔ Compete online in realtime massive multiplayer clan warfare.
✔ Train and upgrade your troops and combat systems to create an unstoppable army.
✔ Develop and deploy the next generation of military weapons across an ever-evolving battlefield.
✔ Attack or Defend - reposition your base and customize your outposts to back up your strategy.
✔ Participate in intense, tactical PvP against players all around the world.
✔ Single-player PvE missions, tournaments, rewards, and achievements.
✔ Forge an alliance, cooperate with teammates and devise strategies to defeat your rivals.
✔ Live operations with hundreds of different events and leaderboards to play across single player and PvP.

Whether during combat or rest, you can see each girl‚Äôs motions clearly from walking, swinging her weapon, even when she is seducing. descriptionHTML:
◎Game Intro◎
Ninja Girls is one of the most popular anime style games in 2016, which contains hundreds of 0Anime Girls under master summoners command. Ninja Girls is also a game combined with tactics and manually microing features. Each player has to consider not only the skills composition among Battle Girls, furthermore with enhanced gears and timing on skill casting to conquer tough quests, while enjoying competing with other players in VS Player.
◎Game Features◎
★Conquer Your Path With Over 100 Battle Girls ★
Ninja Girls’s biggest feature is that we have crafted our characters into Japanese Anime style Battle Girls, hundreds of them are leading by master summoners. Each of Battle Girls has her own background story and unique skills. If you wish to dominate the world of summoners, not only you need to know each of Battle Girls’ unique skills deeply, but also require tactics and powerful composition to defeat your opponents.
★Real-Time Micro, Command Your Battle Girls To Cast Their Ultimate Skills ★
Ninja Girls has the coolest animation effect on each skill cast, while the facial and motions on each girls are carefully crafted and drawn by our designers. Whether during combat or rest, you can see each girl’s motions clearly from walking, swinging her weapon, even when she is seducing. Under master summoners command, you only need one finger to give them your orders.
★Timing Cast On Your Skill，Is The Key To Your Victory ★
Unlike the traditional styles RPG Game without any microing！During the battle you have to observe constantly, along with microing on your girls such as interrupting on your opponent’s skill casting, change on your skill directions, crowd control skills on opponent’s girls etc. Another feature of Girl X Battle，experience the joy of giving your Battle Girls command in the battle field, even players with lower Attack Power can win against players with higher Attack Power!
★Buying Drinks From The Campus Store, Full of Academy Elements ★
It has been a month since summer recess, don’t you miss the breakfast sold on campus? In Ninja Girls，you may even face variety quizzes as in the actual school. Besides the Battle Girls' world we made, there are numerous tasks await you to conquer. If you favor in PVP, try to fight your way up to the Top Floor!
────────────────
Visit Ninja Girls’ official Facebook page to participate on our wonderful events, and earn your great rewards! (Hint: Search Ninja Girls in Facebook)
────────────────
For Latest Events and Guides！！Please Click The Link Below↓
☞Official Facebook Page：https://www.facebook.com/ng.coco2games/
☞Ninja Girls Customer Service E-mail：ng@coco2games.com
Our development team will cherish every player for trying Ninja Girls, and thank you for your support!

comments: WOW. This game has everything! My only complaint is that the "earning" free in game currency section (downloading and playing other games to certain level), does not yield in game currency, so do not bother. Just pay for stuff when it goes on sale. But otherwise, WOW! This is like fanfic, sims, empire, battle, idle, all in one! Hpw often do you get an all in one game based off an amazing franchise?? (As of this date, ive been playing for 2 months, spent $10)

I reckon this is the best game in the world!! I am a enormous fan of how to train your dragon, so i reckon you have done an awesome job at making this game. But, the only problem is i don't like the part when it loads and takes forever, and sometimes it doesn't even load and yo have to use wifi and takes up alot of storage on your device. So i sugest decreasing those things or stopping those things.

First everything went out smoothly. Now the assets keeps on redownloading everytime I try to play it. My phone still has 7gb free memory, I also tried following ghe suggestion to clear up some space it still doesn't work. But overall it was awesome. I just hope the issue of redownloading will get fixed asap.

When you complete a level in the currently available adventure, you may spin a wheel. Why do I always get resources? Do I seriously need 18 cards worth of resources, each card worth approximately 1 million fish or wood? Please tweek the chances of getting something else! I don't even mind getting lots of sage fruit at this point... At least it would be useful. Resources aren't really useful when you are filled up on resources.

Love the game. Just wish it gave a little more direction on what and how to do certain things. And wish you didn't have to wait hours sometimes 19 to hatch an egg. But they do give you the option to pay to speed up the process. Also wish that they weren't so stingy with giving ruins/coins to pay for things they ask you to do.

Love it! I downloaded this for my kids who love the movies and TV series, but I've become addicted! I've spent a bit of money over the roughly 6-9 months I've had it, but I haven't minded. The earn free runes has created issues in random phone calls and spam emails, so I don't use that anymore.   I agree with someone else's comment about the Book of Dragons - I found it much easier previously. Also, I've had a red number on mine for weeks and I still can't work out what it's for...I've searched through the book, I'm searching for dragons when I can, and still no idea what it's about.   I keep getting the download new assets but I know that's because my phone is full and I can't delete anything else LOL. I'm looking to upgrade my phone soon so hopefully it will stop that.  Overall, it's definitely a game I'd recommend (and I have). Thanks.

descriptionHTML:
***Reached No.1 App in Over 85 Countries!***

Build your OWN Berk! Rescue, hatch and train your favorite DreamWorks Dragons! Explore uncharted lands in a vast Viking world!

Join Hiccup, Toothless and the gang to protect your village from the mysterious strangers that threaten peace on Berk. Who are they? And, what do they want from your harmonious homeland? Train your DreamWorks Dragons successfully and they’ll reveal new powers that will help to ensure the future of your island.

Remember…it takes a village...and DRAGONS!

Features:
• Discover all your favorite DreamWorks Dragons from the movie, including Toothless, Stormfly, Hookfang and Skullcrusher
• Collect and grow over 350 different Dragon species, like Deadly Nadders, Monstrous Nightmares and Typhoomerangs
• Complete missions with all the characters from DreamWorks Dragons
• Stunning visual & audio effects with 3D animations

This is YOUR Berk. It's time to RISE!

comments: Hey... I would give this game 5 stars but there is 1 main -VE POINT. FUEL takes TOOOOOOOO LONG TO RECHARGE.  The point of this game is to playyyyyy the game. I don't want to keep waiting. I downloaded your great game TO PLAY it. Please try to solve this issue. I will definitely give you 5 stars if you fix this. Please listen to us and read our comments. Most of us are mentioning this 1 -ve point. Thank you

Great game but seriously?  The feul tho.  It takes 30 minutes to charge and it's only 5 as the limit.  Cmon that's bad!  I love this game and it has great graphics and it's a great time killer but please make the fuel like to 10 or make it 10 minutes to recharge.  If so I'll rate 5 star$

This game deserves to be the best game of the year. Its so simple and yet mesmerizing. It is also very fast so you won't get frustrated and could play this game for hours (or until the fuel runs out :-P). This game is quite exciting and the visuals are also nice. This game deserves more than 5 stars. The music blends in quite well and jobs make it more fun. Their are many sources from which you can get rewards which makes it easy and challenging to play. I love this game. Also you can buy more fuel slots in the shop for 100 diamonds. Its expensive but I don't need it beacuse I have to keep track of the time and only play until the fuel runs out.

Really good idea let down massively by the developers. Progress is extremely slow due to fuel taking so long to recharge and having to use gems to buy new vehicles. So unless you want to spend all your money on a free game, it doesn't really feel like you're getting anywhere.

Not too bad. I would have like to see the car while playing, and the graphics could be a touch better. I would honestly like an option between dragging your finger and using buttons on either side of the screen. That alone would have given this a 5-star rating from me

It shouldn't be easier to level up rather than actually playing game. I wouldn't say that the gameplay is difficult to play, but the purposefully placed trucks that shoot you is a bit ridiculous. Other cars are in the way which ultimately eliminates you before you can attack the shooting trucks. There really is no challenge except trying to beat your previous score. I give this game an eh out eh.

descriptionHTML:
From the creators of Otome games for FREE with ＜32 million DLs＞ comes the newest romance game, Lost Alice!
Open the door of destiny to Wonderland. Let the classic characters of the immortal masterpiece, Alice’s Adventures in Wonderland, amaze you. Who will you choose to shape your future with?

◆ABOUT LOST ALICE
“You’ve come here, neither following the White Rabbit nor in response to the Queen of Hearts.
You’ve come to Wonderland of your free will.”
--The key to solving all the mysteries is your lost memories.
“My Alice, I’ve been waiting for you for so long.”
“I told you, I’m not Alice!”
--You remember nothing but your name. They call you Alice.
Elegant tea party with the Hatter. Temptations from the Cheshire Cat. The golden afternoon with Joker. While the days in Wonderland never cease to entertain you...you find your true love.
Whose “Alice” will you be?

◆WONDROUS MEN THAT WILL FALL IN LOVE WITH YOU:
Luke Estheim - The Hatter
“You don’t have to worry, about anything...”
This quiet and mysterious gentleman calls you by your name, not “Alice”, unlike the other residents of Wonderland. Luke keeps a secret, along with his sad yet passionate feelings for you...
His secret lies in your lost memories.

Kyle Knock - Cheshire Cat
“The only one I want to touch, to have smile at me is you, my Alice.”
Possessing a charming pair of cat ears and a tail, Kyle seduces you with a mesmerizing smile. He takes the role of the guide of Wonderland, while acting overly affectionate. You can’t understand the reasons behind it at first, but once you get to know why he had been waiting for an “Alice” more than anyone else, you will understand your feelings for him as well.

Joker Braze - Role unknown
“To think that we would be reunited here...it must be fate tying us together.”
Wielding magic with his playing cards and playing with others with his words, this badboy takes a liking to you and, before you know it, you must go on your adventure with him. As your bond deepens, you notice that Joker and you have something in common.

I was able to confirm the order and they "added it to my account". The problem is I still haven't gotten it. And I've sent screenshots showing I have not gotten it. I've purchased several other packs of various prices and I've received them all, but I've still, to this day, not received the hundred dollar one. I keep getting bounced around and told "just do a hard reset" which I've already done several times as well as turning off my phone and everything. That doesn't explain why I've gotten the other purchases but not this one. On top of that, the "help" I've been getting has been taking longer and longer to even respond, each time though I'm getting the same unhelpful answers.  If it was five dollars I would have just forgotten it, but I'm being screwed out of 100 dollars with no answers. I'm extremely disappointed.  Buyers beware.

Pretty cool game. I did buy the small star pack and it never showed up. Kinda lame. If someone could look into it that'd be great. I would just like to receive the stars. Not a refund. Please and thank you

So...I'm thinking Kim kardashian again puts her name on something that would flop...but this is surprisingly a great game. I'm addicted to trying to level up etc. Worth a download.   Update- game won't start.  I'm losing progress in the game. Hope this gets fixed soon

comments: Absolutely amazing game!!! I'm a huge petrol head and this ticks all boxes considering it's a phone game. Love the controls. Personally i use accelerator on right, brake on left and tilt to turn. Feels bang on. Graphics top notch. No need to spend money to progress. Literally one downfall... upgrade costs when you get higher spec cars. Apart from that... GOOD JOB!!!

Good game, good graphics,good sound. I like that it is on going, not like some similar games. I found it fairly easy to get used too. Plenty of choices and cars. I like that you are not constantly forced to spend real money in order to progress. That is a big plus for us game players. Well done all at EA, you have a real winner with this game. I personally am loving playing this game. Update, I have been playing for a few days now, the only drawback I have noticed is, the game takes up a lot of space on my device. Having said that, its so good its worth it. As previously, well done all at EA.

Excellent game! I have no doubt that the game is one of the most perfect games. Everything but one thing. I just ran one race that comes with the actualization and I won around 5k, te first upgrade for the camaro Nascar costs around 130k does that even make sense. In the real life if you spend that money to make a competitive car to win that money... I hope you get my meaning

The MOST AMAZING racing game in the mobile device. The gameplay, graphics, and the controls were perfect. Also, the tracks in the game were so real like I was racing in real life. I also loves the cars that were added in this game, it looks so amazing. But, what I like the most from this game was online real-time racing. There were no other racing games that has this feature. Just have suggestions, add custom race mode. In this mode, you can chose tracks, daytime, amount of opponents, and also the laps. And also enable to invite friends to custom race mode. Also, probably adding weather system will be better. Last, make the cars could do rev-bombing. So, at the start of the races, you could have some pretty good start. Although, keep it up Electronic Arts & Fire Monkeys. Hopefully, these suggestions could help the game become much better and better.

Well,to start off, game really speaks for itself.Everything is pretty dope. I'm just going to name some things that I'm sure most of the people wants. -Dynamic weather conditions,how amazing snow day on Bathurst would be?Rain,wind,foggy... -Breakable parts, mirrors, spoilers,even wheels,and those should be on the tarmac whole race. -Drift events, I'm just going to say,we all want it. -More hatchbacks definitely,and more cars like its Jeep,or Ford Raptor,and you can add unique cars from movies,etc. -And sprint events,point to point.How fun is that. -More mountains!!! Please. Peace!

the graphic, control, and gameplay is good as always, but the problem is, i played this years ago just with a device with 1gb RAM and i have mid-high graphic setting, but now im running with oppo a37f and i think it can run this game with a mid or mid 2 graphic setting... but no, my game always set to the lowest graphic, could you guys fix this problem? i love this game and i'd like to enjoy it in its best performance

descriptionHTML:
**#1 Top Free App in over 100 countries**

Real Racing 3 is the award-winning franchise that sets a new standard for mobile racing games – you have to play it to believe it.

This app offers in-app purchases. You may disable in-app purchasing using your device settings.

Over 200 Million Downloads!

TabbyAwards 2014 – WINNER: Best Action, Adventure, Arcade & Racing Game
Mobile Excellence Awards – WINNER: Best Mobile Game 2013
Game Connect Asia Pacific – WINNER: Game of The Year 2013, Technical Excellence, Excellence in Art
Meffy Awards – FINALIST: Best Mobile Game 2013

Real Racing 3 features an ever-expanding roster of officially licensed tracks with 39 circuits at 17 real-world locations, a 43-car grid and over 140 meticulously detailed cars from top manufacturers. Plus Real-Time Multiplayer, Social Leaderboards, Time Trials, night racing, and innovative Time Shifted Multiplayer™ (TSM) technology, allowing you to race anyone, anytime, anywhere.

**This is a resource-intensive game featuring extremely high quality visuals. Please make sure you have at least 1.5GB of free space on your device.**

PRAISE FOR REAL RACING 3
“Feels a full generation ahead of the competition” (IGN, 9.1/10, Editors’ Choice)
“A stunning visual masterpiece on mobile” (Touch Arcade)
“Sets the new standard on mobile for racing games” (Pocket Gamer, 9/10, Gold Award)

REAL CARS
Take the wheel of over 140 intensely detailed vehicles from iconic manufacturers like Ford, Ferrari, Lamborghini, Aston Martin and Mercedes-Benz and test your skills on an authentic 43-car race grid – the most epic racing experience on any handheld.

REAL TRACKS
Burn rubber on a full lineup of 17 real tracks in multiple configurations from top worldwide locations, including Silverstone, Hockenheimring, Le Mans, Dubai Autodrome and many more.

REAL PEOPLE
Go bumper to bumper with friends and rivals in global 8-player, cross-platform, real-time racing with drafting. Or drop into any race to challenge their AI-controlled versions in Time-Shifted Multiplayer™.

MORE CHOICES THAN EVER
Compete in over 4,000 events including Cup races, Eliminations and Endurance challenges. Choose from a wide range of upgrades to maximize your car’s performance. Customize your car with a huge collection of paints, vinyls and rims. View the action from a variety of camera angles, tweak the HUD and fine-tune the controls to your personal preference.

THE PREMIER RACING EXPERIENCE
Powered by the remarkable Mint™ 3 Engine, Real Racing 3 features detailed car damage, fully functioning rear view mirrors, and dynamic reflections for truly HD racing. Enjoy a rich, next-gen game with the most advanced cross-platform social and competitive racing community ever. Real Racing 3 delivers it all and pushes the boundaries with every update.

Welcome to the definitive racing experience.
__
User Agreement: terms.ea.com
Visit https://help.ea.com/ for assistance or inquiries.

EA may retire online features and services after 30 days’ notice posted on www.ea.com/1/service-updates

Important Consumer Information: requires a persistent Internet connection (network fees may apply);Requires acceptance of EA’s Privacy & Cookie Policy and User Agreement.
includes in-game advertising; collects data through third party analytics technology (see Privacy & Cookie Policy for details); contains direct links to the Internet and social networking sites intended for an audience over 13.

descriptionHTML:
Play the card battle game downloaded by over 16 million players worldwide in WWE SuperCard!

Start collecting thousands of cards featuring your favorite WWE and NXT Superstars, Legends and WWE Hall of Fame Inductees. Play highly competitive Player vs Player (PVP) Leagues and rise up the unified PVP leaderboard system. Improve your card battle strategy in new arenas like Monday Night Raw, SmackDown Live, and NXT! Test your skills in the new Elimination Chamber PVP mode, and a whole lot more.

Collect every Superstar to create a powerful card deck, step into the ring, and prove you’re the best in the world!

WWE SuperCard Season 4 has finally arrived with over 250 new cards across 3 brand-new tiers!

WWE SuperCard Season 4 includes:

CCG - START COLLECTING CARDS
-WWE SuperCard introduces 250 new cards across three new tiers–Beast, Monster and Titan.
-WWE Superstars like Roman Reigns, AJ Styles, Sasha Banks and Braun Strowman are all collectible

PVP CARD BATTLES - ONLINE MULTIPLAYER LEAGUES & MOMENTUM
-Level up your deck to become the top ranked SuperCard player in the world!
-Check WWE SuperCard’s new unified leaderboard and League system for PVP game modes.
-Win PVP games and earn Competitive Points based on your rank to get even better rewards.
-PVP Competitive Points can be used in the CP Store to get new cards, cardbacks, and packs!
-Unlock powerful boosts with the new Momentum system to defeat champions and prepare for the next League.

Battle for the KING OF THE RING title
-Card battle in the ever-popular ‘King of the Ring’ mode with an all-new bracket structure!
-Tournament gameplay – Battle head-to-head in groups of eight during the 32-player tournament.
-Keep wrestling to earn awesome rewards for each stage you advance.

POWER UP YOUR DECK IN OPEN CHALLENGES
-Collect and earn tickets each day by completing new daily and event-based challenges.
-Collecting powerful cards is easy when you redeem your tickets for more rewards!

NEW GAME MODE – ELIMINATION CHAMBER
-PVP Mode – Elimination Chamber is the first mode to feature an all-female Superstar deck!
-Use strategy and skill to prove you’re a wrestling technician in head-to-head, deck-elimination gameplay

Build a deck of your favorite WWE Superstars!

Download WWE SuperCard now to start collecting Superstars today!

***Update requires OS 4.2.1+ WILL NOT RUN ON ANY EARLIER OS***

comments: Well after playing all the battleships games on Google play store I must to say that his one is the best of all. The game have the best graphics, the best gameplay and one of the most important things in my opinion there is a lot more ships and different types of ships than the other games. So if you enjoy playing games about battleships I recommend you to play this one instead of the others. The only negative thing that I found is the lack of ships in some countries except for Japan and USA, it would be great if they add all ships that are present in the PC version.

Excellent Game overall. Good graphics and controls (once you get used to how a ship moves) feels very real. Gameplay is fair but challenging and is addictive when trying to LVL up. Costs are reasonable but bonus cold be higher for premium account when compared to console prices. Customer service very good. I had a loading issue and advice was prompt and issue is resolved. Would edge about 4.7 out of 5 for me.

Fun game at first and got all the way to a tier V battleship!! It was fun until I started going against OP destroyers. I can broadside that tiny ship two of three times but it doesn't matter. Couple of torps and down I go. They move faster than i can track. Will be going back to Battle of Warships.

The game in general is great but torpedoes are just too powerful. I can't even hit the destroyers with their speed but now with their infinite torpedo supply that always seems to reload faster than my guns I can't even stand a chance? No fun at all. If anything you should follow battlestations Midway and Pacific. They're models completely balanced everything. Torpedoes were powerful there but they took awhile to reload and were finite. Thus you couldn't just spam. If you missed you lost out and had to do it the old fashioned way. Either nerf torpedoes or buff BBs cause otherwise it just isn't fair.

Very well executed port of a good game. Mostly sane monetization. The only problem I see is the premium price. In desktop version it is slightly less than 10$/month which is on the cheap side for MMO and makes a very good proposition. Mobile version is almost 30$/month which is frankly too much. I may consider 10$, or even 15$ per month (same as AAA MMO games on desktop with a ton more content), but not twice the price, especially for a mobile time killer.

Please give us the option to disable Auto Target Tracking in settings.  The auto tracking can cause you to fire at ships your not wanting to target, especially if there lined up side by side. And cause your shots to fall way short or too far if the enemy ship is coming straight towards you. If love to have the ability to disable this feature in the settings.

description: Play online with players around the world as you try to become the biggest cell of them all!Control your tiny cell and eat other players to grow larger! But watch out: players bigger than you will be trying to make you their lunch. Survive and eat long enough to become the biggest cell in the game! comments: As expected, it looks and performs amazing. Fighting mechanics and modes are pretty innovative and thrilling. It is quite stupid to compare the console version with mobile one. Each one has its own unique style, so they should NOT look the same, cz' each one provides the fans with a different gaming experience. This surely increases the already huge number of fans of Tekken. 5 üåü game

WOW, great memories came back. Amazing graphics, and story is going good so far. Only thing is the controles, I mean you should have given the original TEKKEN controls with the moves n all. Its now like a small kid can play. Their is no fun n pressure of making the right punch or through as the good old days. If you guys can make a lit like that, then its will more gold in a gold mine. Otherwise is a nice game.  Thank you

Samsung Galaxy S6... Alright, they went and fixed the release bug crashes within a day or two. I finally got to enjoy the game. It's pretty decent. I'm enjoying the whole fighting/build your characters concept. As promised, I've raised my rating. (Probably could give more on the post mission drops) other than that, I love how there isn't a limit to how many missions you can do and have to wait for an energy bar to replenish. Great game so far. (Give more on the drops though lol... seriously)

First off, the thought of the game and concept of direction it went in for a mobile game is fair, I'll give it that. But... I will say, being one of the best franchises ever created, I expected more. Not another knockoff style of Marvel and DC's (and MK's) style of fighting game. I expected originality from an original creator. The having to heal and near impossibility of play at a certain point (unless you pay a lot...) steered me away from it, tbh.

As a long time Tekken fan I am happy that we have a version for mobile. I am also quite impressed with how smooth the gameplay is. The graphics are impressive for mobile. I'm underwhelmed by the controls though.  For me Tekken is all about the controls, and while I didn't expect a full controller interface. I feel like there could have been a better control layout available. Also the interface and game play menus feel quite busy, like there is too much going on. They could take a note from the wb fighters on mobile in this regard.

As a lifelong Tekken fan this game is about as good as you could get for a mobile game. Sure there's microtransactions but they don't feel shoved down your throat and you'll get a decent amount of fun before they feel remotely neccesary. The gameplay is good, simpler but as concise and impactful as it always is. The only thing that I've found off putting so far is some of the writing is a bit... off. Just some out if character stuff but the story dialogue is mostly setup so it's not too bad.  Overall this is definitely worth a try if you want Tekken on the go.

descriptionHTML:
Enkelt & beroendeframkallande ordspel
Ordmästare är en ny och rolig version av de klassiska ordspelen. Du drar helt enkelt bokstäver för att skapa olika ord. Det är lätt att spela och roligt att mästra. Med detta ordspel kommer du upptäcka hur fantastiskt roligt och beroendeframkallande det är att söka ord.

Mer än 2 000 nivåer
Vårt ordspel börjar med enkla och vardagliga ord, och innehåller tusentals olika nivåer som du kan spela på. Många nya nivåer kommer att uppdateras i framtiden.

Utmanande att hitta alla ord
Är det inte tillräckligt för dig att hitta ord på enkla nivåer? Utmana dig själv att hitta alla extra svåra ord, för att få bonusar. Om du fastnar på vissa ord kan du använda ”Blanda” eller "Tips" för att komma vidare. Du kommer bli överraskad över hur svårt det kan vara att hitta även lätta ord.

Bästa hjärngympan
Ordspel är bäst för hjärnansgympa och stavningsförbättringar. Vårt ordspel är ett av de mest spännande anagram- & ordsökningsspel som utmanar ordsökningsfärdigheter i alla åldrar.


FUNKTIONER
- Dra bokstäverna för att skapa ord
- Hitta extra ord för att samla mynt
- 2000+ nivåer som du kan spela
- GRATIS att få dagliga bonusmynt
- Tryck på "Blanda" -knappen för att ändra bokstavsordningen
- Tryck på "Tips" -knappen för att få ledtrådar
- Passar både barn och vuxna som vill träna ordsökningsförmåga
- Du behöver inte internettåtkomst så du kan ha kul med ordsökningsspelet när som helst
- Enkelt att spela och svårt att mästra
- Helt GRATIS för alla spelare

Om du gillar korsord eller ordsökningsspel borde du definitivt prova det här ordspelet. Det är lättare att lära sig än korsord, och mycket mer beroendeframkallande.


KONTAKTA

comments: Would of given 5 stars if it wasnt for the 300 energies as it doesnt go very far, would be better if it refilled twice a day instead of once. Why do you have to spend money on special scenes they should be unlocked if you picked the right choices not pay for them. Apart from that love the story and the graphics are great if these issues could be sorted that would be great

I downloaded this due to the narrative and the reviews, but I am not a fan of this game. 300 energies (30 sentences) is very short I get through it in about 3 minutes and then you wait an entire 24hours for another. I love the storyline and the graphics so therefore this would be good for someone who is a slower reader. It's a shame but I will be uninstalling.

Wish there was more energy or like an easier way to get more energy. I get 450 energy for the day with the initial 300 and playing the mini game which gives 100 and watching the adds which is 50. But it's not enough I feel like I only get about a couple sentences in and then I run out. Maybe if you could play the mini game every hour or two to get the 100 energy and watch the ads around the same time to get 150 instead of waiting 24 hrs it would be better. The story progresses too slowly with that little amount.

The game has me hooked. I'm big on reading so I fly through the 300 energies. I've spent $10 repeatedly, even $20 for energy and it feels like it was gone in the same amount of time as the 300 energies. If you allowed maybe 4 refills a day, it would be amazing, or some other way, maybe to just keep playing the minigame. There has to be something more other than 20 energies for a video once a day. But despite the lack of energy, this game has me so disgustingly hooked. I love it so much.

I think this game is really good. I just have one problem. Even though it says my energy is full, it feels like I have nothing. And also the mini game 100 energy seems to last longer than the initial 300 you receive. If you could fix this taht would be great. And if it's designed like this can you make energy spending more efficient?

This game really addictive!! The only problem is they don't give you enough energy.üòíyou either have to buy energy or play a mini game to get more energy. The highest energy points that you can get is 100. Plus the 30 points if you watch a video. Other than that the game is AMAZING. The graphics are realistic. It has a lot of romance too. You should definitely download this game if you're not bothered about the energy points.

comments: I really like it, but such a slow start, after the initial offering of goodies i just stumble along with constant death, no weapon, lose my bag every death. Very frustrating.
The team solved all my issues. Beautiful game, new twist on an already good concept. Loving it! Can't stop! Addicted!

Kiefer cloned last day on earth, but with a med evil twist and a dark souls money grab name, it's has the same garbage energy system, but no adds to replenish it, same "multiplayer" if u can call it that (they are ai if u didn't know) and all the sad micro-transaction sales are ripping ppl off and not giving the items perchesed (if u ask me u deserve  it for buying micro-transactions) and the devs don't seem to be fixing this problem or even acknowledging it. But...I am in love with this game it seems to be better than last day on earth with much more depth with the addition  of quests, lore, and the med evil theme as for all the negative reviews I read aboot bad game play seems to some up to too many casuals playing a game that requires skill and patience, yes the game is a grind but that is to be expected from a free to play rpg and if that is not what ur interested in I suggest u avoid this game as the grind is slow and tedious, but if grinding is ur thing this is the game for u, as u lvl up it becomes much more rewarding, and addictive. Can't wait to see what the devs add in future updates (charcoal for fuel would be a nice addition like in last day on earth, more unique events would also be nice) but at the moment I love this game and just can't put it down. Glad to see new updates although I think they missed the mark on some much needed necessities like cooking wood into char coal but I love the fact they added the ability to unbundled progress as I think they have needed this since ldoe was released but better late than never.

Very similar to the dark souls style obviously, I'm frikkin loving it, lovely survival style, it's not hard to survive and it has a great, easy functioning gameplay, only flaw is that it doesn't have a female version of the character...big flaw
Great game, wish there was something to gain more energy, and a hp, or energy lvl cap off, max hp should go up like 2hp per lvl gained. Idk more stats that the player can tweak for gameplay
I'm so suprised no other big shots copying this game like everyone did to clash of clan.

Its inhabitants have turned into endlessly wandering souls. Your goal is to survive as long as you can in this dangerous land. Find an effective strategy for wielding every type of weapon!‚óè SADDLE YOUR HORSEBuild a stable and don‚Äôt miss your chance to gallop into battle against hordes of undead on your war horse or ride through a grim medieval landscape. Call your brothers in arms to cut down damned knights and bloodthirsty witches.‚óè PREPARE FOR THE NIGHTWhen night descends, darkness floods the world, and you‚Äôll need light to escape the terrifying Night Guest.‚óè RECEIVE REWARDSYou may feel alone, but you are not. Take every chance - that‚Äôs the best strategy for survival in the grim reality of this forgotten kingdom.‚óè SOLVE THE MYSTERYSearch for letters and scrolls to learn about the Empire‚Äôs ancient history. Find keys to solving the mystery of your past and the truth behind this unfolding catastrophe.Life in the Plaguelands is a constant battle not only with hunger and thirst but with hordes of undead and cursed beasts.
