comments: The upgrades are too expensive, with no other source of income than just selling fishes that takes forever to grow (if they even grow to adult), and watching ads. I tried to make it work for a day but it's super hard to earn money for upgrades. Even watching ads give so little rewards. Uninstalling. So unfortunate because i really loved the PC version of this.

I gave Fish Tycoon 2 4 stars I have spent a lot of time playing this game, BUT, recently the daily rewards and rewards for task completion which include coins do not work.  You complete the task, you are told you are getting $200 added to you bank account, BUT your $ total does not change.  This makes it hard to get money to spend.  All you can do is breed and sell fish - which takes time.  I reported this and got a prompt response that they are sorry and that they were adding $ and Gems  to my account balances.  Nice, but my $ total did not change.  I did see an increase in my gems.  There is an update 2/21/18 hopefully this will improve some issues.

This app is good but need high battery consumption. I hope new upcoming update can reduce battery consumption. For everyone who complaint about money, just relax, breed your discovered expensive fish first and sell it till you have sufficient money. If you have much money you can discover more species freely in order to find magic fish. It's not about speed but it's about passion, strategy, trial error and patient.

Was kindly givwn replacment eggs and was told weak internet was the issue. Dont know how cause its a small apartment and never had an issue before. Anyway just lost my 3rd set of eggs so deleting for good dont waste your time folks

I have been playing this game for awhile as and I quite like it then the next day I tried to open it but it was stuck on half way when it loaded and it never went forward. Pls fix this and I'll rate it 5 stars.

I fell in love with these developers when I saw a co-worker playing Virtual Families.  It's so cute!  From there, I got into Virtual Villagers and Fish Tycoon.  This second release is better than the first, but it's still the same basic gameplay.  (tip: Don't buy uncommon eggs too early, or you'll be struggling with too many dying rare fish)

descriptionHTML:
** Please note: this game requires an active internet connection! **

A note from the developer:

Hi there! I know you've been waiting a long time for the opportunity to become a bigger and better fish tycoon. I’m happy to tell you it’s your lucky day!! Now you can rediscover and explore the lost magic fish of Isola as you feed, breed, and sell your way from small time merchant to the ultimate aquatic entrepreneur!

Dive into a delightfully fishy adventure of a real-time virtual aquarium with over 400 unique and distinctive fish to discover: it’s an adorable fishtank mania!

Just like a real world, this one will be changing and growing along with the families of pet fish you collect and care for. The truth is, we are a small team and putting everything that we want into these games is not always possible. While you are discovering the world of Fish Tycoon 2: Virtual Aquarium, we’ll be investigating lots of new and exciting changes for the future. We hope to continue working on Fish Tycoon 2: Virtual Aquarium and making it more beautiful, more fun, and more real as the months go on.

Features:

Start with access to 400+ unique species of fish!
Unlock an array of useful upgrades and power-ups!
Renovate your storefront and reveal special surprises to expand your fish empire!
Nurture and cure your fish using magical plants and marine life!
Hire a colorful mascot to draw in the big crowds!
Decorate your tank with a plethora of gorgeous items!
Research advertising, environment and food to sustain rarer species and increase your revenue!

Check out our other hit games like Virtual Families, Virtual Villagers, and more! Bye!

Thanks for playing,
Arthur Humphrey
Lead Designer, Last Day of Work

2269 Chestnut Street #310
San Francisco, CA 94123

title: Fish Tycoon 2 Virtual Aquarium

comments: The game is good,very good, some lags but nothing is 100% perfect anywhere. Support is nice and they respond fast. Perfect game for serious and long term players. People should stop complaining, this game is really worth above a 4 star atleast.   No complaints, a well planned strategic game. Have being playing for near 2 years now.

Don't like how I put a message on world chat or alliance chat and it still has my same message at the bottom after the fact I had sent it already. This game is way to laggy and needs to be fixed. The graphics can use a bit more work to. The shield ok but would be better if they where a bit more see through and a bit of a sparkle kind of color or something the way it is is kind of funny. There should be a dragon we can use to would be awesome to be able to use hero n a dragon but the armor should actually show on the creator to kind of pointless to use it it's not gonna show on them. Other than that the game is awesome n fun to play.

comments: Not really an action game app. If you like Mafia Wars than this is perfect for you.   UPDATE: Downtown Wars is by far not a bad game. The question is it a game for you. The animation is very limited so if you enjoy action then this is not a game for you. The best way to describe what I noticed after playing game for nearly a week, that it is a long level up game of tag. The comment board is one of the best aspects because you can communicate with the community most important you gang/mob members which helps for team building.

Very interesting and a nice game to pass time, love the BGM! Really like the changeable tags, it's so convenient to change it according to our mood/status and the profile erase option without losing the mob WOW! A really big thumps up to that! It also kinda reminds me of Mob Wars and Extreme Mob Wars etc which got me feeling nostalgic because I was really into it but, DTM tops it all! ;) Forgot to mention this, we can put space in our name! That's so convenient! Cool!

I think Elites should be boosted atleast 100 Points - 20 billion then 1000 Points - 40 Billion is 10x the work for 2x the reward.  A huge change could be game breaking but raising it to 80 Billion would give new players a chance against older players that give their minis huge collects every tourney.

Very good game but it could be better. Like when uv got multiple invites u should be able to accept them all in one instead of one at a time. But that's my only gripe. Apart from that it's a brilliant game much better than the dead imobsters. 1 more thing where can we find the boss iron fist who's attacked me a couple of times but I can't find him to attack him back. How can you recover ur account when uv forgot Google account details.

For me with all the rejuvenation down time, I get bored. But when the favors work,  it becomes a really fun game to keep your mind busy.  But by having multiple games like this it's Kool to toggle  between them. The graphics are great.   My Love for this game comes from the interactive game plot. You have to build networks with fellow gamers to rank.  And likewise building enemies.

Great game. I have played this game for years. It just continues to get better.  Recently in last 24 hours my phone crashed and I got it back up and running. But only when I open this game. Does it say UNABLE TO REACH SERVER. I don't know what's wrong. It won't let me open game at all. Plz fix for me

descriptionHTML:
Addictive text based mafia MMO RPG with GANG WARS, TURF WARS, BOSSES, MERCENARIES, HIT-LIST, CITIES, MISSIONS, FIGHTS, TOURNAMENTS and lots more.

Join now and become biggest gangsta in town.
#1 Mafia Game on the Store
(More than 1.5 Million downloads in Android)

Our Players say:
- - -
★★★★★ "Love is one awesome mafia game with the best bits of all."
★★★★★ "Addictive, fun and social. Love this game"
★★★★★ "Soo lovely which makes me dream about a real gangster"

Downtown Mafia - Live to Fight, Fight to Win!
- - -
Plot: A legend returns back to reclaim his old hood... and this time he is gonna take it all. You have Jane (your old flame), Marco (the weapons guy), Luke (he knows his business) and BIG JIM to help you take over the hood.

Game Features
- - -
DTM is one of the most feature rich and diverse mafia RPG ever created. It offers players a unified gaming experience, whether you are on Android devices, iOS, Facebook, Chrome-Store or on your browser, this allows you to run your same pocket gang empire from anywhere.

★ Be what you wanna be, HUSTLER, RUNNER or FIGHTER and build your criminal empire.
★ Master gang MISSIONS (Jobs) in various cities around the world.
★ Become a big time gangsta, FIGHT other mafiosos across other devices and platforms in real-time.
★ HIT LIST your enemies for a sweet revenge.
★ Gain experience in the gangstaz crime city and progress through UNLIMITED LEVELS.
★ Recruit your mob members, BUY new WEAPONS, VEHICLES, ARMOURS and SPECIAL items to arm up your team.
★ Earn unique crime REPUTATION (achievements) for reaching specific goals.
★ Earn SKILL POINTS, upgrade your ENERGY, STAMINA and ATTACK/DEFENCE POWERs rule the Streetz and build your own crime story.
★ Unlock new and exciting missions, powerful weapons and money minting businesses/properties at higher levels.
★ Add your favorites to your CRIME FAMILY to keep them close.
★ Defeat BOSSES at LEVEL 21 and collect them as your heroes / boss Mercs.
★ RIVAL LIST keep tab on your enemies and claim back your honour.

Game Features (GANGS)
- - -
★ Join powerful GANGS and rule the TURFS as a team.
★ Chat with your GANG and equip powerful GANG ARSENALS
★ Engage in GANG WARS and win exciting war rewards.
★ Earn Gang's respect become the GANG BOSS... Or start your own GANG and recruit your members build a new team
★ Capture other GANG TURFS and assign your own Operator to collect hourly payouts send to all your gang members.
★ Capture other GANG OPERATIONS to collect payouts
★ Join DEATH MATCHES to war 3 other GANGS simultaneously... winner takes all the rewards.
★ Send and receive powerful GANG BACKUPS.
★ Find matching gangs with HIT N RUN.
★ Fight automated BOSS GANGS and win exciting rewards and new GANG ARSENALS.
★ Use FREE HITS to revenge rivals who messed with your gang members.
★ Grow your GANG into Cartels.
★ Take part in weekly TOURNAMENTS and win respect in the game for your gang and yourself.

Account
- - -
✔ Sync your account with Facebook, Google, Google Play Games login
✔ Custom Avatars with Gravatar
✔ In-game player profile & live comments.
✔ Live leader boards (Mob-level and Global) to see were you stand against the rest of the players.

Other Supported Platforms:
- - -
Desktop Or Mobile Browser: https://play.dtmafia.mobi
Facebook: https://apps.facebook.com/play-dtmafia
iOS (iPhone/iPad): Search for "Downtown Mafia" in the Appstore

Help and Support
- - -
Email: android@dtmafia.mobi
HelpDesk: http://helpdesk.dtmafia.mobi
Official Facebook Page: http://www.facebook.com/DTMafia
Developer: DYNAMICNEXT (http://www.dynamicnext.com)

comments: This game is so fun I play daily sometimes for hours, but still crashing is a problem especially during events and trial of style. It crashes my tablet a lot and I have to restart the whole thing. With crashes fixed this would be the best game for me

Customer support is great. I got locked out of my game and lost all my data and they had the issue fixed within 24 hours. The game itself is challenging and you can earn rewards so you don't necessarily have to spend money.

VERRY DISSAPOINTING!!! the game play itself I loved, but I'm really upset that I had to start all over again from the beginning and this is not the first time it has happened, since the last time the app was uptaded (automatically) I opened the app and it took me to the first level agin as if I hadn't played at all, all the progress I had (AGAIN) was lost a 2nd time, I really hope that this gets fixed soon and when it does let me know so I can install this game again....sssooooo sad!! :'(
I love playing this game, but it keeps on freezing which is very frustrating also the videos to get free gold does not play.
I love it. Great for my brain. I do wish customer service would get back to me. Other than that, SO much fun to play.
Update fixed it. I can get back in now. Thx

descriptionHTML:
Flo cooks her way to TV fame as a celebrity chef in this fast-paced time management game – COOKING DASH!

Sharpen your skill as you prepare, cook, and serve delicious menu items in each exotic restaurant… in front of a live studio audience! Hear them gasp and cheer as you earn profits in each exciting episode! Quirky customers, superstar VIPs, fast-paced kitchen action, and TV fame await!

Excel as a chef to beat Series Finales and compete in the Trial of Style, where you can earn adorable Pets & Outfits!

COOK YOUR WAY TO STARDOM!
Control the fast-paced chaos as you dash your way around the kitchen, preparing meals for crazy customers! Collect tons of tips for excellent service and make those profits! YOU ARE DESTINED FOR FABULOUS TV CHEF MEGA-FAME!

HUNDREDS OF EPISODES TO COMPLETE!
Tons of fun cooking play across unique restaurant shows like the Vegas-themed Table Steaks, crazy Taco Train, and trendy Hip Stir Cafe with many more on the way!

COLLECT AND UPGRADE!
Wanna get more successful and famous? Spend your profits on upgrades for food and appliances for your restaurant! Upgrade to shiny stoves, fancy food prep stations, and more to ensure all customers get three-star service!

PRIZE WHEELS!
Introducing Weldon Brownie’s brand new game show - Spin to Win! Spin a free Prize Wheel every day to win prizes like Gold, Prep Recipes, VIP Tickets, Auto Chefs, Outfits, Pets, and more!

OUTFITS & PETS!
Dress up Flo in fun outfits themed for each Show, and equip Pets to help you out in the kitchen by auto-serving Prep Recipes!

SERIES FINALES!
Want to test your skill? Face a gauntlet of challenging levels in a Venue’s Series Finale - experts only! Beat every episode in a Venue with 4 or more Stars to unlock!

TRIAL OF STYLE!
Try your luck in the Trial of Style! This multiplayer event features different Venues each time - do you have what it takes to be the best?

PREP AWESOME RECIPES FOR MORE CUSTOMERS!
Make special Recipes in the Prep Kitchen and attract customers with their favorite dishes! They’ll get you more and more famous, drop cool items, and give you special powers to blast your coffers with mega-profits and keep your star on the rise!

BECOME SUPER-FAMOUS!
Fan the flames of your fame as you start your OWN SHOW full of the most elite VIPs coming to see YOU and your amazing cheffing skills! It’s FOOD and FAME for you as you host the hippest dinner parties in the WORLD in front of MILLIONS of VIEWERS! It’s a TV Chef dream come true!

PLAY WITH FRIENDS!
Exchange gifts and compete with friends on your never-ending quest to be the best!

WHAT ARE YOU WAITING FOR?!?
Show your stuff and feed the hungry stomachs -- and fragile egos -- of the guests and VIPs! Download the FREE Cooking Dash® today! THIS IS THE MOST INSANELY FUN DASH GAME EVER!

Cooking Dash is free to play, but you can choose to pay real money for some extra items.

Use of this application is governed by Glu Mobile’s Terms of Use. Collection and use of personal data are subject to Glu Mobile’s Privacy Policy. Both policies are available at www.glu.com. Additional terms may also apply.

FOLLOW US at
Twitter @glumobile
facebook.com/glumobile

description: In this content-packed game for small children (3-9) you will help Alfie build a tree house, so he can get a gift from his imaginary friend Malcolm. While building the tree house floor by floor, you discover many new characters and mini games; pirate duels, house work, magical tricks and sing-a-longs. As the adventure unfolds, you also get a chance to decorate your own tree house! Spoken languages currently included: - English - Swedish - Danish - Norwegian Albert √Öberg, Alfie Atkins, Willi Wiberg, Alphonse, Alfons √Öberg ‚Äì the popular character created in 1972 by Swedish author Gunilla Bergstr√∂m, goes by many names. He is one of our most famous Nordic children‚Äôs characters, known and loved by generations of children and parents through the best-selling series of books. This game is based on the brand new feature film "Hocus Pocus Alfie Atkins", and children from 3-9 will love the game whether or not they already know Alfie. In this game you play as Alfie in an easy-to-play adventure, with many included minigames: - Cooking - Sing-a-long - Dance - Wash Dishes - Treasure Hunt - Vacuum - Play ball - Pirate's Canon - Pirate's Duel - And one final secret game :) We promise hours and days of fun for your young ones, and a beautiful and family-friendly experience. There are NO in-game purchases or 3rd pary advertising in this app. ---- Here are a few press reviews: PappasAppar (SE) 5/5 "Hocus Pocus Alfie Atkins is a very good, content rich, child-friendly and easy-to-play game without any 3rd party advertising or in-app purchases." Aftenposten (NO): 5/6 stars "The activities are so playful and creative that the children wants to play again and again. Hocus Pocus Alfie Atkins is great entertainment for the kids, and can also be played together with parents. You don't need to have seen the movie to enjoy this game." Mors-apps (DK): "The app is very nice, and a type of game i really like. An app that gradually expands, og lets the children co-create the story." Barnevakten (NO): "Hocus Pocus Alfie Atkins" is a very good children's app, and gets our warmest reccomendation"
descriptionHTML:
In this content-packed game for small children (3-9) you will help Alfie build a tree house, so he can get a gift from his imaginary friend Malcolm. While building the tree house floor by floor, you discover many new characters and mini games; pirate duels, house work, magical tricks and sing-a-longs. As the adventure unfolds, you also get a chance to decorate your own tree house!

Spoken languages currently included:
- English
- Swedish
- Danish
- Norwegian

Albert Åberg, Alfie Atkins, Willi Wiberg, Alphonse, Alfons Åberg – the popular character created in 1972 by Swedish author Gunilla Bergström, goes by many names. He is one of our most famous Nordic children’s characters, known and loved by generations of children and parents through the best-selling series of books. This game is based on the brand new feature film "Hocus Pocus Alfie Atkins", and children from 3-9 will love the game whether or not they already know Alfie.

In this game you play as Alfie in an easy-to-play adventure, with many included minigames:
- Cooking
- Sing-a-long
- Dance
- Wash Dishes
- Treasure Hunt
- Vacuum
- Play ball
- Pirate's Canon
- Pirate's Duel
- And one final secret game :)

We promise hours and days of fun for your young ones, and a beautiful and family-friendly experience.

There are NO in-game purchases or 3rd pary advertising in this app.

----

Here are a few press reviews:

PappasAppar (SE) 5/5
"Hocus Pocus Alfie Atkins is a very good, content rich, child-friendly and easy-to-play game without any 3rd party advertising or in-app purchases."

Aftenposten (NO): 5/6 stars
"The activities are so playful and creative that the children wants to play again and again. Hocus Pocus Alfie Atkins is great entertainment for the kids, and can also be played together with parents. You don't need to have seen the movie to enjoy this game."

Mors-apps (DK):
"The app is very nice, and a type of game i really like. An app that gradually expands, og lets the children co-create the story."

Barnevakten (NO):
"Hocus Pocus Alfie Atkins" is a very good children's app, and gets our warmest reccomendation"

comments: I feel inlove with the game the second I opened it! being a huge naruto fan I had high expectations! and most of them were met.  I have two issues! it's seems the only way to get hero fragments is through the shops which is only 10 at a time. or special attack missions which keep changing! makes it very hard to awaken shinobi.  also why only 8 chapters in story mode! You have a whole two anime to base off and we only get 8 chapters! how disappointing.

I am a little disappointed in the game right now. I saved up for the Jiriya banner which is supposed to have a higher drop rate, got one Jiriya card in a multi 10xs summon. I would like to know why that happened seeing as with every other banner I have ever pulled on had numerous cards for that shinobi, sometimes even the full kit minus an ult. I am not looking for an ultimate every time. But when I pull on a banner I would like the rate to actually be reasonable thank you very much.

Everything was working just fine until not long ago. All of a sudden, everytime I try to play any kind of mission on my android, a message will pop up saying, 'Due to an unknown error the game will return to the title screen'. It's been happening for over a week now, I've tried to reinstall but nothing works. Please fix.

4 days ago i was having a problem of playing missions. I couldnt start it because the screen showed "due to an unknown error the game is returning to the title screen". The issue was resolved yesterday and again today the same old stuff. Is this a joke going on with my account?

To BANDAI NAMCO... Just suggesting a few thought about this game. I've taken liken this game more than any other I played so far.  I just thought during the mission about the choosen characters. I think this game will be more stratigical if you can switch characters during the mission. It just doesn't make any sense if the main character you control died right away. Since in a story there's still a chance to turn the table on your side. Just like in Naruto series though their team captain may die the subordinates will carry their will and a chance to win. And in this game,  If the main character died the rest automatically dies though there's still a lot of spare life. Hope you call consider.  Just making suggestion. Your AWESOME making this game BANDAI NAMCO.

I really like this game, the only reason im giving it a 1 star. Is because I've tried to send them a message involving an issue but I cant seem to find the way to do it. In regards to the issue I hope they see this message and fix it, for some reason it wont let me do any missions. I have updated it and deleted the cache but the problem persist.

descriptionHTML:
The characters from TV animes BORUTO: NARUTO NEXT GENERATIONS and NARUTO SHIPPUDEN are finally united in NARUTO X BORUTO!

Create your very own fortress, then attack rival fortresses! Defend your base with strategic and deadly traps while you raid enemy bases with your friends for resources and honor!
Experience a brave new style of ninja battle:
a fusion of action and strategy!

--------------------------
■Game Overview
--------------------------

[Characters]
All your favorite characters are joining the battle, including Naruto Uzumaki, Sasuke Uchiha, Kakashi Hatake, and Sakura Haruno from NARUTO SHIPPUDEN,
along with Boruto Uzumaki
from BORUTO: NARUTO NEXT GENERATIONS!

[Action]
Simple controls that let you perform blazing fast combo attacks and all types of Ninjutsu!
All the heroic action you expect from NARUTO and BORUTO, using beautiful graphics, including powerful Ninjutsu attacks such as Naruto Uzumaki's Rasengan, and Ninjutsu power-ups like Sasuke Uchiha's Sharingan!


[Strategy]
Position traps and the Shinobi that you've trained
to protect your village from other players' attacks, all while
creating your very own ultimate fortress!

[Battle Rankings]
Compete for Battle Rankings by attacking and protecting fortresses. Try to get the
highest ranking by competing with players from all over the country!

[Multi-Player]
Online multi-player missions also available!
Team up with a maximum of 4 players and defeat mighty enemies!

comments: The game is great! Love the handling and graophics... But I would suggest making the drift angle wider. So instead of hitting 90¬∞ and then the counter says "combo broken" it could be something like 100¬∞! Cause I mean... Reverse entries are awesome! And you should make the hoonicorn Mustang 4wd instead of rwd in the drift setup!!

I really enjoy this game. Ive maxed out purchases on tracks n cars, modified them all. Now its TOO hard to gain coins to open cars and much exciting tracks.. no updates on additional tracks.. think the optjons should be reviewed. Its now once you get where you are the only way to gain more is to go online to TRY and get coins to get anywhere... which sucks!!!!!

This game won't let me purchase anything. Everytine I start the app I get the "validation error" pop-up. I've sent mails to support, left multiple comments but nothing happens. I just get ignored. I am truly over his game with the level of support I am receiving, which is absolutely ZERO!

One thing: (two things actually)  Please make the drift school car available to buy with at least in-game cash maybe for a limited time? And please add a feature that gives you the ability to save replays, that would be really cool.

I think it should have ALOT more cars. I also think that they should alow custom decals and visual upgrades. Also a better online platform. Like a real time multiplayer. Other then that it's an OK game.  Its not been over a year and...it seems like they update this game every...6-7 months, really bad. Gets reallly boring ü§¶üèΩ‍‚ôÇÔ∏è

Love the game! But since the update I'm unable to purchase cars/cash. Every time I open the game it says I need to connect to the internet to make purchases even though I'm connected and can still play multiplayer etc. Any help would be great

comments: I finished the last castle on garden island. I have never spent any money throughout the entire game. Every game can be won without spending any money. The game is challenging but that is the fun. I played the same game on my smartphone and my tablet and I have been able to conquer all the islands on both. How about another island? When is a new island coming? I scored over 6,000,000 points on the King's castle to end the game. Get a new island, please.

The only problem I have with this game is the need to rely on friends to help you if you run out of money to pay your ransome.  Because if like me you have no friends who play the same games.. This is a problem that needs to thought out or find another way for the player to hook up with other players.

Great challenging fun only bad thing is I beat it twice reset progress again to start over yall need to add more islands I hate to Uninstaller to make room for another game but please update other than that it's good
Should have more ways to win power ups and bills way more often. Would make it more fun without being haggled into spending my hard earned money on a phone game.
Not bad. Shame the characters are not diverse in this day and age.

descriptionHTML:
Join the candy mania blasting fruit and smashing jelly in this match 3 puzzle game. Complete the puzzles with the best score to improve your farms and produce more fruits, candies and gold for your kingdom! Claim the crown combining candy fruits and blasting cookies and chocolate. Don’t stay frozen and be the most valorous knight of the empire with this original swap and match 3 candy game full of jelly, sweets and jewels!

Download KingCraft - Candy Garden for free! Swap & crush fruits and candies in this Match 3 puzzle quest adventure!

The world of Kingcraft is dominated by some criminal kings and your duty is to rescue the farms, villages and castles. Combine the jelly, fruit and candy of the valley and farms to fill your chest with gold and become the rescuer of the cutest candies, fruits and jellies of the garden.

Fly through lots of cute islands and discover all the candy puzzle adventures and quests: Garden Island, Frozen Island, Dragon Island, Moon Island... Beats the puzzles to own the candies you’ll find in farms, forests or mountains and use power ups to blast and splash all the levels of this charming kingdom.

Join the heroic prince and the brave princess in this candy adventure against the criminal kings. Play the best and funniest fruit and candy game, but be careful and don’t let yourself to be captured in the castle, trying to combine and splash tons of strawberries, lemons, oranges, watermelons… And swap and blast thousands of yummy candies... that is the only way to rescue the cute and delicious garden of Kingcraft.

Surround yourself in this candy fever, travel through all the magical lands and achieve hundreds of villages by swapping or splashing fruits and candies through challenging puzzles. Discover the delightful adventures that await for you and change the way you play on a farm with this puzzle quest game.

Are you tired of candies and farm sagas? Try this ORIGINAL puzzle quest game with a twist!

Check out the delicious fruits, sweet candies, yummy jellies and gummy bears of the royal garden of Kingcraft in this trailer: https://youtu.be/Pu54YYSd5I4


★ GAME FEATURES ★

MANY GAME MODES
Choose your favourite character: will you select the little prince to become the king or will you prefer the princess to become the queen?
Non-lineal gameplay so you can choose how to expand your kingdoms and play at your own pace.
Experience different maps and quests and make the most by obtaining the best score!
You’ll need to farm, match and blast all in the same game!

PLAY WITH FRIENDS
TRY THE JOUST: Free online Events every weekend where challenge your friends in epic clashes. Defeat them and share you candy mania!
Visit the villages and farms of your buddies and compete against them! Who will reach the top of the ranking?
Sync with Google Play Games and Facebook to see the score of your friends, send them gold or ask them for it.

FARM AND REIGN
Discover and forge your own path by defeating all the Lords of Kingcraft and getting their crowns.
Start as a knight and increase your rank by exploding fruits and jewels to rescue and save the princess.
Travels from city to city overcoming the challenges and farming more goods for your empire.
Connect sweet fruits, yummy candies, gummy jelly and shiny diamonds and gems, form power ups, blast them all and fill your chest with tons of gold!

GAME FOR ALL THE FAMILY
Colorful and cheerful, full of amazing light effects.
Easy to play but hard to master, adults and children will enjoy playing!
Adventures, puzzles and quests for boys and girls of all ages!

Download now and start blasting and smashing candy fruits in this highly addictive match 3 puzzle game for free. Will you be able to overcome the magical quests and become the hero of this delicious Candy World?

descriptionHTML:
The time to take action and strike back is now!
We’re calling for the best sniper in the world to take aim at evil, wherever it hides. There’s no room for remorse, so shoot to kill…

THE MOST STUNNING OF ALL SNIPER SHOOTING GAMES
• Over 130 missions
• Unbelievable 3D sniper graphics to make this one of the best games for FPS run & gun fun
• This isn’t one of those ordinary gun games. You’ll use your 3D sniper shooting games skill against soldiers, vehicles & more!
• “Bullet time” effects that shoot all the other FPS gun games away. See your amazing sniper shots from your top games
• Weather effects unlike any other shooting games around

MODERN & FUTURE FPS FIREPOWER
• Take your gun games to the next level as you shoot 3D sniper rifles, railguns and more.
• Upgrade your battlefield arsenal to strike fast and hard at the heart of evil!
• Custom options make your best games even better.

PVP MULTIPLAYER BATTLEFIELD
• Steal resources from players in PvP Multiplayer shooting games.
• Build a strong shooter squad in one of the best games on mobile.

EASY TO PLAY, TOUGH TO MASTER
• Like all the best games, Sniper Fury rewards you for joining this shooting games free and action-packed events.
• Varied AI behavior makes each enemy unique and challenging as you run & gun games to victory.
• Connect to our FPS community for content, contests, rewards & more top games!

TAKE AIM AT THE BEST FPS LEAGUES
• Earn a high enough score and aim to enter the top games league and unlock the best rewards!

TEAM UP IN A CLAN
• Join a 3D sniper Clan with other top games players.
• Trade, chat & share resources with your Clan-mates to strengthen your fellow shooters.

CLAN HQ
• Establish a home base for your 3D sniper Clan to unlock battlefield perks!

CLAN WAR
• The best games are online as you team up with your Clan.
GEAR SETS: As you play your gun games, collect shooter gear to unlock unique powers to strike back at any opponent.
PROTOTYPE WEAPONS: Rush the battlefield with the latest, most state-of-the-art hitman tools you could ask for in any shooting games.
IMPROVED BULLET SKINS: Try the new bullet skins to kill your opponents in style in one of the top games around!
CLAN LEADERBOARDS: Check your Clan’s FPS victories and shoot to the top to win your gun games!
This is one of the best games for fans of FPS action, shooting games, gun games, being a hitman, launching a furious strike on the battlefield, war, and any of the top games for free multiplayer fun!

comments: Screenshots made this game look amazing. But then i loaded this up, and didn't even want to finish the tutorial, (which felt never-ending) because I realized this an exact copy of Hobbits Kingdoms, which I stopped because there was never any actual battles, or  motion graphics. And all of those cool CGi characters don't play as shown in the screenshots. Deleted.

In short this is the perfect pocket game. Strategy meets battles and bloodshed. You can play the game how you like, its not like clash of clans where your forced to be hostile, and it gives you a good start. Honestly, i dont understand why people dont like this game however all the bad reports seemed to be from players of the old game....

Love the game. I've been playing since the realeasd of the game before it became Elves Vs Dwarves. They have done an amazing job with this game. Some things could have been better like a majority of my inventory resetting when i rejoined after the game was bought. But overall a wonderful game either way.

Terrible game. In the original hobbit I was an original world 42, back in dec 2012.  Fully maxed 5 cities 100 billion might every hero in every city was min 250 some were 280. Not to mention had couple hundred mithril left in my account Plus 10s of thousands of troops to unbox.. when i went to update game the merged 6 new worlds and im back to level 1.. lmao stupid move on your end. Loyal player here now gone! Was an awesome game i loved it super fun now... seems to be a joke. Duces

It's ok.. I wish they wouldn't have changed the Hobbit into this. It was a good game but I can't get into it now that they changed everything, I guess they "stole" or used the Lord of the rings without permission, probably copyright issues so they changed everything.. Now it's pretty lame..

In server 179 one player might still 640m his troops still not cleared he still no 1 in might rank as he is a small player name . latrobio  of NOTORIOUS alliance please fix this. All others T5 troops cleared.he have lots of illigal troops of T5

comments: Love the game except for the new update. I have been saving up for a while for an elite pack and now that I have enough to purchase an elite card pack, you get rid of it! I have been wanting a diamond character and now you took it away from me. How can anyone get a diamond level character now. There is no way to purchase them either as they are elite pack exclusive cards. Not very happy. Waiting for this to be fixed until I'm satisfied.

Best game I have played, however after the updates i can't seem to see other game modes like faction wars challenge mode and even quest mode. I have reinstalled a couple of times, I have seen those missing modes in a novice account but whenever I log into my wbaccount they disappear leaving me with normal mode and  the tower mode.

This is so unfair,d last challenge i got was assassin Jade!. I have complained for months now but nothing has been done. It doesnt give me a level playing ground against others. I have missed out on shao khan, tremour, goro and so on. I am feeling left out but dont wanna uninstall. Pls do something

Love the game. Hackers though ruin it, especially in faction wars in hard and fatal battles. For the ones who just updated, faction wars will show up within 12/24 hrs however not sure bout quest mode. Been playing actively for over 2 years, but still don't have All maxed out equipment or all maxed out characters. Hackers have everything maxed out which makes a mockery of our equipment.

I love the game so much, it's fun and gory but I used to play this on my IPhone and I got a new phone and I can't transfer my data even with my Facebook connected to it. My new phone is a galaxy s8 and I wonder if I can transfer my iPhone account to my galaxy. I don't to start over while my other phone have great and exclusive characters. Please help.

I love the game and new update. But i am soo disapointed, that you promissed us Injustice raiden and klassic mileena, still there are no challenges about them. Please make a new challenge a bout those charecters. Also injustice scorpion, undercover cassie cage and others. Please make this right.
description: Experience the over-the-top, visceral fighting of MORTAL KOMBAT X!Bring the power of next-gen gaming to your mobile and tablet device with this visually groundbreaking fighting and card collection game. Assemble an elite team of Mortal Kombat warriors and prove yourself in the greatest fighting tournament on Earth.BRUTAL 3 v 3 KOMBAT Create your own team of Mortal Kombat fighters and lead them into battle to earn experience, new special attacks, and powerful artifacts.MASSIVE ROSTER OF FIGHTERSCollect Mortal Kombat veterans like Scorpion, Johnny Cage, Sub-Zero, Sonya, Kitana, Ermac, and many others.¬† Discover the newest additions to Mortal Kombat such as the insect-like D‚ÄôVorah, fiery Cassie Cage, bloodthirsty Kotal Khan, and the mysterious Kung Jin.JAW DROPPING X-RAYS AND FATALITIESMortal Kombat X brings its trademark Fatalities and X-Rays to mobile, with stunning graphics, these over the top moves punch you right in the guts.CHALLENGE OTHER PLAYERSCompete with other players in Faction Wars, an online competitive mode where players engage other player teams.¬† Rank up in your own Faction‚Äôs leaderboard to earn weekly prizes.SUMMON ALLIES INTO BATTLEFind other players to be your Ally. Borrow a kombatant and strike a decisive blow against your enemies.UNLOCK REWARDS IN BOTH THE CONSOLE AND MOBILE GAMEPlay the game and unlock exclusive rewards for the console version of Mortal Kombat X, including ultra rare characters like Klassic Kitana and Injustice Scorpion. Playing the console version unlocks rewards in mobile as well.NOTICE:* Mortal Kombat X features high quality visuals. Performance is not optimized on devices with less than 1GB RAM.** A minimum of 1.5 GB of free space is required on your device.Content is generally suitable for ages 17 and up. Contains intense violence, blood, and gore.
descriptionHTML:
Experience the over-the-top, visceral fighting of MORTAL KOMBAT X!
Bring the power of next-gen gaming to your mobile and tablet device with this visually groundbreaking fighting and card collection game.
Assemble an elite team of Mortal Kombat warriors and prove yourself in the greatest fighting tournament on Earth.

BRUTAL 3 v 3 KOMBAT
Create your own team of Mortal Kombat fighters and lead them into battle to earn experience, new special attacks, and powerful artifacts.

MASSIVE ROSTER OF FIGHTERS
Collect Mortal Kombat veterans like Scorpion, Johnny Cage, Sub-Zero, Sonya, Kitana, Ermac, and many others.  Discover the newest additions to Mortal Kombat such as the insect-like D’Vorah, fiery Cassie Cage, bloodthirsty Kotal Khan, and the mysterious Kung Jin.

JAW DROPPING X-RAYS AND FATALITIES
Mortal Kombat X brings its trademark Fatalities and X-Rays to mobile, with stunning graphics, these over the top moves punch you right in the guts.

CHALLENGE OTHER PLAYERS
Compete with other players in Faction Wars, an online competitive mode where players engage other player teams.  Rank up in your own Faction’s leaderboard to earn weekly prizes.

SUMMON ALLIES INTO BATTLE
Find other players to be your Ally. Borrow a kombatant and strike a decisive blow against your enemies.

UNLOCK REWARDS IN BOTH THE CONSOLE AND MOBILE GAME
Play the game and unlock exclusive rewards for the console version of Mortal Kombat X, including ultra rare characters like Klassic Kitana and Injustice Scorpion. Playing the console version unlocks rewards in mobile as well.

NOTICE:
* Mortal Kombat X features high quality visuals. Performance is not optimized on devices with less than 1GB RAM.
** A minimum of 1.5 GB of free space is required on your device.
Content is generally suitable for ages 17 and up. Contains intense violence, blood, and gore.

comments: This is a great game for any Bleach fan   Don't listen to the people who say developers don't care and only want money... this game was originally Japanese and they are transferring it over to English and this takes time.. this game is great the characters look great the game play is very good and even... lvl system is easy n fun and you get what u put into the game. Yes some characters are harder to get then others but that's what makes the game fun and worth playing.. yes the game has a VIP system for those that want to spend money to get better things or characters but that doesn't mean you have to do it to enjoy the game...

I used to love this game but after two app reset wipes, I'm over it sorry going to brave souls who's with me?! Update: after reaching out to the admins on I was able to recover my data from my Google account. The data can not be transferred from ios to Android but that's fine. Thank you admins, sorry for the salt.

Even though the descriptions and dialogues in the game are bit off it doesn't completely take away from the experience of the game. It still does have some bugs, like the dialogues for instance, but the game is really addictive. It's one of very few games that I've been playing religiously for the past few months, probably longer. That's the one of the main reasons why I'm giving 5 *'s. The game has an ENORMOUS amount of potential, I think if the devs got licensing rights then it would improve the game so much more. One thing I really do not like about the game is that it is kind of a pay-to-win game. You have to spend real money to advance quicker or become stronger in the game faster. Other than the cons, it really is a fun and addictive game. If you love anime, if you love fan service, if you love action games, if you just love Bleach in general then you will definitely love this game.

Not very good it fell short of the other apps...it still missing half the content of the others while making it impossible without paying to collect keys.. shard collecting is lacking ...unless you want to pay for anything halfway decernt gameplay you won't find it here

Been playing for the past month. I've had zero issues that I can think of that I've read others having. It's a fun and addicting game. I can't wait for all of the other characters to be added in, only thing I dislike is wanting to play them but they aren't in it. Though I understand why. Great game would certainly recommend.

Only installing because i spent hundreds in the last one. Devs only care about your money, don't fix or take forever to fix issues, and the game is basically pay to win. Yiu can still get decently for free, but don't expect to get to the top that way. Take the 1 star reviews seriously... A lot of ppl stopped playing because of this games BS...

And I absolutely love my lil pets and their powers üòä and the ingame friends I have are helpful. edited: I completed a purchase and did not recieve anything like the quest said I would. Also developers never responded to my email regarding something else. I've spent $40 bucks on this game in the 1st few days I've been playing and I think I'll keep my lil money to myself now since they haven't fixed the issue.

Would give 5 stars but after you get to a certain level you have to spend real money to get farther. I have spend 65 dollars on this game so far and have been scammed so many times. Its a super fun game but so hard to get anywhere. You should be able to stock up shields. Also its stupid that you have to pay to talk. I might get the VIP if some things changed.

The problem I have is you haven't given the radio toy for the bear and also you can't unfreeze the guy because you don't give out the items to do it even after defeating the monster. You still can't get enough fire logs plus still no radio toy for the bear? Plus should give more coins it is a lot in higher levels

Losing some snowballs...... Would like to get more than six spins in one hour..... especially when there are large amounts needed to buy..... Mining pigs....really so much when we pay large amounts and our pay is so low.....

Please fix this.i will give 5 stars back.

comments: This game has had me hooked for almost two years now. There is always something to work on and improve. For long time Final Fantasy fans, this is the ultimate fanservice. I found this game to be more nostalgic than even other Final Fantasy crossover games like Dissidia and Theatrhythm. My only gripe is that I wish there was some sort of non-battle exploration aspect. A chance to explore the 3d FF games in 2d, even if they were brief and not the whole worlds, would be a nice touch. Highly recommended if you're looking for an addictive combat-focused rpg to devote yourself to, and super recommended for Final Fantasy fans.

Some minor technical issues with hanging or loading forever screens... but overall superb job with the idea, and best part is not needing to gatcha for your fave ff characters. Prob the least p2win of the top mobile games out there

I would rate it a 5, but the problem is that after the 6/8 update, the game ended up being super slow.  Extremely slow that I had to set my battle speed to 1 just to perform a blatant laggy action.  If you fix this issue, then I'll be happy to re-rate it a 5, but for now, you deserve a 3 unless you resolve it.

A fun game that makes you think about playing other Final Fantasy games. I have become invested in various characters and I am interested in Ffiv. The sprites do not work for all characters as it is hard to see differences between characters such as Vayne and Larsa. The game has missed an opportunity to create a storyline to bring the various games together. However it is a fun game that makes you want to play the full range of the Final Fantasy franchise.

I can't remain as positive as I used to be towards the game. With the various app issues such as excessively long loading times, poor performance, and issues with in-app purchases, I have soured on the game as a whole. The lack of daily missions that the japan side of the game received with the FF3 Onion Knight event that we still haven't received reeks of greed and deprives us of about 100 mythril (the in game currency) compared to where we should be.   The game itself, when it runs properly is still excellent. And it is awesome to use your favorite Final Fantasy characters, or become new fans of some. But DeNA has treated the Global version of the game as an afterthought as of late.

I gave this game 5 stars on EVERYTHING! But... I have some criticism. Some of the dungeons are completely too difficult. I've been playing the game for 2 years now DIEHARD and i still can't get even close to beating some of the bosses.

descriptionHTML:
*** OVER 10 MILLION DOWNLOADS WORLDWIDE ***

Gigantic update!

RELIVE your favorite FINAL FANTASY moments in FINAL FANTASY Record Keeper!

Fight with your favorite FINAL FANTASY heroes, battle through classic FINAL FANTASY moments, restore the lost memories and save the world once again.

=======

"FINAL FANTASY: Record Keeper has single handedly restored my faith as to the potential of this franchise and genre on mobile...” - Touch Arcade

"FINAL FANTASY: Record Keeper takes characters and scenes and mixes them together to form a new experience, giving fans a new way to revisit their favorites.” - GamesBeat

"...must-have for fans of the Final Fantasy series." - CNET, 04/02/15

=======

FEATURES

• RELIVE THE MEMORIES
Battle your way through the most epic FINAL FANTASY moments, woven together for the first time on mobile with an all-new tale! Tyro, a brand new character designed by Tetsuya Nomura, takes center stage!

• CREATE YOUR ULTIMATE TEAM
Put your own twist on the tales: build your fully customized FINAL FANTASY party and lead them to victory! With a massive roster of FINAL FANTASY characters, the possibilities are nearly endless!

• FIGHT THE BATTLES YOUR WAY
Experience the iconic FINAL FANTASY Active Time Battle (ATB) system! YOU control the flow of battle!

• SPECIAL EVENTS
With special events every week, complete new chapters and collect limited edition characters, gear and abilities!

=======

STORY

In a glorious kingdom that thrives on the harmony between magic and art, epic tales of valor and hope have been passed from one generation to the next.

The records of these great chronicles uphold the peace and prosperity of all civilization. The kingdom sealed these records inside paintings, to safeguard the balance of the world.

That is until, without warning, the records within the paintings began to fade away... Darkness fell upon the world, bringing catastrophe and ruin.

The time has come for you to save the kingdom’s future.

Defend Your Legacy.

=======

EXPERIENCE

A bunch of memorable moments are called out from FINAL FANTASY!

FINAL FANTASY VII: Lead AVALANCHE against Shinra, and unravel Sephiroth’s plans…
FINAL FANTASY VIII: Take your place in the elite group SeeD, and recruit the powerful Guardian Forces…
FINAL FANTASY X: Battle Sin, and uncover the mysteries of the lost city of Zanarkand…
FINAL FANTASY XIII: Rise up against the fal’Cie, and discover the true history of the world of Pulse…

And many, many more...


© SQUARE ENIX CO., LTD.
© DeNA Co., Ltd.

San Francisco CA 94107

title: FINAL FANTASY Record Keeper

comments: Really wanted to love this game. Higham of Futurama. However, when I login I cannot do anything. Game stops as soon as I try to collect from buildings or click on a character. Kinda hard to enjoy a game which crashes every single time in about 2 seconds. I can see from other reviews that I'm not alone. Nice to see tiny Co taking it on board. Edit: not playex for two months, redownloaded expecting them to have fixed by not but nothing has changed. Game still unplayable, Bravo. Really impressed that they can ignore a game breaking bug for so long.

I cant access my character no more glab is stuck in doop hq. Aint been able to use her for a couple of days now so im loosing out. The adds also dnt always load and crash other than that i like the game.

Loved this game and played it everyday while it worked. But ever since the end of the Christmas event the game totally crashes after being on it for only 2 seconds. And none of the updates since then have corrected the issue.

As a huge fan of the show, I would say the game does a decent job staying faithful to the characters, the story, and the recurring gags of the show. Sometimes the ever present monetization of the game can get a little blatant, but the developers seem to learn from their mistakes and have made a really fun game.

Not challenging. Pretty boring. Game play is railroad... Chug chug chug choo choo... Don't even think it developes any sort of adventure or excitement. Graphic start good. Then go 8 bit? Frigging weird.

Some characters like url can't be unlocked unless you go through a specific mission (moon part 4) and in order to go through the mission you need url... You need to finish moon part 4 to unlock the artifact for further expansion for omicron..... This makes no sense, the character can't even be bought.. so it's a dead end for the game, you hit a specific part and the game stops.  Can the developers help with this

descriptionHTML:
An immersive combat game in a massive multiplayer online world, War Commander: Rogue Assault delivers a stunning, fully 3D battlefield experience like nothing you've ever seen on mobile. Command your army and launch strategic strikes against your enemy for control of War Zones.

As one of the few surviving commanders after World War 3, defend your base, customize your units, and attack enemies to survive. Become the ultimate warrior in this online military strategy game by battling to gain control of the world.

Rogue Assault is the most realistic military game on mobile to date. With direct control of your tanks, helicopters, and infantry, shoot your way through enemy hordes and become a master of combat.

• Immersive 3D multiplayer military strategy game
• Individual or player-vs-player combat
• Real-time, individual unit control
• Immediate access to riflemen, heavy gunners, and rhino tanks
• Level up for access to powerful units and military might

Website: http://warcommander.com/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/RogueAssault/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/rogueassault
Developer: https://www.kixeye.com/

Build an Empire
Build your base and lead your army to victory. Discover new defense systems, research state of the art weapons, and destroy any enemies that stand in your way.

Fight in Strategic Battles
Blend foot soldiers, light vehicles, tanks, and aircraft to coordinate devastating strikes. Attacking the enemy never felt as good as in this realistic military game.

Defend your Fortress
Customize your defenses to repel enemies and control the world’s last resources. Alternatively, play offense and use your army to turn around, attack, and take what’s yours.

• Infantry: Standard warriors required in any battle. Exceptionally well-rounded and diverse, they are great for attack or defense.
• Aircraft: Perfect for launching surprise strikes against an enemy base. The right aircraft can provide a strategic advantage over grounded units who can’t shoot from so far below.
• Vehicles: The backbone of your force. With huge damage output and defensive capabilities, these units are a must have for any invasion

No Build Times
Don’t have time to assemble an army the old fashioned way? Don’t worry. With no build times, you’ll be ready to get into the action in no time.

Join an Alliance
Forge strategic alliances with other soldiers and form battle tactics in the group chat, or seek advice from a pool of commanders in the live world chat. Those who join an alliance are better set up to thrive in this war-torn world.

Monthly in-game Events
Show off your military prowess in monthly events. Fight strategic worldwide battles to top the world leaderboards.

KIXEYE, Inc.
268 Bush St., STE 2008
San Francisco, CA 94104

summary: War Commander: Rogue Assault is a fully 3D, real-time combat strategy game.
title: War Commander: Rogue Assault

description: Compete for zones with friends and strangers in real life!In TURF there are lots of ZONES spread out around the world. You compete for these zones against others in order to play the game.By going to a zone and standing within its boundaries, you will TAKE the zone from the owner and claim ownership. This will turn the zone green and give you income in the form of points.Watch your competitors every move LIVE on the game map and choose your strategy accordingly.Owning more zones will provide you with a higher income, while losing a zone to a competitor will reduce your income. There are three levels of top-lists (region/country/world) where you can see your current ranking.The game is played in ROUNDS. Every round is one month long and ends on a sunday close to the start of a new month. At the end of a round, every zone is reset and points collected are zeroed in order to allow for a new start. Rewards are given to the best players, which are kept forever.The game also includes events, medals, rankings and lots of statistical data to measure your performance and keep track of your adventures.Start turfing now! Move those legs and let the adrenaline flow!
descriptionHTML:
Compete for zones with friends and strangers in real life!

In TURF there are lots of ZONES spread out around the world. You compete for these zones against others in order to play the game.

By going to a zone and standing within its boundaries, you will TAKE the zone from the owner and claim ownership. This will turn the zone green and give you income in the form of points.

Watch your competitors every move LIVE on the game map and choose your strategy accordingly.

Owning more zones will provide you with a higher income, while losing a zone to a competitor will reduce your income. There are three levels of top-lists (region/country/world) where you can see your current ranking.

The game is played in ROUNDS. Every round is one month long and ends on a sunday close to the start of a new month. At the end of a round, every zone is reset and points collected are zeroed in order to allow for a new start. Rewards are given to the best players, which are kept forever.

The game also includes events, medals, rankings and lots of statistical data to measure your performance and keep track of your adventures.

Start turfing now! Move those legs and let the adrenaline flow!

descriptionHTML:
Grow Empire: Rome is a captivating game, mixing tower defense (TD) and strategy mechanisms with role playing (RPG) elements.
You are Caesar, mighty leader of the Roman republic, your objective is to defeat other civilizations in ancient Europe with an army made-up of roman soldiers, siege weapons, heroes and barbarian mercenaries. Be ready for War!

Turn a small republic in the heart of the Italian peninsula into the greatest civilization the world has ever seen. Lead a bunch of weak peasants into the fierceness of battle to turn them into invincible warriors.
Upgrade your stronghold to defend from the most fearful barbarian's clans and armies from Italy, Gallium, Carthage and Iberian peninsula. Conquer them to expand your dominions and see your nation wealth grows.

The glory is awaiting for you Caesar!
Veni Vidi Vici!

Features:
• Tower Defense (TD), Strategy and Role Playing (RPG) elements.
• +1400 waves to survive.
• +100 cities to conquer in ancient Europe.
• +1000 buildings upgrades.
• +35 different Roman troops to research and unlock.
• 4 European enemy factions, each with +12 different troops.
• Siege weapons and war elephants!
• 4 heroes with special skills.
• +18 Skills to unlock.

Players across the globe will explore unknown realms; challenge arch devil, vampire lord and various formidable foes, while collecting resources, upgrading heroes, defeating enemies, and profiting from incremental game features as they ascend to the throne of Enroth!The best idle-style mobile game you‚Äôll play! descriptionHTML:
“Brain over brawn, magic over might.” Follow in the might and wisdom of the ancestral Enroth pioneers into a world of chaos!

HEROES OF MIGHT is a brand-new RPG of epic fantasy setting, abound with wonders like the Portal of Glory and Cliffs of Dragon. Players across the globe will explore unknown realms; challenge arch devil, vampire lord and various formidable foes, while collecting resources, upgrading heroes, defeating enemies, and profiting from incremental game features as they ascend to the throne of Enroth!

The best idle-style mobile game you’ll play!
Play at your leisure yet full of strategies and fun!

Download now! Play for free!

---------------------------

Dearest Heroes:

As loyal subjects, you are tasked with protecting the land you love by building castles, recruiting and upgrading armies, learning and casting magic, venturing into the far unknown, amassing assets, as well as amplifying your power in order to defeat a bestiary of monsters. Then, you shall battle opposing heroes for supremacy, and the strongest who emerges shall enjoy unprecedented immortality and legacy! Take up arms and fight forth!

–Queen Catherine

---------------------------

Game Features

✦Your Heroes are Never Offline✦
When you are offline, your characters continue to battle, upgrade, gather treasure and resources for you, which are available next time you—their lord—come back online.

✦Create Epic Empire✦
Impregnable castles to repel invasions, magic academies to research advanced magic, wonders to grant special abilities. More surprises await you as you build a might empire.

✦Raise Armies to Attack Enemy✦
Recruit fantastical creatures for warfare, develop and compose your own invincible army to strike against foes. Choose from human, dungeoneer, undead and other clans, each with own unique combat traits.

✦Explore the World with Your Heroes✦
As their lord, you command heroes to lead armies, cast spells, explore uncharted territories, and collect gear, treasure, resources while hunting down opposing heroes.

✦Face Off in Legendary Battles✦
Nearly all of the world’s greatest heroes will enter the arena to determine who is best of the best. Only the most powerful heroes will have the honor and glory of standing atop the rankings.

✦Form Alliances and Make Friends✦
Join an alliance to socialize, share mutual interests, and fight formidable monsters and opposing alliances together. There’s always strength in numbers, especially when facing an ever-shifting landscape of war and peace.

✦Endless Gameplay✦
Experience elite events, international clashes, World Boss and assorted battles. Experiment with new combos via merging relics, soul towers, breakthroughs, and other fun, creative features.

Contact Us

Official Home：www.titanorz.com
Facebook Page：https://www.facebook.com/HeroesofMight
Customer Service：hom@titanorz.com


Dear Lords,
Please contact us and we will do our best to answer your every question. Lastly, we would like to thank everyone who’s ever played and supported HEROES OF MIGHT. Appreciate it!

comments: Fun game, good story lines, and addictive. I think this is one of my favorite shall we datw games. It's easier to earn the main currency then most of the other games. My only thing I don't nessisarily like is that the story tickets take a while to build back up, although that's kind of a running theme for most of these games and some others take way longer. Over all I enjoy this game.

Fun stories and lovable characters. The only issue is that the amount of jade needed overall for one characters main story is a bit high. I would also like the opportunity to win or use gold/jade to get the side stories. Finally there's almost no point to having gold. The 4 rating is because despite the cost in time and money I still wanted to finish the story. It would be great if we could buy entire main stories.

Please update more stories and events on this! Also, can't you lower the price of tickets? Seems like tickets are more expensive than diamonds. If not lower prices then at least add more tickets like 10 or 15 for 20$? Pretty please! Well either you change it or not I just want to say. I LOVE THEM STORIES ARE DAMN ROMANTIC AND INTERESTING! Love it! Make more event prizes that involves a lot more diamonds and tickets please! THANK YOU LOVE~ | Update: more season 2 of characters please!!!

Addictive, very entertaining stories with good music, colorful graphics, and great characters! My issues with this game is a money dumper! It'll make you spend money to fully complete the stories. In between chapters, you are giving a certain amount of time to complete the mini games or whatever the task may be, which is impossible, in order to receive those special pages.  So it's fun, but there is no way to fully complete stories for free...

I really enjoy the storyline - it doesn't involve too much comedy or anything like that - but it isn't extremely serious either. I love the characters, and I wanna unlock everything possible that involves Ukyo. I do feel that the art for some characters Can be a bit better..(eduard's arm Always being up is a bit awkward). My biggest complaint is that there are many hard to reach checkpoints. But other than that, it's very fun and interesting!

The game is quite good till the part i played but the only problem which i have with this game is after the prologue. After finishing chapter 1 part 1 i can't seem to be able to play the story. It goes completely blank. HURTS !! I couldn't even get a chance to pick my choice ;(

descriptionHTML:
It is Edo period, and Japan is still a country closed off to the rest of the world. In order to save your village and seek revenge, you must impersonate your twin brother, Village Chief and ninja. But the task at hand is not so easy… as you are his sister! You join a group of ninja vigilantes hell-bent on cleansing the corrupt City of Nagasaki. On the path to vengeance, you never expected to find love…

♥The Story♥

You’ve found yourself surrounded by the most skilled ninjas in all of Nagasaki. Carrying out vigilante missions with your instructor, you must keep your identity a secret. However, you find yourself growing closer to him…Will he find out your true identity? Will you capture the heart of an elite Commissioner…or help an enigmatic interpreter recover his lost memories?

Your path will be fraught with obstacles, but make the right decisions, and you will find
yourself in a romance that will go down in history.

♥The Characters♥
♥The Assertive Commissioner - Ukyo
His loveable personality means he is often relied on. As your instructor, he takes you under his wing, and you grow close. His caring nature softens your guard, and soon you realize your undeniable attraction to him. What will he do when he discovers your true feelings?!
“Come on... Just tell me you love me”

♥The Mysterious Interpreter - Eduard
Because of his severe memory loss, his intentions are shrouded in mystery. He does not say much, but deep down you know how kind-hearted he actually is. Through the process of helping him recover his memories, he realizes how much you mean to him. How will you respond to his shocking confession?!

“Your smile brings me so much joy”

♥The Snarky Oracle - Asagi
Coming from a family of oracles, he is constantly compared to his great father, which puts him under immense pressure. By sharing each other’s secrets, your relationship grows deeper. Can you melt his heart of ice?!
“Can I kiss you?”

Your destiny is in your hands.
Your mission? To find true love.

♥Features♥
♥ Play free of charge
♥ Read stories with Story Tickets, which are given out daily
♥ Enjoy multiple endings for each character.
♥ story endings vary depending on the choices you make
♥ Dress up your character in cute outfits
♥ Join in-game events to receive exclusive stories, pictures, avatar items and more…
♥ Link your account on Facebook

♥About Us♥
NTT Solmare is a Japanese company based in Osaka, Japan. We strive to make the best dating simulation apps for adults. Our Otome dating sims are free! If you like romance novels, visual novels, cute guys, or anime then we think that you will love our games! Our Shall We Date? Series have over 32 million downloads!! So download one of our free romance games today, and find out why our dating games are so popular!

comments: This game just freezes constantly when opening reports, it takes so long that farming in this app is nearly impossible other than loot assistant. Messages constantly appear white and don't allow you to type. I have played tw on iPhone before and never had a problem with the app. It's like the developers don't even bother on android.

Please allow us to zoom in and out on the map. Please fix the back button so it goes to the previous page rather than the village overview. Something as basic as a menu should not lag and be smooth, especially on flagship phones. I pay for premium but this app is hard to use sometimes compared to iOS... Otherwise the app is an alright alternative to the browser.

I love this game. However, since the new update, when I play on my phone I'm not able to send emails and I have to click on the village button every time I change villages before I can do anything with that village. It is very inconvenient and impedes my ability to send important emails without logging in on a computer. Fix it.
this is one of the worst apps i have ever seen. it would be better if you didnt make anything rather than this.

I can't see the reports and the mails. It is completely blank white page. I am not been able to play in this app.  Worst app ever seen for such a wonderful game which I am playing for the last 10 years.please fix it.
Need to work on page loading. Reports, mails, everything you can click on really. Has a loading pages problem

descriptionHTML:
Create villages, forge bonds, conquer worlds! Fight with thousands of other players online in this medieval strategy game.

Tribal Wars is a medieval strategy game which offers complex strategies and fun with a simple gameplay. Upgrade your village to a mighty fortress and raise your army. Band together with other players to form a powerful tribe and lead your troops into battle. Conquer the villages of your enemies and expand your empire. Will your tribe prevail?

FEATURES

• Free to play!
• Build and upgrade more than 15 unique buildings
• Raise an army by recruiting many different defense and offensive units
• Appoint a paladin and find mighty equipment.
• Attack, plunder and conquer your opponents in real time while defending your kingdom against attackers – real PvP.
• Band together with other players to form a tribe and declare war on your enemies.
• Many different worlds with altered victory conditions.
• Play via your smartphone or via your browser.

comments: Great for passing time, although at times you get kind of stuck where you can't gather any more materials because of storage capacity but then it takes forever to get the items for upgrade. The coin amount to buy some buildings is quite high on a lot of them, and the same with the trees and extra livestock. All in all I love playing this user friendly game!

It has potential to be a great game. Its just so sloooow because you have to spend gems for almost everything. Its hard to get seeds because it's hard to get gems not everyone can afford to spend on these games. The land expansion sucks!!! It takes way to much, can't get what's needed half the time. Easier ways to get seeds and coins and it will be better.... Thanks!

I enjoy this game. It's very addictive but in a good way. I actually just got my wife hooked on playing it as well.   My one question though, why are there so many differences between the Android system version and the IPhone system  version? On each building, my wife can see each item available and what level is needed to unlock it. That doesn't show on mine. Also, on hers, she has a fair/bazaar looking building, a delivery truck, and a hot air balloon thing.  Why are these not on the android version????

Good game,  potential to be great I enjoy most of this game. To make it even better - more tools or the ability to buy them,  I have land I can't use because I can't clear it.  The ability to move trees,  grass, rocks until we are able to clear them, so we can make better use of our land. Better rewards  for completing collections,  I've gotten coins and 1 or 2 shovels.  Not good considering how long it takes to complete & that it says win up to 10 tools!?!  Better fishing,  I only catch catfish,  bass,  and anchovies.

Half my images are invisible. I can't see half of my buildings or the items to craft, crafted items, items on sale or even my stand. I submitted a report to Storm 8 only to be told in a automated reply that they don't have the staff to handle it and there was nothing that would be done. I loved this game and had recently started over, looking forward to playing. Now, once I hit lvl 8, I'm uninstalling.

Farm story 2 This game could be used and enjoyed more but at this time I am not playing as it is more frustrating them fun.  I need to expand the barn and silo but the things needed are a large amounts and RARE to achieve or even buy in the market.  Frustrated with trying to upgrade my barn so I will be taking a break for a while and will see if I return

descriptionHTML:
Farm Story 2 is a farm simulator that lets you explore a beautiful 3D world to harvest crops, raise
animals and discover exciting surprises! Join in on the long-awaited sequel to our #1 hit farming
game!

Play with friends for free and as long as you want, turning your fresh produce into delicious goods
to become a farming legend! Go fishing, design your ranch and adopt pets to liven up your farm!

Available in English, Deutsch, Español, Français, Italiano, 日本語, 中国语言, 한국어

FARM STORY 2 FEATURES

FARM GAME - Build your farm from the ground up
- Farm simulator - Get the chance to get up close and personal with your favorite animals
- Farming game - Plant crops and raise livestock as you try to become the best farmer
- Management game - Choose your own direction for the farm you build

MINI GAMES - Play mini games to expand and enhance your farm
- Growing game - Plant and harvest your own crops
- Trading game - Buy and sell with neighbors to profit from your hard work
- Mining game - Delve deep to uncover precious gems and jewelry
- Storyline game - Unlock and meet special characters as you expand your farm

FISHING GAME - Discover Hidden Surprises
- Fishing for fun - Relax while expanding your farm! Use fish to fulfill tasks or create new items on
your farm
- Casual games - Fishing can return gems, paint and more! You never know what you’ll find

COOKING GAMES - Make meals from your ingredients
- Cooking for all - Craft delicious meals in your Kitchen, snacks with your Deep Fryer, or desserts
in the Chocolatier!
- Harvest fresh ingredients - Whip up your favorite dishes instantly with your homegrown crops!
- Trade your food - Trade or sell your foods to make your farm as big as you can!

BUILDING GAME - Build your farm from scratch
- Design - Build your farm from the ground up – literally! Plant crops, raise animals and play mini
games to build the farm of your dreams!
- Decorate - Customize your ranch strategically to maximize growth and earn rewards!

RAISE ANIMALS - Expand your livestock
- Raising games - Collect a barnyard full of cute and playful animals
- Milk the cow - Get what you need for all your farming needs like for milk, eggs and wool
- Raise animals - Each cow, chicken, sheep and horse you collect expands your ranch

PET GAMES - Add cute characters to your farm
- Pets - Adopt cute kittens and charismatic canines
- Raise animals - receive amazing rewards that help your farm

FREE TO PLAY - Play Farm Story 2 for free
- Building games for free - Download Farm Story 2 for free, and start building your dream farm

The farm game you’ve been waiting for is here at last! Come and play the BEST looking FREE TO
PLAY farm game for Android!

addition, Farm Story 2 may link to social media services, such as Facebook, and Storm8 will have
access to your information through such services.

comments: I love this game, it's more addictive & fun than Candy Crush. Love the opportunities to get extra moves without paying (i.e. watch ad). However, it uses an unreasonable amount of data. 300+MB a week. Strongly suggest only playing when connected to Wi-Fi.

update back awhile ago i had a issue with the sound so i uninstall it then decided to install it again now the issues is resolved it's a good game but i have another game almost just like this one called raspberry jam so i didn't want two of the same type game but both are good. nice work developers

Continuous problems with the adverts to get the free moves. Ads stop midway through or the game stops and I am kicked out. Persevered because I was enjoying the game but now I am just frustrated by it. Uninstalling.
Love the game. But I'm  so close to uninstalling it because of it annoying  darn buy moves popping up all the time.I understand you need to make money but there has to be a better why.
Takes too long to advance to next levels. You earn unlimited time but by the time the potions fill the time is up. Not really gaining anything
I love this game. Least you can play for a long time  you don't die real fast like some other games
description: "Dream of collecting‚Ä¶ not jewels, but recipes for the tastiest, most incredible sweets, don‚Äôt you? Grab a can of soda; you‚Äôll need it to wash down all the jelly beans and sugar candies!You, your assistant Ella and the candy-maker Edward will set off on a quest to that puzzling place, Candy Valley, where the locals are famous for their exquisite recipes!Travel with the Rainbow and learn to cook all kinds of delicacies by matching the ingredients!Danger and hardship await you on your adventure, but you are sure to best any puzzle without trouble!Cool action waits for kids and adults alike. Boys and girls, you will have unlimited fun playing this jewel of a game!You can log in with Facebook, import your progress and play for free anytime you want on your smartphone!A new online classic saga of match 3 games.Simple rules: find the matches, starting from three in a row, and combine them.Become the ultimate crusher of sweets and digger of recipes.Dash to the most complex puzzles in the app world, match threes, and rush to the very top!Travel the sweetest land imaginable.Note: The purchases in the in-game store are optional and meant to make game progress easier. A Wi-Fi or mobile Internet connection is needed to play the game ‚Äî you can‚Äôt do it offline."
descriptionHTML:
"Dream of collecting… not jewels, but recipes for the tastiest, most incredible sweets, don’t you? Grab a can of soda; you’ll need it to wash down all the jelly beans and sugar candies!
You, your assistant Ella and the candy-maker Edward will set off on a quest to that puzzling place, Candy Valley, where the locals are famous for their exquisite recipes!
Travel with the Rainbow and learn to cook all kinds of delicacies by matching the ingredients!
Danger and hardship await you on your adventure, but you are sure to best any puzzle without trouble!
Cool action waits for kids and adults alike. Boys and girls, you will have unlimited fun playing this jewel of a game!
You can log in with Facebook, import your progress and play for free anytime you want on your smartphone!

A new online classic saga of match 3 games.
Simple rules: find the matches, starting from three in a row, and combine them.
Become the ultimate crusher of sweets and digger of recipes.
Dash to the most complex puzzles in the app world, match threes, and rush to the very top!
Travel the sweetest land imaginable.

Note: The purchases in the in-game store are optional and meant to make game progress easier. A Wi-Fi or mobile Internet connection is needed to play the game — you can’t do it offline."
